He said further scientific study was required and if it was found that action was needed it should be taken by the European Union .	PRP VBD JJ JJ NN VBD VBN CC IN PRP VBD VBN IN NN VBD VBN PRP MD VB VBN IN DT NNP NNP .
He said a proposal last month by EU Farm Commissioner Franz Fischler to ban sheep brains , spleens and spinal cords from the human and animal food chains was a highly specific and precautionary move to protect human health . Fischler proposed EU-wide measures after reports from Britain and France that under laboratory conditions sheep could contract Bovine Spongiform Encephalopathy ( BSE ) -- mad cow disease .	JJR VBN NNP VBZ IN NNS IN NNP CC NNP WDT IN NN NNS NN MD VB NNP NNP NNP ( NNP ) : JJ NN NN .
But Fischler agreed to review his proposal after the EU 's standing veterinary committee , mational animal health officials , questioned if such action was justified as there was only a slight risk to human health . The EU 's scientific veterinary and multidisciplinary committees are due to re-examine the issue early next month and make recommendations to the senior veterinary officials .	DT NNP POS JJ JJ CC JJ NNS VBP JJ TO VB DT NN RB JJ NN CC VB NNS TO DT JJ JJ NNS .
Sheep have long been known to contract scrapie , a brain-wasting disease similar to BSE which is believed to have been transferred to cattle through feed containing animal waste .	NNP VBP RB VBN VBN TO NN NN , DT JJ NN JJ TO NNP WDT VBZ VBN TO VB VBN VBN TO NNS IN NN VBG NN NN .

FRANKFURT 1996-08-22	NNP CD
German first-time registrations of motor vehicles jumped 14.2 percent in July this year from the year-earlier period , the Federal office for motor vehicles said on Thursday .	JJ JJ NNS IN NN NNS VBD CD NN IN NNP DT NN IN DT JJ NN , DT NNP NN IN NN NNS VBD IN NNP .
The office said 356,725 new cars were registered in July 1996 -- 304,850 passenger cars and 15,613 trucks .	DT NN VBD CD JJ NNS VBD VBN IN NNP CD : CD NN NNS CC CD NNS .
The figures represent a 13.6 percent increase for passenger cars and a 2.2 percent decline for trucks from July 1995 .	DT NNS VBP DT CD NN NN IN NN NNS CC DT CD NN NN IN NNS IN NNP CD .
Motor-bike registration rose 32.7 percent in the period .	JJ NN VBD CD NN IN DT NN .
The growth was partly due to an increased number of Germans buying German cars abroad , while manufacturers said that domestic demand was weak , the federal office said .	DT NN VBD RB JJ TO DT VBN NN IN NNPS VBG JJ NNS RB , IN NNS VBD DT JJ NN VBD JJ , DT JJ NN VBD .
Almost all German car manufacturers posted gains in registration numbers in the period .	RB DT JJ NN NNS VBD NNS IN NN NNS IN DT NN .
Volkswagen AG won 77,719 registrations , slightly more than a quarter of the total .	NNP NNP VBD CD NNS , RB RBR IN DT NN IN DT NN .
Opel AG together with General Motors came in second place with 49,269 registrations , 16.4 percent of the overall figure .	NNP NNP RB IN NNP NNPS VBD IN JJ NN IN CD NNS , CD NN IN DT JJ NN .
Third was Ford with 35,563 registrations , or 11.7 percent .	JJ VBD NNP IN CD NNS , CC CD NN .
Only Seat and Porsche had fewer registrations in July 1996 compared to last year 's July .	RB NNP CC NNP VBD JJR NNS IN NNP CD VBN TO JJ NN POS NNP .
Seat posted 3,420 registrations compared with 5522 registrations in July a year earlier .	NN VBD CD NNS VBN IN CD NNS IN NNP DT NN RBR .
Porsche 's registrations fell to 554 from 643 .	NNP POS NNS VBD TO CD IN CD .

Rabinovich is winding up his term as ambassador .	NN VBZ VBG RP PRP$ NN IN NN .

BONN 1996-08-22	NN CD
Germany 's Agriculture Ministry suggested on Wednesday that consumers avoid eating meat from British sheep until scientists determine whether mad cow disease can be transmitted to the animals .	NNP POS NNP NNP VBD IN NNP WDT NNS VB VBG NN IN JJ NN IN NNS VBP IN JJ NN NN MD VB VBN TO DT NNS .
" Until this is cleared up by the European Union 's scientific panels -- and we have asked this to be done as quickly as possible -- ( consumers ) should if at all possible give preference to sheepmeat from other countries , " ministry official Werner Zwingmann told ZDF television .	" IN DT VBZ VBN RP IN DT NNP NNP POS JJ NNS : CC PRP VBP VBN DT TO VB VBN RB RB IN JJ : ( NNS ) MD IN IN DT JJ VBP NN TO VB IN JJ NNS , " NN NN NNP NNP VBD NNP NN .
" I do not want to say that there is a concrete danger for consumers , " he added . "	" PRP VBP RB VB TO VB IN EX VBZ DT JJ NN IN NNS , " PRP VBD . "
There are too many holes in what we know , and these must be filled very quickly . "	EX VBP RB JJ NNS IN WP PRP VBP , CC DT MD VB VBN RB RB . "
Bonn has led efforts to ensure consumer protection tops the list of priorities in dealing with the mad cow crisis , which erupted in March when Britain acknowledged humans could contract a similar illness by eating contaminated beef .	NNP VBZ VBN NNS TO VB NN NN VBZ DT NN IN NNS IN VBG IN DT JJ NN NN , WDT VBD IN NNP WRB NNP VBD NNS MD VB DT JJ NN IN VBG VBN NN .
The European Commission agreed this month to rethink a proposal to ban the use of suspect sheep tissue after some EU veterinary experts questioned whether it was justified .	DT NNP NNP VBD DT NN TO VB DT NN TO VB DT NN IN VBP NN NN IN DT NNP JJ NNS VBD IN PRP VBD VBN .
EU Farm Commissioner Franz Fischler had proposed banning sheep brains , spleens and spinal cords from the human and animal food chains after reports from Britain and France that under laboratory conditions sheep could contract Bovine Spongiform Encephalopathy ( BSE ) -- mad cow disease .	NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP VBD VBN VBG NN NNS , NNS CC JJ NNS IN DT NN CC NN NN NNS IN NNS IN NNP CC NNP WDT IN NN NNS NN MD VB NNP NNP NNP ( NNP ) : JJ NN NN .
But some members of the EU 's standing veterinary committee questioned whether the action was necessary given the slight risk to human health .	CC DT NNS IN DT NNP POS NN JJ NN VBD IN DT NN VBD JJ VBN DT JJ NN TO JJ NN .
The question is being studied separately by two EU scientific committees .	DT NN VBZ VBG VBN RB IN CD NNP JJ NNS .
Sheep have long been known to contract scrapie , a similar brain-wasting disease to BSE which is believed to have been transferred to cattle through feed containing animal waste .	NNP VBP RB VBN VBN TO NN NN , DT JJ JJ NN TO NNP WDT VBZ VBN TO VB VBN VBN TO NNS IN NN VBG NN NN .
British officials say sheep meat is perfectly safe to eat .	JJ NNS VBP NN NN VBZ RB JJ TO VB .
ZDF said Germany imported 47,600 sheep from Britain last year , nearly half of total imports .	NNP VBD NNP VBD CD NN IN NNP JJ NN , RB NN IN JJ NNS .
It brought in 4,275 tonnes of British mutton , some 10 percent of overall imports .	PRP VBD IN CD NNS IN JJ NN , DT CD NN IN JJ NNS .
After the British government admitted a possible link between mad cow disease and its fatal human equivalent , the EU imposed a worldwide ban on British beef exports .	IN DT JJ NN VBD DT JJ NN IN JJ NN NN CC PRP$ JJ JJ NN , DT NNP VBD DT JJ NN IN JJ NN NNS .
EU leaders agreed at a summit in June to a progressive lifting of the ban as Britain takes parallel measures to eradicate the disease .	NN NNS VBD IN DT NN IN NNP TO DT JJ NN IN DT NN IN NNP VBZ JJ NNS TO VB DT NN .

Measles exposure can lead to bowel disease - study .	NNS NN MD VB TO NN NN : VB .
LONDON 1996-08-23	NNP CD
Women who get measles while pregnant may have babies at higher risk of Crohn 's disease , a debilitating bowel disorder , researchers said on Friday .	NNS WP VBP FW IN JJ MD VB NNS IN JJR NN IN NNP POS NN , DT JJ NN NN , NNS VBD IN NNP .
Three out of four Swedish babies born to mothers who caught measles developed serious cases of Crohn 's disease , the researchers said .	CD IN IN CD JJ NNS VBN TO NNS WP VBD NNS VBD JJ NNS IN NNP POS NN , DT NNS VBD .
Dr Andrew Wakefield of the Royal Free Hospital School of Medicine and colleagues screened 25,000 babies delivered at University Hospital , Uppsala , between 1940 and 1949 .	NNP NNP NNP IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP IN NNP CC NNS VBD CD NNS VBN IN NNP NNP , NNP , IN CD CC CD .
Four of the mothers had measles while pregnant .	CD IN DT NNS VBD NNS IN JJ .
" Three of the four children had Crohn 's disease , " Wakefield 's group wrote in the Lancet medical journal .	" CD IN DT CD NNS VBD NNP POS NN , " NNP POS NN VBD IN DT NNP JJ NN .
Crohn 's is an inflammation of the bowel that can sometimes require surgery .	NNP POS VBZ DT NN IN DT NN WDT MD RB VB NN .
It causes diarrhoea , abdominal pain and weight loss .	PRP VBZ NN , JJ NN CC NN NN .
The researchers said the three children involved had especially severe cases .	DT NNS VBD DT CD NNS VBN VBD RB JJ NNS .
Exposure to viruses can often cause birth defects .	VB TO NNS MD RB VB NN NNS .
Most notably , women who get rubella ( German measles ) have a high risk of a stillborn baby .	RBS RB , NNS WP VBP RB ( JJ NNS ) VB DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN .

Garlic pills may not lower blood cholesterol and studies that show they do may be flawed , British researchers have reported .	JJ NNS MD RB VB NN NN CC NNS WDT VBP PRP VBP MD VB JJ , JJ NNS VBP VBN .
A study by a team of doctors at Oxford University has found people with high blood cholesterol do not benefit significantly from taking garlic tablets .	DT NN IN DT NN IN NNS IN NNP NNP VBZ VBN NNS IN JJ NN NN VBP RB VB RB IN VBG NN NNS .
The study involved 115 people with high blood cholesterol levels .	DT NN VBN CD NNS IN JJ NN NN NNS .
They were given 900 milligrams a day of dried garlic powder or placebo tablets . "	PRP VBD VBN CD NNS DT NN IN JJ NN NN CC NN NNS . "
There were no significant differences between the groups receiving garlic and placebo , " they wrote in the Journal of the Royal College of Physicians .	EX VBD DT JJ NNS IN DT NNS VBG NN CC NN , " PRP VBD IN DT NNP IN DT NNP NNP IN NNPS .
Those taking part were told to eat a low-fat diet for six weeks before they started taking the pills , and their blood cholesterol measured before and after the six-week period .	DT VBG NN VBD VBN TO VB DT JJR NN IN CD NNS IN PRP VBD VBG DT NNS , CC PRP$ NN NN VBD IN CC IN DT JJ NN .
The researchers said this would make their findings more accurate .	DT NNS VBD DT MD VB PRP$ NNS RBR JJ .
Several studies have found garlic pills can lower blood pressure and blood cholesterol .	JJ NNS VBP VBN NN NNS MD VB NN NN CC NN NN .
But the Oxford team disputed these findings and said either previous trials may have been interpreted incorrectly , those taking part were not given special diets beforehand or the duration of the studies may have been too short . The six-month trial was funded by the British Heart Foundation and Lichtwer Pharma GmbH , which makes Kwai brand garlic tablets .	DT JJ NN VBD VBN IN DT NNP NNP NNP CC NNP NNP NNP , WDT VBZ JJ NN NN NNS .
The study did not address whether whole garlic could affect cholesterol .	DT NN VBD RB VB IN JJ NN MD VB NN .

I expect the market to go as far down as 63,000 tomorrow if sales continue , " said Burcin Mavituna from Interbank .	PRP VBP DT NN TO VB RB RB RB IN CD NN IN NNS VBP , " VBD NNP NNP IN NNP .

Defiant U.S. neo-Nazi jailed by German court .	NNP NNP JJ VBN IN JJ NN .
Andrew Gray	NNP NNP
HAMBURG , Germany 1996-08-22	NNP , NNP CD
A Hamburg court sentenced U.S. neo-Nazi leader Gary Lauck on Thursday to four years in prison for pumping banned extremist propaganda into Germany from his base in the United States .	DT NNP NN VBN NNP JJ NN NNP NNP IN NNP TO CD NNS IN NN IN VBG VBN NN NN IN NNP IN PRP$ NN IN DT NNP NNP .
Lauck , from Lincoln , Nebraska , yelled a tirade of abuse at the court after his conviction for inciting racial hatred .	NNP , IN NNP , NNP , VBD DT NN IN NN IN DT NN IN PRP$ NN IN VBG JJ NN .
" The struggle will go on , " the 43-year-old shouted in German before being escorted out by security guards .	" DT NN MD VB IN , " DT JJ VBD IN JJ IN VBG VBD RP IN NN NNS .
Lauck 's lawyer vowed he would appeal against the court 's decision , arguing that his client should have been set free because he had not committed any offence under German law .	NN POS NN VBD PRP MD VB IN DT NN POS NN , VBG IN PRP$ NN MD VB VBN VBN JJ IN PRP VBD RB VBN DT JJ IN JJ NN .
The German government hailed the conviction as a major victory in the fight against neo-Nazism .	DT JJ NN VBD DT NN IN DT JJ NN IN DT NN IN NN .
Lauck 's worldwide network has been the main source of anti-Semitic propaganda material flowing into Germany since the 1970s .	NN VBZ JJ NN VBZ VBN DT JJ NN IN JJ NN NN VBG IN NNP IN DT NNS .
" Lauck possessed a well-oiled propaganda machine , honed during more than 20 years , " presiding judge Guenter Bertram told the court .	" NNP VBD DT JJ NN NN , VBN IN JJR IN CD NNS , " VBG NN NNP NNP VBD DT NN .
" He set up a propaganda cannon and fired it at Germany . "	" PRP VBP RP DT NN NN CC VBD PRP IN NNP . "
said Bertram , who also read out extracts from Lauck 's material praising Hitler as " the greatest of all leaders " and describing the Nazi slaughter of millions of Jews as a myth .	VBD NNP , WP RB VBD RP VBZ IN NNP POS NN VBG NNP IN " DT JJS IN DT NNS " CC VBG DT NNP NN IN NNS IN NNPS IN DT NN .
Eager to put Lauck behind bars quickly and avoid a long and complex trial , prosecutor Bernd Mauruschat limited his charges to offences since 1994 .	JJ TO VB NNP IN NNS RB CC VB DT JJ CC JJ NN , NN NNP NNP JJ PRP$ NNS TO NNS IN CD .
He had demanded a five-year jail term but said he was satisfied with the court 's sentence .	PRP VBD VBN DT JJ NN NN CC VBD PRP VBD JJ IN DT NN POS NN .
Publishing and distributing neo-Nazi material is illegal in Germany but Lauck 's defence team had argued that U.S freedom of speech laws meant he was free to produce his swastika-covered books , magazines , videos and flags in his homeland .	NN CC VBG JJ NN VBZ JJ IN NNP CC NNP POS NN NN VBD VBN IN NNP NN IN NN NNS VBD PRP VBD JJ TO VB PRP$ JJ NNS , NNS , NNS CC NNS IN PRP$ NN .
Interior Minister Manfred Kanther said in a statement he " welcomed the prosecution and conviction of one of the ringleaders of international neo-Nazism and biggest distributers of vicious racist publications " .	NNP NNP NNP NNP VBD IN DT NN PRP " VBD DT NN CC NN IN CD IN DT NNS IN JJ NN CC JJS NNS IN JJ JJ NNS " .
" It is high time he was behind bars , " the opposition Social Democrats said in a statement .	" PRP VBZ JJ NN PRP VBD IN NNS , " DT NN NNP NNPS VBD IN DT NN .
Lauck , dressed in a sober blue suit and sporting his trademark Hitleresque black moustache , showed no sign of emotion as Bertram spent more than an hour reading out the verdict and explaining the court 's decision .	NNP , VBN IN DT JJ JJ NN CC NN PRP$ NN NNP JJ NN , VBD DT NN IN NN IN NNP VBD JJR IN DT NN VBG RP DT NN CC VBG DT NN POS NN .
But as Lauck was about to be led away , he turned to reporters and blurted out a virtually incomprehensible quick-fire diatribe against the court .	CC IN NN VBD IN TO VB VBN RB , PRP VBD TO NNS CC VBD RP DT RB NN NN NN IN DT NN .
" Neither the National Socialists ( Nazis ) nor the communists dared to kidnap an American citizen , " he shouted , in an oblique reference to his extradition to Germany from Denmark . "	" DT DT NNP NNPS ( NNPS ) CC DT NNS VBD TO VB DT JJ NN , " PRP VBD , IN DT JJ NN TO PRP$ NN TO NNP IN NNP . "
That 's the truth . "	DT VBZ DT NN . "
His attorney , Hans-Otto Sieg , told reporters outside the courtroom that the judges had not explained how a German court could judge someone for actions carried out in the United States .	PRP$ NN , NNP NNP , VBD NNS IN DT NN IN DT NNS VBD RB VBD WRB DT JJ NN MD VB NN IN NNS VBD RP IN DT NNP NNP .
Bertram said Lauck was obsessed by Nazism and devoted his life to leading his National Socialist German Workers ' Party Foreign Organisation ( NSDAP-AO ) , which derives its name from the full German title of Hitler 's Nazi party .	NNP VBD NN VBD VBN IN NNP CC VBD PRP$ NN TO VBG PRP$ NNP NNP NNP NNPS POS NNP NNP NNP ( NNP ) , WDT VBZ PRP$ NN IN DT JJ JJ NN IN NNP POS NNP NN .
During the three-month trial , the court dealt mainly with issues of the NSDAP-AO 's " NS Kampfruf " ( " National Socialist Battle Cry " ) magazine , filled with references to Aryan supremacy and defamatory statements about Jews .	IN DT JJ NN , DT NN VBN RB IN NNS IN DT NNP POS " NNP NNP " ( " NNP NNP NNP NNP " ) NN , VBN IN NNS TO JJ NN CC JJ NNS IN NNPS .
The court rejected Sieg 's argument that Lauck 's extradition from Denmark , where he was arrested in March last year at the request of German authorities , was illegal .	DT NN VBD NNP POS NN IN NNP POS NN IN NNP , WRB PRP VBD VBN IN NNP JJ NN IN DT NN IN JJ NNS , VBD JJ .
Lauck was also convicted of disseminating the symbols of anti-constitutional organisations .	NN VBD RB VBN IN VBG DT NNS IN JJ NNS .
He will probably be free in around two and a half years .	PRP MD RB VB JJ IN IN CD CC DT NN NNS .
The court ruled that the 15 months he has spent in custody since his arrest should be subtracted from his prison term .	DT NN VBD IN DT CD NNS PRP VBZ VBN IN NN IN PRP$ NN MD VB VBN IN PRP$ NN NN .

Ukraine hails peace as marks five-year independence .	NNP VBZ NN IN NNS JJ NN .
Rostislav Khotin	NNP NNP
KIEV 1996-08-23	NNP CD
Ukraine celebrates five years of independence from Kremlin rule on Saturday , hailing civil and inter-ethnic peace as its main post-Soviet achievement .	NNP VBZ CD NNS IN NN IN NNP NN IN NNP , VBG JJ CC JJ NN IN PRP$ JJ JJ NN .
Ukraine 's declaration of independence in 1991 , backed nine-to-one by a referendum in December of that year , effectively dealt a death blow to the Soviet empire and ended more than three centuries of rule from Moscow .	NNP POS NN IN NN IN CD , VBD RB IN DT NN IN NNP IN DT NN , RB VBN DT NN NN TO DT JJ NN CC VBD JJR IN CD NNS IN NN IN NNP .
Ukraine , with a Russian community of 11 million people -- the world 's largest outside Russia -- has avoided conflicts like those in Russia 's Chechnya , neighbouring Moldova , and the former Soviet republics of Georgia , Azerbaijan and Tajikistan .	NNP , IN DT JJ NN IN CD CD NNS : DT NN POS JJS IN NNP : VBZ VBN NNS IN DT IN NNP POS NNP , VBG NNP , CC DT JJ JJ NNS IN NNP , NNP CC NNP .
" Ukraine 's biggest achievements for five years are the preservation of civil peace and inter-ethnic harmony , " President Leonid Kuchma said in televised statement this week .	" NNP POS JJS NNS IN CD NNS VBP DT NN IN JJ NN CC JJ NN , " NNP NNP NNP VBD IN VBN NN DT NN .
" Unlike many other post-Soviet countries we were able to deal with conflict situations in a peaceful and civilised way . "	" IN JJ JJ JJ NNS PRP VBD JJ TO VB IN NN NNS IN DT JJ CC JJ NN . "
But independence was initially accompanied by hyper-inflation and economic collapse , although there are signs of a turnaround .	CC NN VBD RB VBN IN NN CC JJ NN , IN EX VBP NNS IN DT NN .
Inflation -- a hyper-inflationary 10,300 percent a year in 1993 -- was a respectable 0.1 percent a month in June and July and the economy has just begun to grow .	NN : DT JJ CD NN DT NN IN CD : VBD DT JJ CD NN DT NN IN NNP CC NNP CC DT NN VBZ RB VBN TO VB .
Kuchma told a solemn ceremony at the Ukraina Palace on Friday that " there was a turning point " in reforms and that he expected a rise in the standard of living in the near future . " There is no doubt that economic growth has already started , " said Adelbert Knobl , head of the International Monetary Fund 's mission in Ukraine . "	" EX VBZ DT NN IN JJ NN VBZ RB VBN , " VBD NNP NNP , NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP POS NN IN NNP . "
The national bank and the government have every reason to be proud of their efforts . "	DT JJ NN CC DT NN VBP DT NN TO VB JJ IN PRP$ NNS . "
Central bank officials said on Thursday that a much-postponed hryvna currency would " definitely " be introduced before the end of this year .	JJ NN NNS VBD IN NNP IN DT JJ NN NN MD " RB " VB VBN IN DT NN IN DT NN .
It will replace the interim karbovanets currency , which was introduced at par to the Russian rouble in 1992 but now trades at almost 33 karbovanets per rouble .	PRP MD VB DT JJ NNS NN , WDT VBD VBN IN NN TO DT JJ VB IN CD CC RB VBZ IN RB CD NNS IN JJ .
Ukraine has repeatedly promised to introduce the hryvna but had to postpone the plans because of economic problems .	NNP VBZ RB VBD TO VB DT NN CC VBD TO VB DT NNS IN IN JJ NNS .
Proud of its record in promptly joining both the Council of Europe and NATO 's Partnership for Peace , Ukraine caused a foreign policy wrangle this week , offending China by allowing a Taiwanese minister to appear on a public , if unofficial visit . China cancelled a visit by a top-level delegation in protest .	NNP VBD DT NN IN DT JJ NN IN NN .
Kiev 's Foreign Minister Hennady Udovenko said Beijing was overreacting .	NNP POS NNP NNP NNP NNP VBD NNP VBD VBG .
But Ukraine , seeing itself as a bridge between Russia and the rapidly Westernising countries of eastern Europe , is looking West as well as East .	CC NNP , VBG PRP IN DT NN IN NNP CC DT RB VBG NNS IN JJ NNP , VBZ VBG NNP RB RB IN NNP .
" The strategic aim of European integration should not in any way damage Ukraine 's interests in post-Soviet areas .	" DT JJ NN IN JJ NN MD RB IN DT NN NN NNP POS NNS IN NN NNS .
Relations with Russia , which is our main partner , have great importance , " Kuchma said .	NNS IN NNP , WDT VBZ PRP$ JJ NN , VBP JJ NN , " NNP VBD .
" But Ukraine cannot be economically oriented on Russia , even though those in some circles push us to do that . "	" CC NNP MD VB RB VBN RP NNP , RB IN DT IN DT NNS VBP PRP TO VB DT . "
Kuchma has said Kiev wants membership of the European Union , associate membership of the Western European Union defence grouping and to move closer to NATO .	NNP VBZ VBN NNP VBZ NN IN DT NNP NNP , JJ NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP VBP VBG CC TO VB RBR TO NNP .

Russia to clamp down on barter deals .	NN TO VB RP IN JJR NNS .
MOSCOW 1996-08-23	RB CD
Russian officials , keen to cut capital flight , will adopt tight measures to cut barter deals in foreign trade to a minimum , a customs official said on Friday .	JJ NNS , JJ TO VB NN NN , MD VB JJ NNS TO VB NN NNS IN JJ NN TO DT NN , DT NNS NN VBD IN NNP .
" We have always been concerned about barter deals with other countries , viewing them as a disguised kind of capital flight from Russia , " Marina Volkova , deputy head of the currency department at the State Customs Committee , told Reuters .	" PRP VBP RB VBN VBN IN JJR NNS IN JJ NNS , VBG PRP IN DT JJ NN IN NN NN IN NNP , " NNP NNP , JJ NN IN DT NN NN IN DT NNP NNPS NNP , VBD NNP .
Volkova said last year goods had been exported under many Russian barter deals , with nothing imported in return .	NNP VBD JJ NN NNS VBD VBN VBN IN JJ JJ NN NNS , IN NN VBN IN NN .
She said the cost of such unimported goods was $ 1.10 billion in 1995 .	PRP VBD DT NN IN JJ JJ NNS VBD $ CD CD IN CD .
Barter deals were worth $ 4.9 billion last year , or about eight percent of all Russian exports estimated at $ 61.5 billion , she said .	NN NNS VBD JJ $ CD CD JJ NN , CC IN CD NN IN DT JJ NNS VBN IN $ CD CD , PRP VBD .
" The cost of exported goods is too often understated , so the actual share of barter deals in Russian exports and the amount of unimported goods may be even higher , " Volkova said .	" DT NN IN VBN NNS VBZ RB RB VBD , IN DT JJ NN IN JJR NNS IN JJ NNS CC DT NN IN JJ NNS MD VB RB JJR , " NNP VBD .
A few days ago Russian President Boris Yeltsin issued a decree on state regulation of foreign barter deals , and Volkova said this " could substantially improve the situation " .	DT JJ NNS RB JJ NNP NNP NNP VBD DT NN IN NN NN IN JJ NN NNS , CC NNP VBD DT " MD RB VB DT NN " .
In line with the decree , which will come into force on November 1 , all Russian barter traders will be obliged to import goods worth the cost of their exports within 180 days .	IN NN IN DT NN , WDT MD VB IN NN IN NNP CD , DT JJ NN NNS MD VB VBN TO VB NNS JJ DT NN IN PRP$ NNS IN CD NNS .
" If traders are late , they will have to pay fines worth the cost of their exported goods , " Volkova said .	" IN NNS VBP JJ , PRP MD VB TO VB NNS JJ DT NN IN PRP$ JJ NNS , " NNP VBD .
Understating the cost of exported goods could still be a loophole for barter dealers , but Volkova said the authorities are currently " tackling the technicalities of the issue " .	VBG DT NN IN VBN NNS MD RB VB DT NN IN JJR NNS , CC NNP VBD DT NNS VBP RB " VBG DT NNS IN DT NN " .
Barter has always been a feature of the Soviet Union 's foreign trade , but Yeltsin 's decrees liberalising foreign trade in 1991-1992 has given barter a new impetus .	JJ VBZ RB VBN DT NN IN DT NNP NNP POS JJ NN , CC NNP POS VBZ VBG JJ NN IN NN VBZ VBN VB DT JJ NN .
A few years ago , barter deals accounted for up to 25-30 percent of Russian exports because " thousands ( of ) trade companies which popped up preferred barter in the absence of reliable Russian banks and money transfer systems " , Volkova said .	DT JJ NNS RB , NN NNS VBD IN IN TO CD NN IN JJ NNS IN " NNS ( IN ) VB NNS WDT VBD RP JJ NN IN DT NN IN JJ JJ NNS CC NN NN NNS " , NNP VBD .
" Now many Russian banks are strong and can make various sorts of money tranfers , while incompetent traders are being ousted by more experienced ones .	" RB DT JJ NNS VBP JJ CC MD VB JJ NNS IN NN NNS , IN JJ NNS VBP VBG VBN IN JJR VBD NNS .
But the current share of barter deals in Russian exports is still high , " she said .	CC DT JJ NN IN JJR NNS IN JJ NNS VBZ RB JJ , " PRP VBD .

we thought it would be fun to have ( the name ) on the inside of his shirt , " a spokesman for the sponsors said .	PRP VBD PRP MD VB NN TO VB ( DT NN ) IN DT NN IN PRP$ NN , " DT NN IN DT NNS VBD .
" It will give the fans something else to look at besides his chest . "	" PRP MD VB DT NNS NN RB TO VB IN IN PRP$ NN . "

Promising 10th-ranked American Chanda Rubin has pulled out of the U.S. Open Tennis Championships with a wrist injury , tournament officials announced .	VBG JJ NNP NNP NNP VBZ VBN IN IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP IN DT NN NN , NN NNS VBD .
The 20-year-old Rubin , who was to be seeded 11th , is still suffering from tendinitis of the right wrist that has kept her sidelined in recent months .	DT NN NNP , WP VBD TO VB VBN JJ , VBZ RB VBG IN NNS IN DT JJ NN WDT VBZ VBN PRP$ VBN IN JJ NNS .
Rubin 's misfortune turned into a very lucky break for eighth-seeded Olympic champion Lindsay Davenport .	NNP POS NN VBD IN DT RB JJ NN IN JJ JJ NN NNP NNP .
Davenport had drawn one of the toughest first-round assignments of any of the seeded players in 17th-ranked Karina Habsudova of Slovakia .	NNP VBD VBN CD IN DT JJS JJ NNS IN DT IN DT VBN NNS IN JJ NNP NNP IN NNP .
But as the highest-ranked non-seeded player in the tournament , Habsudova will be moved into Rubin 's slot in the draw , while Davenport will now get a qualifier in the first round , according to U.S. Tennis Association officials .	CC IN DT JJ JJ NN IN DT NN , NNP MD VB VBN IN NNP POS NN IN DT NN , IN NNP MD RB VB DT NN IN DT JJ NN , VBG TO NNP NNP NNP NNS .
Rubin is the third notable withdrawal from the women 's competition after 12th-ranked former Australian Open champion Mary Pierce and 20th-ranked Wimbledon semifinalist Meredith McGrath pulled out earlier this week with injuries . Adrian Warner	NNP NNP
BRUSSELS 1996-08-23	NNP CD
Russia 's double Olympic champion Svetlana Masterkova smashed her second world record in just 10 days on Friday when she bettered the mark for the women 's 1,000 metres .	NNP POS JJ JJ NN NNP NNP VBD PRP$ JJ NN NN IN RB CD NNS IN NNP WRB PRP VBD DT NN IN DT NNS POS CD NNS .
After breaking the world record for the women 's mile in Zurich last Wednesday , the Olympic 800 and 1,500 metres champion clocked two minutes 28.98 seconds over 1,000 at the Brussels grand prix meeting .	IN VBG DT NN NN IN DT NNS POS NN IN NNP JJ NNP , DT JJ CD CC CD NNS VBP VBN CD NNS CD NNS IN CD IN DT NNP JJ JJ NN .
The Russian ate up the ground in a swift last lap to shave 0.36 seconds off the previous best of 2:29.34 set by Mozambique 's Maria Mutola in the same stadium in August last year .	DT NNPS VBD RP DT NN IN DT NN JJ NN TO VB CD NNS IN DT JJ JJS IN CD NN IN NNP POS NNP NNP IN DT JJ NN IN NNP JJ NN .
Former world 800 champion Mutola pushed Masterkova all the way , finishing second in 2:29.66 .	JJ NN CD NN NNP VBD NNP PDT DT NN , VBG JJ IN CD .
But it was the Russian who picked up the bonus of $ 25,000 for the historic run in front of a capacity 40,000 crowd .	CC PRP VBD DT NNP WP VBD RP DT NN IN $ CD IN DT JJ NN IN NN IN DT NN CD NN .
Masterkova dominated the middle-distance races at the recent Atlanta Games following her return to competition this season after a three-year maternity break .	NN VBD DT NN NNS IN DT JJ NNP NNPS VBG PRP$ NN TO VB DT NN IN DT JJ NN NN .
In her first mile race at the richest meeting in Zurich last Wednesday , she slashed 3.05 seconds off the previous record .	IN PRP$ JJ NN NN IN DT JJS NN IN NNP JJ NNP , PRP VBD CD NNS IN DT JJ NN .
The record of four minutes , 12.56 seconds in Zurich earned Masterkova a bonus of $ 50,000 plus one kilo of gold .	DT NN IN CD NNS , CD NNS IN NNP VBD NNP DT NN IN $ CD CC CD NNS IN NN .
After Friday 's performance the Russian will have earned well over $ 100,000 in less than a fortnight , taking her appearance money into account .	IN NNP POS NN DT JJ MD VB VBN RB IN $ CD IN JJR IN DT NN , VBG PRP$ NN NN IN NN .
Brussels organisers had laid a new track for the meeting comparable to the surface at the Atlanta Games but put down on a softer surface .	NNP NNS VBD VBN DT JJ NN IN DT NN JJ TO DT NN IN DT NNP NNPS CC VB RP IN DT JJR NN .
Masterkova clearly enjoyed it .	NN RB VBD PRP .

Johnson ran the same time at the U.S. Olympic trials in Atlanta in June to become the second equal fastest hurdler of all time with American Roger Kingdom .	NNP VBD DT JJ NN IN DT NNP NNP NNS IN NNP IN NNP TO VB DT JJ JJ JJS NN IN DT NN IN NNP NNP NNP .

JORNAL DE ANGOLA	JJ NNP NNP
- The Angolan Chief of State addressed a letter to UN Security Council proposing dates for the conclusion of the peace process in Angola .	: NNP JJ NNP IN NNP VBD DT NN TO NNP NNP NNP VBG NNS IN DT NN IN DT NN NN IN NNP .
He proposed definite dates , August 25 for return of Unita generals to the joint army , September 5 for the beginning of the formation of the Government of National Unity and Reconciliation .	PRP VBD JJ NNS , NNP CD IN NN IN JJ NNS TO DT JJ NN , NNP CD IN DT NN IN DT NN IN DT NNP IN NNP NNP CC NNP .
Until this date the free circulation of peoples and goods should be guaranteed , the government administration installed in all areas and the Unita deputies should occupy their places in the National Assembly .	IN DT NN DT JJ NN IN NNS CC NNS MD VB VBN , DT NN NN VBN IN DT NNS CC DT NNP NNS MD VB PRP$ NNS IN DT NNP NNP .
The president justified his proposal by the delays verified in the peace process , including the fact that areas under Unita control or occupation have not been effectively demilitarised , where the Unita military forces have been substituted by their so-called police . Colombia , U.S. reach aviation agreement .	NNP , NNP NN NN NN .
MIAMI 1996-08-23	NNP CD
The U.S. and Colombian governments reached an agreement that will allow AMR Corp 's American Airlines to operate three round-trip flights between New York and Bogota , the Department of Transportation said Friday .	DT NNP CC JJ NNS VBD DT NN WDT MD VB NNP NNP POS NNP NNP TO VB CD JJ NNS IN NNP NNP CC NNP , DT NNP IN NNP VBD NNP .
Under the agreement , which followed talks in Miami this week , AMR also will be allowed to shift up to four of the weekly flights it now operates between Miami and Colombia to its New York gateway . The United States also will be able to designate one new all-cargo carrier for service between the two nations after two years .	DT NNP NNP RB MD VB JJ TO VB CD JJ NN NN IN NN IN DT CD NNS IN CD NNS .
Colombia was permitted to add a single additional round-trip flight to its current New York service , although it will not be able to do so while under Category Two ( Conditional ) status under the Federal Aviation Administration 's International Aviation Safety program . Colombia would be allowed to add new service when its safety assessment has been improved , the department said .	NNP MD VB VBN TO VB JJ NN WRB PRP$ NN NN VBZ VBN VBN , DT NN VBD .
With the exception of the new services just agreed to , the governments of the two nations have agreed to maintain their current level of routes and airlines for the next 2-1/2 years , the agreement said . The agreement resolved a dispute that arose in June when Colombia turned down American 's request to operate flights between New York and Bogota , a denial that prompted the United States to charge that the Colombians were breaking a bilateral aviation agreement and to propose sanctions against one of two Colombian airlines , Avianca and ACES . Soccer - Arab team breaks new ground in Israel .	JJR : JJ NN VBZ JJ NN IN NNP .
Ori Lewis	NNP NNP
TAIBE , Israel 1996-08-23	NNPS , NNP CD
For the first time in Israeli history , an Arab team will take the field when the National League soccer season starts on Saturday .	IN DT JJ NN IN JJ NN , DT JJ NN MD VB DT NN WRB DT NNP NNP NN NN VBZ IN NNP .
Hapoel Taibe fields four Jewish players and two foreign imports -- a Pole and a Romanian .	NNP NNP NNS CD JJ NNS CC CD JJ NNS : DT NNP CC DT NNP .
The rest of the side is made up mainly of Moslem Arabs .	DT NN IN DT NN VBZ VBN RP RB IN NNP NNPS .
The club , founded in 1961 , has a loyal following in Taibe , an Arab town of 28,000 in the heart of Israel .	DT NN , VBN IN CD , VBZ DT JJ NN IN NNP , DT JJ NN IN CD IN DT NN IN NNP .
But away from their home ground , they face unfriendly crowds who taunt the players with racist abuse .	CC RB IN PRP$ NN NN , PRP VBP JJ NNS WP VBP DT NNS IN JJ NN .
" The very first thing we thought about after we knew we would be promoted was the game against Betar Jerusalem , " said Taibe supporter Karem Haj Yihye .	" DT RB JJ NN PRP VBD IN IN PRP VBD PRP MD VB VBN VBD DT NN IN NNP NNP , " VBD NNP NN NNP NNP NNP .
Two weeks ago Taibe , coached by Pole Wojtek Lazarek , met Betar , a club closely associated with the right-wing Likud party , for the first time in a Cup match in Jerusalem .	CD NNS RB NNP , VBN IN NNP NNP NNP , VBD NNP , DT NN RB VBN IN DT JJ NNP NN , IN DT JJ NN IN DT NNP NN IN NNP .
Chants from the crowd of " Death to the Arabs " , and bottle-throwing during the game marred the match which ended in a goalless draw .	NNS IN DT NN IN " NNP TO DT NNPS " , CC JJ IN DT NN VBN DT NN WDT VBD IN DT JJ NN .
One Taibe supporter required hospital treatment for cuts and bruises after a stone struck his head as he was driving from the stadium .	CD NNP NN VBD NN NN IN NNS CC NNS IN DT NN VBD PRP$ NN IN PRP VBD VBG IN DT NN .
" We 're used to hearing the taunts of " Death to the Arabs ' , " said Sameh Haj Yihye , a Taibe resident who studies at Jerusalem 's Hebrew University . "	" PRP VBP VBN TO NN DT NNS IN " NNP TO DT NNPS POS , " VBD NNP NNP NNP , DT NNP NN WP VBZ IN NNP POS NNP NNP . "
But we know that these are only words , nobody has died from hearing them and it only makes us support our team more vehemently . "	CC PRP VBP IN DT VBP RB NNS , NN VBZ VBN IN VBG PRP CC PRP RB VBZ PRP VBP PRP$ NN RBR RB . "
The dusty town of Taibe lacks the amenities of Jewish communities and many Israeli Arabs have long complained of state discrimination .	DT JJ NN IN NN VBZ DT NNS IN JJ NNS CC JJ JJ NNPS VBP RB VBN IN NN NN .
" There are no parks or empty areas of land around here , so when we want to play a friendly game of soccer we all load up in the car and travel to Tel Aviv , " 60 km ( 36 miles ) away , Sameh Haj Yihye said . The town 's ramshackle 2,500-seat ground is accessible only by two dirt tracks .	DT NN POS JJ JJ NN VBZ JJ RB IN CD NN NNS .
" We plan to build a 10,000-seat stadium , but it may well be situated elsewhere , " said club chairman Abdul Rahman Haj Yihye . "	" PRP VBP TO VB DT JJ NN , CC PRP MD RB VB VBN RB , " VBD NN NN NNP NNP NNP NNP . "
We will discuss this with the mayor and hopefully a new or refurbished ground will be completed by the start of the new year . "	PRP MD VB DT IN DT NN CC RB DT JJ CC VBN NN MD VB VBN IN DT NN IN DT JJ NN . "
In the meantime , Taibe will play all their heavily policed home matches at the Jewish coastal town of Netanya .	IN DT NN , NNP MD VB DT PRP$ RB VBN NN NNS IN DT JJ JJ NN IN NNP .
" We are Israelis , there is no question about that , " said Karem Haj Yihye , a hotel waiter .	" PRP VBP NNPS , EX VBZ DT NN IN DT , " VBD NNP NNP NNP , DT NN NN .
" We do n't have any connection with the Palestinians , they live over there , " he said , pointing to the West Bank seven km ( four miles ) to the east .	" PRP VBP RB VB DT NN IN DT NNPS , PRP VBP IN RB , " PRP VBD , VBG TO DT NNP NNP CD NN ( CD NNS ) TO DT JJ .
" We do n't feel our club represents Palestinian Arabs , " said club chairman Abdul Rahman . "	" PRP VBP RB VB PRP$ NN VBZ JJ NNPS , " VBD NN NN NNP NNP . "

ZAGREB 1996-08-23	NNP CD
Saboteurs blew up a Serb orthodox church in southern Croatia on Friday with a blast which also damaged four nearby homes , the state news agency Hina reported .	NNS VBD RP DT NNP JJ NN IN JJ NNP IN NNP IN DT NN WDT RB JJ CD JJ NNS , DT NN NN NN NNP VBD .
HINA said the church in the small village of Karin Gornji , 30 km ( 19 miles ) north of Zadar , was destroyed by the morning attack .	NNP VBD DT NN IN DT JJ NN IN NNP NNP , CD NN ( CD NNS ) RB IN NNP , VBD VBN IN DT NN NN .
It did not report any casualties .	PRP VBD RB VB DT NNS .
Zadar police said in a statement they had launched an investigation and were doing their best to find the perpetrators .	NN NN VBD IN DT NN PRP VBD VBN DT NN CC VBD VBG PRP$ JJS TO VB DT NNS .
HINA said it was the first time an orthodox church had been blown up in the Zadar hinterland , where a large number of Serbs lived before the 1991 war over Croatia 's independence from the Yugoslav federation . The area was part of the self-styled state of Krajina proclaimed by minority Serbs in 1991 and recaptured by the Croatian army last year .	DT NN VBD NN IN DT JJ NN IN NNP VBD IN NN NNS IN CD CC VBD IN DT JJ NN JJ NN .
Up to 200,000 Serbs fled to Bosnia and Yugoslavia , leaving Krajina vacant and depopulated .	IN TO CD NNS VBD TO NNP CC NNP , VBG NNP JJ CC JJ .

U.S. marine biologists have trained a pair of sea lions to tag and photograph elusive whales as they cruise through the Pacific depths , New Scientist magazine reported on Thursday .	NNP NN NNS VB VBN DT NN IN NN NNS TO VB CC VB JJ NNS IN PRP VBP IN DT NNP NNS , NNP NNP NN VBD IN NNP .
James Harvey and Jennifer Hurley of the Moss Landing Marine Laboratories in California say their sea lions , natural companions of many species of whale , can go where no man or woman has ever gone before . " Any diver knows that when a whale gets going you ca n't keep up , " Harvey told the magazine . "	" DT NN VBZ IN WRB DT NN VBZ VBG PRP MD RB VB RP , " NNP VBD DT NN . "
That is why we know only about five percent of what whales do . "	DT VBZ WRB PRP VBP RB IN CD NN IN WDT NNS VBP . "
The sea lions -- 17-year-old Beaver and nine-year-old Sake -- have undergone six years of training for their mission .	DT NN NNS : JJ NNP CC JJ FW : VBP VBN CD NNS IN NN IN PRP$ NN .
Beaver once worked for the U.S. Navy and Sake is an amusement park veteran .	NNP RB VBD IN DT NNP NNP CC FW VBZ DT NN NN NN .
Harvey said they could accurately tag whales with a radio transmitter , and could also swim all the way around one of the giant mammals , filming it with a video camera .	NNP VBD PRP MD RB VB NNS IN DT NN NN , CC MD RB VB PDT DT NN IN CD IN DT NN NNS , VBG PRP IN DT NN NN .
Their first assignment , later this year , will be documenting humpback whale migration off Monterey , California .	PRP$ JJ NN , RB DT NN , MD VB VBG JJ NN NN IN NNP , NNP .
The article did not spell out exactly how the sea lions manage to tag the whales but said in training they were taught to stick a radio transmitter on to a plastic model of a whale using suction cups . China copper stocks owned by state reserve - trade .	NNP NN NNS VBN IN NN NN : VB .
Lynne O'Donnell	NNP NNP
HONG KONG 1996-08-23	IN VBG CD
Up to 100,000 tonnes of copper held in Shanghai bonded warehouses , confounding the world market as to its source and ultimate fate , probably belongs to China 's strategic state reserve , industry sources said on Friday .	IN TO CD NNS IN NN VBN IN NNP VBN NNS , VBG DT NN NN IN TO PRP$ NN CC JJ NN , RB VBZ TO NNP POS JJ NN NN , NN NNS VBD IN NNP .
Around 40,000 tonnes of the copper have already been moved to warehouses near the northern port of Yingkou , where some of the strategic stockpile was stored , they said .	IN CD NNS IN DT NN VBP RB VBN VBN TO NNS IN DT JJ NN IN NNP , WRB DT IN DT JJ NN VBD VBN , PRP VBD .
Just who owns the copper is a question that has kept traders and industry analysts guessing since the metal was channelled into Shanghai by the China National Nonferrous Metals Import and Export Corp ( CNIEC ) in June and July .	RB WP VBZ DT NN VBZ DT NN WDT VBZ VBN NNS CC NN NNS VBG IN DT NN VBD VBN IN NNP IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNPS NN CC NNP NNP ( NNP ) IN NNP CC NNP .
It was unclear whether or not the 40,000 tonnes had cleared customs -- which would provide some concrete indication that the strategic reserve , administered directly by the central government 's State Planning Commission , owned the copper .	PRP VBD JJ IN CC RB DT CD NNS VBD VBN NNS : WDT MD VB DT NN NN IN DT JJ NN , VBN RB IN DT JJ NN POS NNP NNP NNP , VBD DT NN .
Traders have said the reserve could negotiate concessions on duties -- three percent import tax and 17 percent value-added tax -- that made the copper prohibitively expensive otherwise .	NNS VBP VBN DT NN MD VB NNS IN NNS : CD NN NN NN CC CD NN JJ NN : IN VBD DT NN RB JJ RB .
But one source , the head of a Hong Kong trading house , said it made no difference if the copper was customs cleared or not .	CC CD NN , DT NN IN DT NNP NNP NN NN , VBD PRP VBD DT NN IN DT NN VBD NNS VBD CC RB .
" If they spend all this money moving the copper to Yingkou , it will be sitting there for years , " he said .	" IN PRP VBP PDT DT NN VBG DT NN TO NNP , PRP MD VB VBG EX IN NNS , " PRP VBD .
" Once it arrives in Yingkou , it is subject to monitoring by the State Planning Commission , which has to give permission for any more movement ; it is out of the hands of traders , " he said .	" RB PRP VBZ IN NNP , PRP VBZ JJ TO NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP , WDT VBZ TO VB NN IN DT JJR NN : PRP VBZ IN IN DT NNS IN NNS , " PRP VBD .
Mystery has surrounded the Shanghai stockpile in recent months , with traders unsure not only of who owns it , but of its exact size and what its owner planned to do with it .	NN VBZ VBN DT NNP NN IN JJ NNS , IN NNS JJ RB RB IN WP VBZ PRP , CC IN PRP$ JJ NN CC WP PRP$ NN VBD TO VB IN PRP .
Trading sources generally agreed it would be cost-effective to take the copper back into a depleted central reserve as it had already served its purpose in taking advantage of long-term backwardation on the London Metal Exchange ( LME ) .	NN NNS RB VBD PRP MD VB JJ TO VB DT NN RB IN DT VBN JJ NN IN PRP VBD RB VBN PRP$ NN IN VBG NN IN JJ NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP ( NNP ) .
A backwardation occurs when the spot price of a metal is higher than the forward price .	DT NN VBZ WRB DT NN NN IN DT NN VBZ JJR IN DT JJ NN .
CNIEC lent around 85,000 tonnes of copper onto the LME between April and June 1995 on behalf of the state reserve , running the state stockpile down to 115,000 tonnes from 200,000 tonnes previously .	NNP VBD IN CD NNS IN NN IN DT NNP IN NNP CC NNP CD IN NN IN DT NN NN , VBG DT NN NN IN TO CD NNS IN CD VBZ RB .
Traders in Asia said CNIEC could well have lent it to the market at around US$ 2,700 a tonne , and then paid somewhere between $ 2,200 and $ 2,400 a tonne when it started taking the metal back earlier this year .	NNS IN NNP VBD NNP MD RB VB VBN PRP TO DT NN IN IN $ CD DT NN , CC RB VBN RB IN $ CD CC $ CD DT NN WRB PRP VBD VBG DT NN RB RBR DT NN .
This would have cleared CNIEC a healthy profit , which could then have been used to finance storage and other costs .	DT MD VB VBN VBD DT JJ NN , WDT MD RB VB VBN VBN TO VB NN CC JJ NNS .
Word that CNIEC had offered the copper to European trading houses in a series of secret meetings unnerved an already jittery market .	NN IN NNP VBD VBN DT NN TO JJ NN NNS IN DT NN IN JJ NNS JJ DT RB JJ NN .
Industry analysts Bloomsbury Minerals Economics ( BME ) said on Wednesday the motivation of the owners of the 85,000 tonnes , " whoever they are , is the most important short-term fundamental " in an already tight world market . BME repeated in its latest review rumours of involvement by Sumitomo Corp , with CNIEC said to be helping the Japanese trader unload its copper positions after it revealed in June losses of $ 1.8 billion in a decade of unauthorised deals . Traders in Shanghai said on Thursday they were unaware of movements out of the Shanghai bonded warehouses .	NNS IN NNP VBD IN NNP PRP VBD JJ IN NNS IN IN DT NNP VBN NNS .

RUGBY UNION - NEW ZEALAND WIN FIRST SERIES IN SOUTH AFRICA .	NNP NN : JJ NNP NNP NNP NNP IN NNP NNP .
PRETORIA , South Africa 1996-08-24	NNP , NNP NNP CD
New Zealand made history on Saturday when they completed their first series victory in South Africa with a 33-26 victory in the second test .	NNP NNP VBD NN IN NNP WRB PRP VBN PRP$ JJ NN NN IN NNP NNP IN DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN .
The win gave the All Blacks an unbeatable 2-0 lead in the three-test series .	DT VBP VBN DT DT NNPS DT JJ CD JJ IN DT NN NN .
Each side scored three tries and the Springboks outscored the All Blacks 15-12 in the second half but still suffered a fourth successive defeat against their old enemies .	DT NN VBD CD VBZ CC DT NNP VBD DT DT NNPS CD IN DT JJ NN CC RB VBD DT JJ JJ NN IN PRP$ JJ NNS .
Two tries from wing Jeff Wilson in the first quarter gave New Zealand a 24-11 lead before tries from flanker Ruben Kruger and scrum-half Joost van der Westhuizen in the space of two minutes narrowed the gap to a single point at 23-24 .	PRP VBZ IN NN NNP NNP IN DT JJ NN VBD NNP NNP DT JJ NN IN NNS IN NN NNP NNP CC JJ NNP NNP FW FW IN DT NN IN CD NNS VBD DT NN TO DT JJ NN IN CD .
The Springboks would have gone ahead had not fly-half Joel Stransky 's conversion hit an upright and New Zealand only scrambled to safety through a fine penalty from replacement fly-half Jon Preston and a drop goal by number eight Zinzan Brooke . SOCCER - DISAPPOINTING AJAX SLUMP 2-0 AT HEERENVEEN .	NN : NNP NNP NNP CD NNP NNP .
AMSTERDAM 1996-08-24	NN CD
Dutch champions Ajax Amsterdam faltered in their second league match of the season on Saturday losing 2-0 away at Heerenveen .	JJ NNS NNP NNP VBD IN PRP$ JJ NN NN IN DT NN IN NNP VBG CD RB IN FW .
Ajax , who had a dismal series of pre-season results before beating NAC of Breda in their opening game , had the best of an entertaining first half but failed to break the deadlock .	NNP , WP VBD DT JJ NN IN JJ NNS IN VBG NNP IN NNPS IN PRP$ JJ NN , VBD DT JJS IN DT JJ JJ NN CC VBD TO VB DT NN .
Eight minutes after the interval , Heerenveen 's Romeo Wouden broke through the Amsterdam defence , left defender John Veldman standing and curled the ball beyond goalkeeper Edwin van der Sar into the Ajax net .	CD NNS IN DT NN , NNP POS NNP NNP VBD IN DT NNP VBP , VBD NN NNP NNP VBG CC VBD DT NN IN NN NNP NNP FW NNP IN DT NNP NN .
Ajax , without injured defenders Marcio Santos and Winston Bogarde and strikers Jari Litmanen and Marc Overmars , then stepped up the pace and looked certain to equalise .	NNP , IN JJ NNS NNP NNP CC NNP NNP CC NNS NNP NNP CC NNP NNP , RB VBN RP DT NN CC VBD JJ TO VB .
But they left gaps at the back and on 73 minutes Danish striker Jon Dahl Tomasson rushed out of his own half , beat the Ajax defence and lobbed van der Sar .	CC PRP VBD NNS IN DT NN CC IN CD NNS JJ NN NNP NNP NNP VBD IN IN PRP$ JJ NN , VBD DT NNP VBP CC VBD NNP FW NNP .
The defeat means Ajax 's main title contenders PSV Eindhoven , who beat the champions 3-0 in the traditional league curtain-raiser , can go three points clear of their rivals if they beat Groningen on Sunday . Adventurers start Canadian wilderness race .	NNS VBP JJ NN NN .
PEMBERTON , British Columbia 1996-08-24	NNP , NNP NNP CD
About 350 adventurers from nine countries set out on Saturday to climb , raft , bike and run in a 323-mile ( 517-km ) endurance race through the Canadian wilderness .	IN CD NNS IN CD NNS VBN RP IN NNP TO VB , NN , NN CC VB IN DT JJ ( CD ) NN NN IN DT JJ NN .
The event , called the Eco-Challenge , is part of a growing sport known as adventure racing in which competitors test their limits for days over a perilous wilderness course .	DT NN , VBD DT NNP , VBZ NN IN DT VBG NN VBN IN NN VBG IN WDT NNS NN PRP$ NNS IN NNS IN DT JJ NN NN .
" I 'm looking forward to this race .	" PRP VBP VBG RB TO DT NN .
I think it will be more physically challenging and we 'll have to go up against more diverse situations due to the terrain , " said Dr. Michael Stroud , a veteran Eco-Challenge participant .	PRP VBP PRP MD VB RBR RB JJ CC PRP MD VB TO VB RP IN RBR JJ NNS JJ TO DT NN , " VBD NNP NNP NNP , DT JJ JJ NN .
The Eco-Challenge has been staged twice before -- in Utah and Maine last year -- and is modelled on similar races overseas .	DT NN VBZ VBN VBN RB RB : IN NNP CC NNP JJ NN : CC VBZ VBN IN JJ NNS RB .
The 70 teams in this year 's race will will trek glaciers , climb mountains , whitewater raft , horseback ride , canoe and mountain bike along the grueling course .	DT CD NNS IN DT NN POS NN MD MD NN NNS , NN NNS , NN NN , NN NN , NN CC NN NN IN DT JJ NN .
This year 's race , the route of which was keep a secret until Friday evening , is being held near Pemberton , British Columbia , about 100 miles ( 160 km ) northeast of Vancouver .	DT NN POS NN , DT NN IN WDT VBD VB DT JJ IN NNP NN , VBZ VBG VBN IN NNP , NNP NNP , RB CD NNS ( CD NN ) RB IN NNP .
The area is filled with treacherous mountain peaks , ice fields and frigid waters .	DT NN VBZ VBN IN JJ NN NNS , NN NNS CC JJ NNS .
Organisers expect about two-thirds of the participants to drop out or be disqualified before the finish .	NNS VBP IN NNS IN DT NNS TO VB RP CC VB VBN IN DT NN .
The hardy ones are expected to complete the course in about six days , with first-place finishers receiving $ 10,000 in prize money .	DT JJ NNS VBP VBN TO VB DT NN IN IN CD NNS , IN JJ NNS VBG $ CD IN NN NN .
In the Eco-Challenge , competitors race in teams of five which must include both men and women .	IN DT NNP , NNS NN IN NNS IN CD WDT MD VB DT NNS CC NNS .
Team members must remain within 100 yards ( metres ) of each other at all times and finish together .	NNP NNS MD VB IN CD NNS ( NNS ) IN DT JJ IN DT NNS CC VB RB .
With racers carrying about 40 pounds ( 18 kg ) of gear on their backs , broken bones , sunstroke , dehydration and exhaustion are common .	IN NNS VBG IN CD NNS ( CD NN ) IN NN IN PRP$ NNS , JJ NNS , RB , NN CC NN VBP JJ .

with immediate effect , " it said in a statement .	IN JJ NN , " PRP VBD IN DT NN .

Public Service , Labour and Social Welfare Minister Florence Chitauro told state radio her ministry had already begun recruiting other people to replace the strikers , sub-contracting some of the work to private firms . The PSA said 80 percent of the country 's 180,000 civil servants took part in the strike which is a rare challenge to President Robert Mugabe , who has been in power since independence from Britain in 1980 . Many had taken part in the genocide that year of one million people , mostly Tutsis , and refuse to go home for fear of reprisal at the hands of the new Tutsi-dominated government in Kigali . JOHANNESBURG 1996-08-24	NN CD
A limelight-loving South African chief was in disgrace on Saturday after a prized skull he brought home from Scotland was identified as belonging not to his sacred tribal ancestor , but to a middle-aged white woman . A forensic scientist who examined the supposed skull of 19th century King Hintsa , a chief of President Nelson Mandela 's Xhosa tribe killed in battle by the British , said it was in fact the cranium of a European woman . Chief Nicholas Gcaleka , dressed in animal skins and full tribal regalia , journeyed to a wintry Scotland in February on a hugely publicised quest to find Hintsa 's skull .	NNP NNP NNP , VBN IN NN NNS CC JJ JJ NNS , VBD TO DT JJ NNP IN NNP IN DT RB JJ NN TO VB NNP POS NN .
The witchdoctor said ancestors had appeared to him in a dream and ordered him to return the head , said to have been carried off as a colonial trophy by the officer who shot and allegedly beheaded Hintsa after a battle in 1835 . But Gcaleka ran into trouble as soon as he returned to South Africa with a skull he found in a cottage in a lonely Highland forest near Inverness .	CC NNP VBD IN NN RB RB IN PRP VBD TO NNP NNP IN DT NN PRP VBD IN DT NN IN DT JJ NNP NN IN NNS .
He said the spirit of a hurricane had guided him there .	PRP VBD DT NN IN DT NN VBD VBN PRP RB .
Members of the Xhosa royal family , branding Gcaleka a charlatan , confiscated the head and sent it for tests to a forensic scientist , who examined the shape of the skull and the hole that he determined had not come , as supposed , from a bullet . Internet Startup , which opened its doors with about half a dozen initial employees , combines experience at JavaSoft , Apple Computer Inc. , and Oracle Systems .	NNP NNP , WDT VBD PRP$ NNS IN RB PDT DT NN JJ NNS , VBZ NN IN NNP , NNP NNP NNP , CC NNP NNP .
" Java portends dramatic changes in the way we use the Internet , " said Hong Bui , vice president of engineering of the new company after serving as a senior engineer at JavaSoft .	" NNP VBZ JJ NNS IN DT NN PRP VBP DT NN , " VBD NNP NNP , NN NN IN NN IN DT JJ NN IN VBG IN DT JJ NN IN NNP .
Java is a computer programming language introduced by Sun Microsystems in mid-1995 which has immediately captured the attention of the industry for its ability to operate across virtually all computer system in a relatively secure manner .	NNP VBZ DT NN NN NN VBN IN NNP NNPS IN NN WDT VBZ RB VBD DT NN IN DT NN IN PRP$ NN TO VB IN RB DT NN NN IN DT RB VB NN .

Java has been licensed by nearly 50 organisations , ranging from Microsoft Corp. and International Business Machines Corp. to the Taiwan government .	NNP VBZ VBN VBN IN RB CD NNS , VBG IN NNP NNP CC NNP NNP NNPS NNP TO DT NNP NN .
Prasad Wagle , another former senior JavaSoft engineer who is among the founding engineers at Internet Startup , said the new company aims to build software infrastructure using Java to make networked applications ubiquitious . One feature of the Java language is that small software programmes , known as " applets " because they are small applications , can be downloaded from the server computers at the centre of networks onto individual computers for use .	CD NN IN DT NNP NN VBZ DT JJ NN NNS , VBN IN " NNS " IN PRP VBP JJ NNS , MD VB VBN IN DT NN NNS IN DT NN IN NNS IN JJ NNS IN NN .
In this model , individual computer users can always gain access to the latest programmes and do not need to store more software than they are currently using on their computers at any one time , also saving costs of memory and storage . MOTORCYCLING - JAPANESE WIN BOTH ROUND NINE SUPERBIKE RACES .	VBG : JJ NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP .
SUGO , Japan 1996-08-25	NNP , NNP CD
Teenager Yuuichi Takeda , racing in only his first season , outclassed the big names to win the first race in round nine of the world superbike championship on Sunday .	NNP NNP NNP , VBG IN RB PRP$ JJ NN , VBD DT JJ NNS TO VB DT JJ NN IN JJ CD IN DT NN NN NN IN NNP .
Takeda , 18 , showed poise far beyond his years to overtake Australian Ducati rider Troy Corser , last year 's championship runner-up , with four of the 25 laps left .	NNP , CD , VBD NN RB IN PRP$ NNS TO VB NNP NNP NN NNP NNP , JJ NN POS NN NN , IN CD IN DT CD NNS VBD .
Honda 's Takeda was pursued past Corser by the Yamaha duo of Noriyuki Haga and Wataru Yoshikawa with Haga briefly taking the lead in the final chicane on the last lap .	NNP POS NNP VBD VBN IN NNP IN DT NNP NN IN NNP NNP CC NNP NNP IN NNP RB VBG DT NN IN DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN .
But Takeda found one more spurt of power to just take the flag first with Haga second and Yoshikawa third .	CC NNP VBD CD JJR NN IN NN TO RB VB DT NN RB IN NNP NN CC NNP NN .
Haga had the consolation of recording the fastest lap at 147.159 kph .	NN VBD DT NN IN VBG DT JJS NN IN CD NN .
Corser , who crashed during practice on Friday , limped in fourth , four seconds behind Takeda with championship leader Aaron Slight of New Zealand 11 seconds behind the winner .	RB , WP VBD IN NN IN NNP , VBN IN JJ , CD NNS IN NNP IN NN NN NNP NNP IN NNP NNP CD NNS IN DT NN .
In the second race , Takeda again challenged strongly until the fifth lap from the end when he crashed while running second to eventual race winner Takuma Aoki .	IN DT JJ NN , NNP RB VBD RB IN DT JJ NN IN DT NN WRB PRP VBD IN VBG JJ TO JJ NN NN NNP NNP .
Aoki , the elder brother of reigning 125cc world champion Haruchika , had a race-long duel with John Kocinski of the United States on a Ducati before taking the chequered flag .	NNP , DT JJR NN IN VBG CD NN NN NNP , VBD DT JJ NN IN NNP NNP IN DT NNP NNP IN DT NNP IN VBG DT VBN NN .
Kocinski led for the early laps before he was passed first by Aoki , who recorded the fastest lap of 147.786 kph , and then by Takeda .	NNP VBD IN DT JJ NNS IN PRP VBD VBN RB IN NNP , WP VBN DT JJS NN IN CD NNS , CC RB IN NNP .
With Takeda out of the race , Kocinski regained second place but he could not overtake Aoki .	IN NNP IN IN DT NN , NNP VBD JJ NN CC PRP MD RB VB NNP .
Haga again was the unlucky rider finishing third ahead of Slight with Corser in 10th place .	NNP RB VBD DT JJ NN VBG JJ RB IN NNP IN NNP IN JJ NN .
But the strong showing by the Japanese riders did not alter the championship table with Slight still leading on 280 points , followed by Corser with 269 and Kocinski with 254 .	CC DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NNS VBD RB VB DT NN NN IN NNP RB VBG IN CD NNS , VBN IN NNP IN CD CC NNP IN CD .

CRICKET - RUN-OUT GIVES LEWIS AND ENGLAND SLIM SATISFACTION .	NNP : NNP VBZ NNS CC NNP VBD NNP .
LONDON 1996-08-25	NNP CD
Chris Lewis did his best to forget his controversial omission from the England one-day squad on Sunday but could not prevent Pakistan reasserting their dominance in the final test at The Oval .	NNP NNP VBD PRP$ JJS TO VB PRP$ JJ NN IN DT NNP JJ NN IN NNP CC MD RB VB NNP VBG PRP$ NN IN DT JJ NN IN DT JJ .
A super piece of fielding by Lewis , dropped as a disciplinary measure after arriving only 35 minutes before the start on the fourth morning , provided the only bright spot for England as the touring team batted on to reach 413 for five at the interval , a lead of 87 .	DT JJ NN IN VBG IN NNP , VBD IN DT JJ NN IN VBG RB CD NNS IN DT NN IN DT JJ NN , VBD DT RB JJ NN IN NNP IN DT NN NN VBD RP TO VB CD IN CD IN DT NN , DT NN IN CD .
The solitary wicket to fall was Asif Mujtaba , run out for 13 attempting a second run to third man where Lewis was lurking with a point to prove .	DT JJ NN TO VB VBD NNP NNP , VB RP IN CD VBG DT JJ NN TO JJ NN WRB NNP VBD VBG IN DT NN TO VB .
There seemed scant danger until the Surrey player swooped on to the ball and returned off balance to county team mate Alec Stewart who whipped off the bails .	RB VBN JJ NN IN DT NNP NN VBD IN TO DT NN CC VBD RP NN TO NN NN NN NNP NNP WP VBD RP DT NNS .
Lewis , though , could not make similar waves with the ball as Salim Malik and Wasim Akram batted through the rest of the session with few alarms .	NNP , RB , MD RB VB JJ NNS IN DT NN IN NNP NNP CC NNP NNP VBD IN DT NN IN DT NN IN JJ NNS .
Wasim rattled along to 30 not out , outscoring his partner who was unbeaten on 24 at the break , although the weather was again threatening to play the dominant role .	JJ JJ IN TO CD RB RP , VBG PRP$ NN WP VBD JJ IN CD IN DT NN , IN DT NN VBD RB VBG TO VB DT JJ NN .
Rain arrived just as the players left the field for lunch , forcing the ground-staff into action yet again .	NN VBD RB IN DT NNS VBD DT NN IN NN , VBG DT NN IN NN RB RB .
The weather delayed the resumption for over an hour , the umpires finally announcing play would start again at 1445 local time ( 1345 GMT ) .	DT NN VBD DT NN IN IN DT NN , DT NNS RB VBG NN MD VB RB IN CD JJ NN ( CD NNP ) .

BASEBALL - ORIOLES SNEAK PAST ANGELS .	NNP : NNP NN NNP NNP .
BALTIMORE 1996-08-25	VB CD
Rafael Palmeiro 's two-out single in the sixth inning scored Roberto Alomar with the go-ahead run as the Baltimore Orioles rallied past the California Angels 5-4 and took over the American League 's wild-card berth on Saturday . BASEBALL - BRAVES RALLY TO BEAT CUBS .	NNP : NNS VBD TO NN NNS .
ATLANTA 1996-08-25	NNP CD
Fred McGriff went 5-for-5 and homered twice , including a three-run blast with two out in the bottom of the ninth inning that lifted the Atlanta Braves to a 6-5 victory over the Chicago Cubs on Saturday . ZURICH 1996-08-25	WDT CD
Andrea Ferrigato of Italy sprinted to his second cycling World Cup win in successive weekends with victory in the Swiss Grand Prix on Sunday .	NNP NNP IN NNP VBD TO PRP$ JJ NN NNP NNP VB IN JJ NNS IN NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP IN NNP .

All three clocked the same time of five hours 51 minutes , 52 seconds .	DT CD VBN DT JJ NN IN CD NNS CD NNS , CD NNS .
Former world champion Lance Armstrong of the United States was in front as the leading pack of seven riders turned into the Oerlikon velodrome for the final one lap sprint but quickly faded and settled for fourth . AMSTERDAM 1996-08-25	NN CD
Dutch soccer captain Danny Blind has decided to end his international career , Ajax spokesman David Endt said on Sunday .	JJ NN NN NNP NNP VBZ VBN TO VB PRP$ JJ NN , NNP NN NNP NNP VBD IN NNP .
Endt told Dutch news agency ANP that Blind , 35 , would no longer be available for selection for the national squad .	NNP VBD JJ NN NN NNP IN NNP , CD , MD RB RB VB JJ IN NN IN DT JJ NN .
The Ajax defender , who led the Netherlands into the quarter-finals at June 's European championship finals in England , had decided to devote his attention to playing for his Amsterdam club , Endt said . Blind , who played in the 1990 World Cup and the 1992 European championship , was capped 42 times for the Netherlands .	NNP , WP VBD IN DT CD NNP NNP CC DT CD JJ NN , VBD VBN CD NNS IN DT NNP .

The right-handed batsman will have to forfeit half the money he was due to earn from the tour , the news agency said after a disciplinary committee set up by the Board of Control for Cricket in India met at Mohali , near the northern city of Chandigarh . Azharuddin was sacked after the tour and replaced by Sachin Tendulkar .	NNP VBD VBN IN DT NN CC VBN IN NNP NNP .
Sidhu was not considered for the four-nation Singer Cup beginning in Sri Lanka this month and the Sahara Cup against Pakistan scheduled to be played in Canada next month .	NN VBD RB VBN IN DT NN NNP NNP VBG IN NNP NNP DT NN CC DT NNP NNP IN NNP VBN TO VB VBN IN NNP JJ NN .
Sidhu , whose ban ends on October 14 , will be free to play domestic cricket .	RB , WP$ NN VBZ IN NNP CD , MD VB JJ TO VB JJ NN .

South Africa yet to hear from apartheid enforcers .	NNP NNP RB TO VB IN NN NNS .
Anton Ferreira	NNP NNP
CAPE TOWN 1996-08-25	NNP NNP CD
South Africa 's truth commission begins issuing subpoenas this week in a bid to dig beneath the political rationales and find the sinister figures who have the blood of the country 's race war on their hands .	NNP NNP POS NN NN VBZ VBG NNS DT NN IN DT NN TO VB IN DT JJ NNS CC VB DT JJ NNS WP VBP DT NN IN DT NN POS NN NN IN PRP$ NNS .
Leaders of the major parties involved , from right-wing whites to radical blacks , appeared before Archbishop Desmond Tutu 's Truth and Reconciliation Commission last week to paint the broad picture of their actions for or against apartheid .	NNS IN DT JJ NNS VBN , IN NN NNS TO JJ NNS , VBD IN NNP NNP NNP POS NNP CC NNP NNP JJ NN TO VB DT JJ NN IN PRP$ NNS IN CC IN NN .
Most , including former president F.W. de Klerk and African National Congress Deputy President Thabo Mbeki , offered apologies for any mistakes they had made and accepted broad responsibility for the actions of their foot soldiers .	JJS , VBG JJ NN NNP FW NNP CC NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP , VBN NNS IN DT NNS PRP VBD VBN CC VBD JJ NN IN DT NNS IN PRP$ NN NNS .
But none named those guilty of ordering or carrying out any of the gross violations of human rights which Tutu is investigating .	CC NN VBD DT NN IN VBG CC VBG RP DT IN DT JJ NNS IN JJ NNS WDT NNP VBZ VBG .
Human rights lawyer Brian Currin said the hearings last week were not intended as a form of confessional and that those who personally committed crimes during apartheid would testify only before a separate arm of the commission , the amnesty committee .	JJ NNS NN NNP NNP VBD DT NNS JJ NN VBD RB VBN IN DT NN IN JJ CC IN DT WP RB VBD NNS IN NN MD VB RB IN DT JJ NN IN DT NN , DT NN NN .
" I do n't think one should have expected more than what one got , " he said . "	" PRP VBP RB VB CD MD VB VBN JJR IN WP CD NN , " PRP VBD . "
That was not the amnesty committee where perpetrators are expected to open their hearts and souls and to tell it all . "	DT VBD RB DT NN NN WRB NNS VBP VBN TO VB PRP$ NNS CC NNS CC TO VB PRP DT . "
The commission , which has the power to grant amnesty to those who confess to abuses , has begun hearing the testimony from people already in jail for their deeds .	DT NN , WDT VBZ DT NN TO VB NN TO DT WP VBP TO NNS , VBZ VBN VBG DT NN IN NNS RB IN NN IN PRP$ NNS .
But others , such as self-confessed secret police hit-squad leader Dirk Coetzee , have yet to testify .	CC NNS , JJ IN JJ JJ NN NN NN NNP NNP , VBP RB TO VB .
Tutu 's deputy chairman , Alex Boraine , told reporters the commission would begin issuing subpoenas to suspects who refused to appear voluntarily some time this week .	NNP POS JJ NN , NNP NNP , VBD NNS DT NN MD VB VBG NNS TO VBZ WP VBD TO VB RB DT NN DT NN .
He added that former hardline apartheid president P.W. Botha could be among those called .	PRP VBD IN JJ JJ NN NN NNP NNP MD VB IN DT VBN .
But Currin , who is advising several people regarded as perpetrators , said this was not the best way to achieve the commission 's aims .	CC NNP , WP VBZ VBG JJ NNS VBN IN NNS , VBD DT VBD RB DT JJS NN TO VB DT NN POS VBZ .
" A person can be forced to appear , but the only way one is going to get to the truth in its totality is if people feel it is a good idea to go to the amnesty committee .	" DT NN MD VB VBN TO VB , CC DT JJ NN CD VBZ VBG TO VB TO DT NN IN PRP$ NN VBZ IN NNS VBP PRP VBZ DT JJ NN TO VB TO DT NN NN .
At the moment this is not the case . "	IN DT NN DT VBZ RB DT NN . "
He cited Coetzee , who was charged with murder after confessing in media interviews to dirty tricks .	PRP VBD NNP , WP VBD VBN IN NN IN VBG IN NNS NNS TO JJ NNS .
His trial is due to start in December but the truth commission intends to decide on his amnesty application before that .	PRP$ NN VBZ JJ TO VB IN NNP CC DT NN NN VBZ TO VB IN PRP$ NN NN IN DT .
Currin said the law had to be changed so all judicial prosecutions were automatically suspended for those who approached the truth commission .	NNP VBD DT NN VBD TO VB VBN RB DT JJ NNS VBD RB VBN IN DT WP VBD DT NN NN .
Last week 's submissions to the commission by the ANC , de Klerk 's National Party and the right-wing Freedom Front of General Constand Viljoen left many South Africans unsatisfied .	JJ NN POS NNS TO DT NN IN DT NNP , FW NNP POS NNP NNP CC DT JJ NNP NNP IN NNP NNP NNP VBD JJ NNPS NNPS JJ .
Boraine said the picture was incomplete because officers of the apartheid-era security forces had yet to make their scheduled , separate submission , but one black caller to a radio talk show declared :	NNP VBD DT NN VBD JJ IN NNS IN DT NN NN NNS VBD RB TO VB PRP$ JJ , JJ NN , CC CD JJ NN TO DT NN NN NN VBD :
" This whole thing is utterly useless , it does n't help us at all .	" DT JJ NN VBZ RB JJ , PRP VBZ RB VB PRP IN DT .
What the people expect is to have houses , to have jobs . "	WP DT NNS VBP VBZ TO VB NNS , TO VB NNS . "
Political scientist Jannie Gagiano said he doubted that the National Party , which implemented apartheid in 1948 and began dismantling it in 1990 , felt it carried a burden of guilt and needed to be exculpated through the commission .	JJ NN NNP NNP VBD PRP VBD IN DT NNP NNP , WDT VBD NN IN CD CC VBD VBG PRP IN CD , VBD PRP VBD DT NN IN NN CC VBN TO VB VBN IN DT NN .
" Therefore I have some doubts about achieving some form of reconciliation .	" RB PRP VBP DT NNS IN VBG DT NN IN NN .
One has to feel a bit guilty to feel the need for reconciling yourself to a historical adversary , " he said .	PRP VBZ TO VB DT NN JJ TO VB DT NN IN VBG PRP TO DT JJ NN , " PRP VBD .
Professor Tom Lodge of the University of the Witwatersrand demurred , saying :	NNP NNP NNP IN DT NNP IN DT NNP VBD , VBG :
" In the irritation , in the jokes , in the anger that white South Africans express about the commission , I think there 's a moral uneasiness , and I think that 's healthy .	" IN DT NN , IN DT NNS , IN DT NN IN JJ NNPS NNPS VB IN DT NN , PRP VBP EX VBZ DT JJ NN , CC PRP VBP IN VBZ JJ .
Responsibility is percolating downwards . "	NN VBZ VBG NNS . "
Moslem refugees seek to vote in Serb-held town .	NNP NNS VBP TO VB IN JJ NN .
Samir Arnaut	NNP JJ
MATUZICI , Bosnia 1996-08-25	NNP , NNP CD
Thousands of Moslem refugees denounced Bosnia 's elections as a farce on Sunday because Serb incomers would be able to vote in their old home town , cementing partition of the country .	NNS IN NNP NNS VBD NNP POS NNS IN DT NN IN NNP IN NNP NNS MD VB JJ TO VB IN PRP$ JJ NN NN , VBG NN IN DT NN .
They said they were ready to force their way back across post-war ethnic lines to Serb-held Doboj , one of several towns where NATO troops fear violence involving refugees determined to vote where they once lived . Mohammed Saleh , director of the Egyptian Museum , told Reuters television a U.S. team found the pots , some of which contain human intestines , in a tomb built into the rocks while digging in Dahshour , a village 40 km ( 25 miles ) south of Cairo . Saleh said the team -- from New York 's Metropolitan Museum -- found four Canopic jars and two unguent jars in the tomb , which belongs to an unidentifed person who lived during the 12th Dynasty ( 1991-1786 BC ) in the Middle Kingdom . " This finding is important because one of the jars still contains substances and materials used in the conservation of mummies and the conservation of the intestines and all the things which were in the cavity of a person we have not identified yet , " Saleh said . Anne Murray	NNP NNP
NEW YORK 1996-08-23	NNP NNP CD
Corporate America is planning major changes in employee compensation in the next few years , according to a recent study .	NNP NNP VBZ VBG JJ NNS IN NN NN IN DT JJ JJ NNS , VBG TO DT JJ NN .
What it comes down to is this : If you 're highly skilled , you 'll benefit nicely .	WP PRP VBZ RB TO VBZ DT : IN PRP VBP RB JJ , PRP MD VB RB .
But if you 're not and cannot contribute to your employer 's goals , you 'll be paid less .	CC IN PRP VBP RB CC MD VB TO PRP$ NN POS NNS , PRP MD VB VBN RBR .
The survey , conducted in late 1995 and the early part of this year by management consulting firm Towers Perrin , showed that the focus will be on an employee 's overall value to the company 's bottom line -- rather than how well an employee performs a specific task .	DT NN , VBN IN JJ CD CC DT JJ NN IN DT NN IN NN NN NN NNP NNP , VBD IN DT NN MD VB IN DT NN POS JJ NN TO DT NN POS JJ NN : RB IN WRB RB DT NN VBZ DT JJ NN .
Presently , for example , if an accountant 's job involves doing five specific tasks , he or she can expect a certain salary , said Sandra O'Neal , a Towers Perrin principal .	RB , IN NN , IN DT NN POS NN VBZ VBG CD JJ NNS , PRP CC PRP MD VB DT JJ NN , VBD NNP NNP , DT NNP NNP NN .
In the future , the accountant will be evaluated solely on " knowledge , skill and abilities , " she said .	IN DT NN , DT NN MD VB VBN RB IN " NN , NN CC NNS , " PRP VBD .
In addition to using accounting skills , the accountant will also have to be creative , work well in a team , be sensitive to customer needs and set productivity goals .	IN NN TO VBG NN NNS , DT NN MD RB VB TO VB JJ , VBP RB IN DT NN , VB JJ TO NN NNS CC VBD NN NNS .
" The good news is , if you 're highly skilled and have many abilities , you 'll be paid more , " said O'Neal .	" DT JJ NN VBZ , IN PRP VBP RB JJ CC VBP JJ NNS , PRP MD VB VBN RBR , " VBD NNP .
" The bad news is , if you 're not skilled and ca n't contribute to a team , to customer service and the organisation 's goals , you 'll be paid less . "	" DT JJ NN VBZ , IN PRP VBP RB JJ CC MD RB VB TO DT NN , TO VB NN CC DT NN POS NNS , PRP MD VB VBN RBR . "
Of the 750 mid-to-large size corporations surveyed , 81 percent had undergone a major restructuring in the last three years , and more than two-thirds reported that productivity and profits were up as result .	IN DT CD JJ NN NNS VBN , CD NN VBD VBN DT JJ NN IN DT JJ CD NNS , CC JJR IN NNS VBD IN NN CC NNS VBD RP IN NN .
Next on the agenda for these firms is developing a new compensation structure , and 78 percent report that they are considering a new , skills-based plan for both management and non-management employees . This coming shift , O'Neal said , " is not just isolated or a fad .	DT VBG NN , NNP VBD , " VBZ RB RB VBN CC DT NN .
It 's an inexorable change . "	PRP VBZ DT JJ NN . "

" Multi-layers kept management at a distance from its customers , " O'Neal said .	" NNS VBD NN IN DT NN IN PRP$ NNS , " NNP VBD .
Now organisations must change to stay competitive .	RB NNS MD VB TO VB JJ .
O'Neal says firms will place a greater emphasis on teams and team performance in giving raises .	NN VBZ NNS MD VB DT JJR NN IN NNS CC NN NN IN VBG VBZ .
If your team does well , you 'll do well .	IN PRP$ NN VBZ RB , PRP MD VB RB .

Is this fair to an employee who can go the distance but is on a team that ca n't keep up ?	VBZ DT NN TO DT NN WP MD VB DT NN CC VBZ IN DT NN WDT MD RB VB RP .

Gencor Ltd on Monday said it had swelled its year attributable profit and streamlined operations to strengthen it for the current financial year despite a variety of divisional setbacks .	NNP NNP IN NNP VBD PRP VBD VBN PRP$ NN JJ NN CC JJ NNS TO VB PRP IN DT JJ JJ NN IN DT NN IN JJ NNS .

"	VBG DT NN POS NNS IN DT NN VBD NNP CD , NN NNP NNP VBD : " RB DT JJ NN IN JJ NN VBZ RB DT NN VBG IN DT JJ NN IN DT NNS JJ TO DT NN . "

Advanced Medical buying IVAC Medical .	NNP NNP VBG NNP NNP .
SAN DIEGO 1996-08-26	NNP NNP CD
Advanced Medical Inc. said Monday it will buy IVAC Medical Systems Inc. , a former Eli Lilly & Co .	NNP NNP NNP VBD NNP PRP MD VB NNP NNP NNP NNP , DT JJ NNP NNP CC NNP .
unit , for about $ 400 million in cash , creating one of the world 's largest makers of intravenous infusion therapy products .	NN , IN IN $ CD CD IN NN , VBG CD IN DT NN POS JJS NNS IN JJ NN NN NNS .
Under the agreement , IVAC and Advanced Medical 's wholly owned subsidiary , IMED Corp. , will merge to form a new company that will develop and manufacture infusion pumps that regulate the amount of intravenous fluid being administered to a patient , as well as proprietary disposable products .	IN DT NN , NNP CC NNP NNP POS RB VBN NN , NNP NNP , MD VB TO VB DT JJ NN WDT MD VB CC VB NN NNS WDT VBP DT NN IN JJ NN VBG VBN TO DT NN , RB RB IN JJ JJ NNS .
The combined company will have estimated revenues of $ 353 million .	DT VBN NN MD VB JJ NNS IN $ CD CD .
Advanced Medical , through IMED , is already one of the nation 's largest developers and manufacturers of intravenous infusion pumps and proprietary disposable products .	NNP NNP , IN NNP , VBZ RB CD IN DT NN POS JJS NNS CC NNS IN JJ NN NNS CC JJ JJ NNS .
It has sales in 38 foreign countries .	PRP VBZ NNS IN CD JJ NNS .
San Diego-based IVAC is a major provider of infusion systems and related technologies to the health-care industry .	NNP JJ NNP VBZ DT JJ NN IN NN NNS CC JJ NNS TO DT JJ NN .
It has manufacturing plants in San Diego ; Creedmoor , N.C. ; Hampshire , England ; and Tijuana , Mexico , and distributes its prodcuts in more than 120 countries .	PRP VBZ VBG NNS IN NNP NNP : NNP , NNP : NNP , NNP : CC NNP , NNP , CC VBZ PRP$ NNS IN RBR IN CD NNS .
Eli Lilly sold IVAC on Dec. 31 , 1994 to DLJ Merchant Banking Partners LP , River Medical Inc. and other investors .	NNP NNP VBD NNP IN NNP CD , CD TO NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP , NNP NNP NNP CC JJ NNS .
Advanced Medical said it expects to take an unspecified one-time charge to pay for the merger .	NNP NNP VBD PRP VBZ TO VB DT JJ JJ NN TO VB IN DT NN .
It did not say when the charge would be taken .	PRP VBD RB VB WRB DT NN MD VB VBN .
" The addition of IVAC is expected to contribute to financial results in the full second quarter of 1997 , " the companies said .	" DT NN IN NNP VBZ VBN TO VB TO JJ NNS IN DT JJ JJ NN IN CD , " DT NNS VBD .
The merger will add to both companies ' historical leadership in infusion therapy and technology-based drug delivery devices , they said .	DT NN MD VB TO DT NNS POS JJ NN IN NN NN CC JJ NN NN NNS , PRP VBD .
In 1968 , IVAC introduced the world 's first infusion therapy monitoring device .	IN CD , NNP VBD DT NN POS JJ NN NN NN NN .
A year later IVAC improved its system with the addition of an IV pump that regulated the flow of liquids through positive pressure .	DT NN RB NNP VBD PRP$ NN IN DT NN IN DT NNP VBP IN VBN DT NN IN NNS IN JJ NN .
IMED introduced the world 's first volumetric infusion pump in 1974 .	NN VBD DT NN POS JJ JJ NN NN IN CD .
IMED had profits of $ 1.7 million , or 6 cents per fully diluted common share , on $ 53.9 million in revenues in the first half of 1996 .	NNP VBD NNS IN $ CD CD , CC CD NNS IN RB VBN JJ NN , IN $ CD CD IN NNS IN DT JJ NN IN CD .
Excluding the effect of a one-time restructuring charge of $ 17.4 million , IVAC had net income of $ 4.2 million on net sales of $ 112.8 million for the 1996 first half .	VBG DT NN IN DT JJ NN NN IN $ CD CD , NNP VBD JJ NN IN $ CD CD IN JJ NNS IN $ CD CD IN DT CD JJ NN .
Advanced Medical reported profits of $ 8.4 million on sales of $ 29.2 million in the quarter ended June 30 .	NNP NNP VBD NNS IN $ CD CD IN NNS IN $ CD CD IN DT NN VBN NNP CD .
William J. Mercer , IVAC president and chief executive officer , will become the president and CEO of Advanced Medical .	NNP NNP NNP , NNP NN CC JJ JJ NN , MD VB DT NN CC NNP IN NNP NNP .
He led the transition of IVAC to a privately held company and was previously senior vice president at Mallinckrodt Group Inc .	PRP VBD DT NN IN NNP TO DT RB VBN NN CC VBD RB JJ NN NN IN NNP NNP NNP .
Joseph Kuhn , Advanced Medical and IMED president , will become the new company 's executive vice president and chief financial officer .	NNP NNP , NNP NNP CC NNP NN , MD VB DT JJ NN POS NN NN NN CC NN JJ NN .
The deal is expected to close by the first quarter of 1997 , subject to regulatory approval .	DT NN VBZ VBN TO VB IN DT JJ NN IN CD , JJ TO JJ NN .
It has already been approved by both companies ' boards .	PRP VBZ RB VBN VBN IN DT NNS POS NNS .

ST HELENS , England 1996-08-26	NNP NNPS , NNP CD
St Helens completed their first league and Challenge Cup double in 30 years on Monday when they thrashed Warrington 66-14 to clinch the inaugural Super League title .	NNP NNP VBD PRP$ JJ NN CC NNP NNP VB IN CD NNS IN NNP WRB PRP VBD NNP CD TO VB DT NN NNP NNP NN .
St Helens secured the two points they needed in the last game of the season at Knowsley Road to win their first championship since 1975 and their first double since 1966 .	NNP NNP VBN DT CD NNS PRP VBD IN DT JJ NN IN DT NN IN NNP NNP TO VB PRP$ JJ NN IN CD CC PRP$ JJ JJ IN CD .
