Captain and goalkicker Bobbie Goulding scored 18 points .	NN CC NN NNP NNP VBD CD NNS .
St Helens 's triumph marked the end of Wigan 's seven-year reign as British champions .	NNP NNP POS NN VBD DT NN IN NNP POS JJ NN IN JJ NNS .
St Helens needed to win on Monday to take the title -- a defeat or draw would have allowed Wigan their eighth consecutive championship .	NNP NNP VBD TO VB IN NNP TO VB DT NN : DT NN CC VB MD VB VBN JJ PRP$ JJ JJ NN .
They were also the toast of London Broncos , who managed to scrape into the top four ahead of Warrington and qualify for the end-of-season play-offs .	PRP VBD RB DT NN IN NNP NNS , WP VBD TO VB IN DT JJ CD RB IN NNP CC VB IN DT JJ NNS .
Bradford finished third .	NNP VBD JJ .

JYVASKYLA , Finland 1996-08-26	NNP , NNP CD
Tommi Makinen took a significant step towards becoming world rally champion with a brilliant victory in the 1000 Lakes Rally on Monday .	NNP NNP VBD DT JJ NN IN VBG NN NN NN IN DT JJ NN IN DT CD NNP NNP IN NNP .
Mitsubishi driver Makinen stopped experienced fellow Finn Juha Kankkunen in his tracks on the final day of the 1,452-km rally , doubling his lead on the first two decisive stages .	NNP NN NNP VBD VBN NN NNP NNP NNP IN PRP$ NNS IN DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN , VBG PRP$ NN IN DT JJ CD JJ NNS .
" This was the most difficult win - three days at 125 percent effort , " said Makinen , whose success completed his 1,000 Lakes hat-trick .	" DT VBD DT RBS JJ NN : CD NNS IN CD NN NN , " VBD NNP , WP$ NN VBD PRP$ CD NNPS NN .
Kankkunen was runner-up in his Toyota as Finland 's Jarmo Kytolehto produced a remarkable drive to finish third in his Ford .	NNP VBD NN IN PRP$ NN IN NNP POS NNP NNP VBD DT JJ NN TO VB JJ IN PRP$ NNP .
Swede Kenneth Eriksson kept Subaru in the hunt for the manufacturers ' title with fifth place in spite of a gearbox problem that nearly forced him off the road close to the end of the event . SOCCER - SEYCHELLES FAIL IN BID FOR HISTORIC VICTORY .	NN : NNP NNP IN NN IN NNP NN .
Mark Gleeson	NNP NNP
JOHANNESBURG 1996-08-26	NN CD
The tiny islands of the Seychelles failed to make soccer history at the weekend when they bowed out of the preliminary rounds of the African Nations Cup .	DT JJ NNS IN DT NNP VBD TO VB NN NN IN DT NN WRB PRP VBD IN IN DT JJ NNS IN DT NNP NNPS NNP .
Trailing fellow Indian Ocean islanders Mauritius 1-0 from the first leg , they were held to a 1-1 draw at home on Saturday despite playing against 10 men for most of the match .	VBG NN NNP NNP NNS NNP CD IN DT JJ NN , PRP VBD VBN TO DT JJ NN IN NN IN NNP IN VBG IN CD NNS IN JJS IN DT NN .
The 2-1 aggregate took Mauritius into the group phase of the qualifiers for the 1998 finals , and kept up the Seychelles ' record of never having won an official match in their 10 years of FIFA membership .	DT CD JJ VBD NNP IN DT NN NN IN DT NNS IN DT CD NNS , CC VB RP DT NNPS POS NN IN RB VBG VBN DT JJ NN IN PRP$ CD NNS IN NNP NN .
The Seychelles must have thought they were on course for a historic breakthrough when Mauritian midfielder Andre Caboche was sent off for a crude tackle in the 19th minute .	DT NNP MD VB VBN PRP VBD IN NN IN DT JJ NN WRB NNP FW NNP NNP VBD VBN RP IN DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN .
But the visitors responded to the setback immediately -- veteran striker Ashley Mocude scoring a minute later to give them a two-goal aggregate lead .	CC DT NNS VBN TO DT NN RB : JJ NN NNP NNP VBG DT NN RBR TO VB PRP DT JJ JJ NN .
Although Danny Rose 's 50th-minute equaliser gave the Seychellois renewed hope they could not find the net again and were eliminated .	IN NNP NNP POS JJ NN VBD DT NNP VBD NN PRP MD RB VB DT JJ RB CC VBD VBN .
Mauritius now play in group seven of the qualifiers against Malawi , Mozambique and favourites Zambia .	NNS RB VB IN NN CD IN DT NNS IN NNP , NNP CC VBZ NNP .
Namibia , who drew 0-0 with Botswana in their first leg , won the second leg in Windhoek 6-0 to stretch their unbeaten run to eight matches and continue their remarkable progress on the African soccer stage . They now play in group five with Cameroon , Gabon and Kenya .	PRP RB VB IN NN CD IN NNP , NNP CC NNP .

Salou , who plays for MSV Duisburg in the Bundesliga , scored in the 53rd minute of Sunday 's match in Lome for a 1-0 aggregate win which takes his side into group six , where they will meet Liberia , Tanzania and Zaire . SWIMMING - POPOV IN `SERIOUS CONDITION ' AFTER STABBING .	VBG : NNP IN NN NN '' NNP NNP .
MOSCOW 1996-08-26	RB CD
Russian double Olympic swimming champion Alexander Popov was in a serious condition on Monday after being stabbed on a Moscow street .	JJ JJ JJ NN NN NNP NNP VBD IN DT JJ NN IN NNP IN VBG VBD IN DT NNP NN .
A doctor said it was too early to say whether Popov , the only man to retain the Olympic 50 and 100 metres freestyle titles , would return to top-level sport .	DT NN VBD PRP VBD RB JJ TO VB IN NNP , DT JJ NN TO VB DT JJ CD CC CD NNS JJ NNS , MD VB TO JJ NN .
" His condition is serious , " said Rimma Maslova , deputy chief doctor of Hospital No 31 in the Russian capital . "	" PRP$ NN VBZ JJ , " VBD NNP NNP , NN JJ NN IN NNP DT CD IN DT JJ NN . "
But he is conscious and is talking and smiling . "	CC PRP VBZ JJ CC VBZ VBG CC VBG . "
Maslova told Reuters she was not an expert in sports medicine , but said it was too early to judge Popov 's chances of returning to competitive swimming .	NN VBD NNP PRP VBD RB DT NN IN NNS NN , CC VBD PRP VBD RB JJ TO VB NNP POS NNS IN VBG TO JJ NN .
Popov , who won gold in the 50 and 100 metres freestyle at the recent Atlanta Olympics , was stabbed in the abdomen late on Saturday after an argument with a group of roadside watermelon sellers in south-west Moscow .	NN , WP VBD NN IN DT CD CC CD NNS VBP IN DT JJ NNP NNP , VBD VBN IN DT NN JJ IN NNP IN DT NN IN DT NN IN NN NN NNS IN JJ NNP .
Maslova said the wound had affected a lung and a kidney .	NNP VBD DT NN VBD VBN DT NN CC DT NN .
Doctors operated on Popov , 24 , for three hours .	NNS VBD IN NNP , CD , IN CD NNS .
Popov told NTV television on Sunday he was in no danger and promised he would be back in the pool shortly . "	NN VBD NNP NN IN NNP PRP VBD IN DT NN CC VBD PRP MD VB RB IN DT NN RB . "
There 's no need to worry .	EX VBZ DT NN TO VB .
We 're going to be walking soon -- and swimming , " he insisted cheerfully from his bed in the intensive care unit .	PRP VBP VBG TO VB VBG RB : CC NN , " PRP VBD RB IN PRP$ NN IN DT JJ NN NN .
Interfax news agency said police had detained one of the attackers .	JJ NN NN VBD NN VBD VBN CD IN DT NNS .
It said the row started when Popov and a group of his friends were returning from a party .	PRP VBD DT NN VBD WRB NNP CC DT NN IN PRP$ NNS VBD VBG IN DT NN .
Vitaly Smirnov , president of the Russian National Olympic Committee , said President Boris Yeltsin had given the swimmer Russia 's top award for his Olympic performance . "	NNP NNP , NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP , VBD NNP NNP NNP VBD VBN DT NN NNP POS JJ NN IN PRP$ JJ NN . "
I am not a doctor but I think he is doing all right , " said Smirnov .	PRP VBP RB DT NN CC PRP VBP PRP VBZ VBG DT NN , " VBD NNP .
Smirnov said the Olympic Committee might ask the government to take measures to protect the country 's best athletes , some of whom have already chosen to live abroad for fear of a surge in crime in post-Soviet Russia . NEW YORK 1996-08-26	NNP NNP CD
Michael Stich nearly pulled out of the U.S. Open in protest over the men 's seeding fiasco but the former Wimbledon champion was glad he stayed after sweating out a four-set win on Monday over qualifier Tommy Haas .	NNP NNP RB VBN IN IN DT NNP NNP IN NN IN DT NNS POS JJ NN CC DT JJ NNP NN VBD JJ PRP VBD IN VBG RP DT JJ NN IN NNP IN NN NNP NNP .
" I still feel it 's embarrassing what happened and I was about to pull out yesterday and say , ' That 's it , ' " said Stich , one of a host of men who cried foul over seeding procedures that forced an unprecedented remaking of the men 's draw last week .	" PRP RB VB PRP VBZ JJ WP VBD CC PRP VBD IN TO VB RP NN CC VB , '' DT VBZ PRP , '' " VBD NNP , CD IN DT NN IN NNS WP VBD JJ IN VBG NNS WDT VBD DT JJ VBG IN DT NNS POS NN JJ NN .
" But there are so many reasons to play , especially spectators and the kids who come out here and want to enjoy watching tennis , that I decided to stay . "	" CC EX VBP RB JJ NNS TO VB , RB NNS CC DT NNS WP VBP RP RB CC VBP TO VB VBG NN , IN PRP VBD TO VB . "
In a break from tradition , the Open did not seed in strict accordance with ATP rankings , instead taking into account other factors that raised objections of favourtism toward U.S. players .	IN DT NN IN NN , DT NNP VBD RB VB IN JJ NN IN NNP NNS , RB VBG IN NN JJ NNS WDT VBD NNS IN NN IN NNP NNS .
One prominent player that did not stay for the Open was French Open champion Yvegeny Kafelnikov , who after being dropped three spots from his ATP ranking to a seventh seeding , withdrew and returned home to Russia .	CD JJ NN WDT VBD RB VB IN DT NNP VBD NNP NNP NN NNP NNP , WP IN VBG VBN CD NNS IN PRP$ NNP JJ TO DT JJ NN , VBD CC VBD NN TO NNP .
Kafelnikov had pulled out of last week 's tournament with a rib injury .	NNP VBD VBN IN IN JJ NN POS NN IN DT NN NN .
At a news conference attended by approximately 50 players on Sunday , U.S. Davis Cup player Todd Martin expressed the players ' outrage at the seedings .	IN DT NN NN VBN IN RB CD NNS IN NNP , NNP NNP NNP NN NNP NNP VBD DT NNS POS NN IN DT NNS .
" The way the U.S. Open has seeded here , tampering with the ranking system , has tarnished the image and reputation of this U.S. Open in the players ' mind , and we think that is damaging to our sport , " Martin said . Stich said he felt the players ought to have organised an active protest .	NN VBD PRP VBD DT NNS MD TO VB VBD DT JJ NN .
" I feel that we made it a little easy for the USTA .	" PRP VBP IN PRP VBD PRP DT JJ JJ IN DT NNP .
They did n't really get hurt as much as I think they should have , " said Stich . "	PRP VBD RB RB VB VBN RB RB IN PRP VBP PRP MD VB , " VBD NNP . "
I feel that we should have maybe just cancelled out the Monday , not show up today and start the tournament tomorrow . "	PRP VBP IN PRP MD VB RB RB VBD RP DT NNP , RB VB RP NN CC VB DT NN NN . "
But once the 27-year-old Stich got on the court , he focused his energies on trying to win the year 's last Grand Slam .	CC RB DT JJ NNP VBD IN DT NN , PRP VBD PRP$ NNS IN VBG TO VB DT NN POS JJ NNP NNP .
He took a positive first step with his 6-3 1-6 6-1 7-5 win over compatriot Haas on a sun-baked Grandstand court .	PRP VBD DT JJ JJ NN IN PRP$ CD CD CD CD VBP IN NN NNP IN DT JJ NNP NN .
Others advancing early on Monday included 11th-seeded American Malivai Washington , the Wimbledon runner-up , Sweden 's Magnus Gustafsson , and two-time former French Open champion Sergi Bruguera of Spain , who will be Stich 's next opponent . The suspicion , however , lingers in Stich 's mind that U.S. Open officials did tamper with the seeding process in order to benefit homegrown players .	DT NN , RB , VBZ IN NNP POS NN IN NNP NNP NNS VBD VB IN DT VBG NN IN NN TO VB NN NNS .
" I get the feeling that everything is done here for the American players and they forget about all the other players , " said Stich , who lost the 1994 Open final to Andre Agassi . It was Agassi who was at the centre of the controversy that engulfed the tournament since the original draw was completed on Wednesday .	PRP VBD NNP WP VBD IN DT NN IN DT NN WDT VBD DT NN IN DT JJ NN VBD VBN IN NNP .
The flamboyant American star was bumped up two spots from his ATP ranking of eight to a seeding of six .	DT JJ JJ NN VBD VBN RP CD NNS IN PRP$ NNP JJ IN CD TO DT NN IN CD .
" He ( Agassi ) should be seeded the way he is playing tennis right now , " said Stich about the unfairness of moving up Agassi , who made early exits from the French Open and Wimbledon . Stich , not seeded here for the first time since 1990 , might have benefitted from some fiddling with the seedings himself after Kafelnikov withdrew .	UH , RB VBN RB IN DT JJ NN IN CD , MD VB VBN IN DT NN IN DT NNS PRP IN NNP VBD .

BASEBALL - BONDS ' CONSECUTIVE GAME STREAK ENDS .	NN : NNS POS JJ NN VBD NNS .
SAN FRANCISCO 1996-08-25	NNP NNP CD
San Francisco Giants All-Star left fielder Barry Bonds did not appear in Sunday 's 7-2 victory over the Montreal Expos , ending his consecutive games streak .	NNP NNP NNP NNP VBD NN NNP NNP VBD RB VB IN NNP POS CD NN IN DT NNP NNP , VBG PRP$ JJ NNS NN .
After appearing as a pinch-hitter in the previous two games , Bonds , who has been battling a hamstring injury , did not see any action today , ending his streak at 357 consecutive games .	IN VBG IN DT NN IN DT JJ CD NNS , NNP , WP VBZ VBN VBG DT VB NN , VBD RB VB DT NN NN , VBG PRP$ NN IN CD JJ NNS .
It was the second-longest streak by an active player in the the majors behind Baltimore 's Cal Ripken , who appeared in his major-league record 2,282nd straight game today , a 13-0 loss to the California Angels .	PRP VBD DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN IN DT DT NNS IN NNP POS NNP NNP , WP VBD IN PRP$ JJ NN JJ JJ NN NN , DT CD NN TO DT NNP NNPS .
Bonds has been limited to a pinch-hitting role since an MRI Friday showed a mild strain of his left hamstring .	NNS VBZ VBN VBN TO DT JJ NN IN DT NNP NNP VBD DT JJ NN IN PRP$ JJ NN .
Bonds came out of Wednesday 's game against New York in the ninth inning after suffering a mild hamstring strain .	NNS VBD IN IN NNP POS NN IN NNP NNP IN DT JJ NN IN VBG DT JJ NN NN .
He was back in the starting lineup Thursday night and went 1-for-2 before exiting in the third inning .	PRP VBD RB IN DT JJ NN NNP NN CC VBD RB IN VBG IN DT JJ NN .

Lamonts Apparel Inc , an operator of 42 family apparel stores in six northwestern states , said it has filed a reorganization plan in bankruptcy court in Seattle .	NNP NNP NNP , DT NN IN CD NN NN NNS IN CD JJ NNS , VBD PRP VBZ VBN DT NN NN IN NN NN IN NNP .
( Corrects to make clear a reorganization plan has been filed ) .	( NNS TO VB JJ DT NN NN VBZ VBN VBN ) .
The reorganization plan calls for all secured claims to be paid in full .	DT NN NN VBZ IN DT VBN NNS TO VB VBN IN JJ .
Unsecured claims , including those of company bondholders , will be satisfied by issuing new common stock and warrants .	JJ NNS , VBG DT IN NN NNS , MD VB VBN IN VBG JJ JJ NN CC NNS .
Unsecured claims are estimated at about $ 90 million .	JJ NNS VBP VBN IN IN $ CD CD .
Lamonts said it plans to issue 9 million shares of new common stock .	NNS VBD PRP VBZ TO VB CD CD NNS IN JJ JJ NN .
Of that amount , 4.05 million and 5.67 million shares will be allocated to the company 's trade creditors .	IN DT NN , CD CD CC CD CD NNS MD VB VBN TO DT NN POS NN NNS .
Between 4.75 and 3.13 million shares will be allocated to bondholders and other unsecured non-trade creditors and 200,000 will be allocated to existing shareholders in exchange for all existing stock of the company . Bondholders and other unsecured non-trade creditors will receive warrants four about 2.2 million shares when the company 's market capitalization reaches $ 20 million .	NNS CC JJ JJ JJ NNS MD VB NNS CD IN CD CD NNS WRB DT NN POS NN NN VBZ $ CD CD .
Bondholders , other unsecured non-trade creditors , and existing shareholders also will receive warrants entitling them to roughly 800,000 shares when the company 's market capitalization reaches $ 25 million . Management will receive options to purchase 10 percent of the company 's outstanding common stock with protection against dilution at an option exercise price of $ 1 million .	NNP MD VB NNS TO VB CD NN IN DT NN POS JJ JJ NN IN NN IN NN IN DT NN NN NN IN $ CD CD .

After truce , Lebed faces tougher Chechen problem .	IN NN , NNP VBZ JJR NNP NN .
Alastair Macdonald	NNP NN
MOSCOW 1996-08-26	RB CD
Alexander Lebed may finally get to discuss his Chechen peace proposals with Boris Yeltsin on Tuesday after a lost weekend in the region when he was forced to abandon plans to sign a new political treaty with the separatist rebels .	NNP JJ MD RB VB TO VB PRP$ NNP NN NNS IN NNP NNP IN NNP IN DT VBN NN IN DT NN WRB PRP VBD VBN TO VB NNS TO VB DT JJ JJ NN IN DT JJ NNS .
It could be a sobering experience for the Kremlin security chief who , just two months after being appointed by the president and two heady weeks after taking charge of the Chechen crisis , had promised to wrap up the 20-month war by the weekend .	PRP MD VB DT JJ NN IN DT NNP NN NN WP , RB CD NNS IN VBG VBN IN DT NN CC CD JJ NNS IN VBG NN IN DT NN NN , VBD VBN TO VB RP DT JJ NN IN DT NN .
Despite a mood of compromise in the region after some of the worst fighting of the war , Lebed may be just finding out that concluding a long-term settlement , somewhere between rebel demands for independence and Moscow 's insistence that Chechnya remain part of Russia , will be no easy matter .	IN DT NN IN NN IN DT NN IN DT IN DT JJS NN IN DT NN , NNP MD VB RB VBG RP IN VBG DT JJ NN , RB IN NN NNS IN NN CC NNP POS NN IN NNP VBP NN IN NNP , MD VB DT JJ NN .
A chain-smoking former paratroop general with a sharp line in deadpan putdowns and a soldier 's knack for making life sound simple , Lebed managed to arrange an ambitious ceasefire in the region last week , days after the Russian army threatened to bomb its way back into the rebel-held Chechen capital Grozny .	DT NN JJ NN NN IN DT JJ NN IN JJ NNS CC DT NN POS NN IN VBG NN NN NN , NNP VBD TO VB DT JJ NN IN DT NN JJ NN , NNS IN DT JJ NN VBD TO VB PRP$ NN RB IN DT JJ JJ NN NNP .
He returned at the weekend , pledging to conclude a political settlement that would make this truce work where all others have failed .	PRP VBD IN DT NN , VBG TO VB DT JJ NN WDT MD VB DT NN NN WRB DT NNS VBP VBN .
But then he apparently thought better of it .	CC RB PRP RB VBD RB IN PRP .
Saying he needed to tidy up legal loose ends on the deal -- and also cover his back against unnamed pro-war schemers in Moscow -- he flew back to the capital empty-handed on Sunday .	VBG PRP VBD TO JJ RP JJ JJ NNS IN DT NN : CC RB VBP PRP$ NN IN JJ JJ NNS IN NNP : PRP VBD RB TO DT NN VBN IN NNP .
He met Russian Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin on Monday and , according to the press service of Lebed 's Security Council , could meet Yeltsin on Tuesday .	PRP VBD NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP IN NNP CC , VBG TO DT NN NN IN NNP POS NNP NNP , MD VB NNP IN NNP .
It was not clear if the start of Yeltsin 's holiday , announced later , would affect plans to talk .	PRP VBD RB VB IN DT NN IN NNP POS NN , VBD RB , MD VB NNS TO VB .
Moscow 's as yet undisclosed proposals on Chechnya 's political future have , meanwhile , been sent back to do the rounds of various government departments .	NNP POS RB RB JJ NNS IN NNP POS JJ JJ VBP , RBR , VBN VBN RB TO VB DT NNS IN JJ NN NNS .
It is not known what caused the delay in the peace plan .	PRP VBZ RB VBN WP VBD DT NN IN DT NN NN .
Speculation mounted last week that Lebed was operating out on a limb in Chechnya as Yeltsin , hardly seen since his reelection last month , kept out of sight and then gave an interview criticising his envoy just as he clinched a truce .	NN VBD JJ NN IN NNP VBD VBG RB IN DT NN IN NNP IN NNP , RB VBN IN PRP$ NN JJ NN , VBD IN IN NN CC RB VBD DT NN VBG PRP$ NN RB IN PRP VBD DT NN .
But Chernomyrdin took pains at the weekend to insist Lebed was playing for a united team and that the proposals he took to rebel chief-of-staff Aslan Maskhadov had been agreed by Yeltsin .	CC NNP VBD NNS IN DT NN TO VB NNP VBD VBG IN DT VBN NN CC IN DT NNS PRP VBD TO NN NN NNP NNP VBD VBN VBN IN NNP .
If that were the case , it was unclear why Lebed suddenly found it necessary to have the deal verified in Moscow .	IN DT VBD DT NN , PRP VBD JJ WRB JJ RB VBD PRP JJ TO VB DT NN VBN IN NNP .
Lebed himself said he was concerned that powerful interests in Moscow , who have profited from the war and want it to go on , would seize on any inadequacy in the deal to remove him .	JJ PRP VBD PRP VBD VBN IN JJ NNS IN NNP , WP VBP VBN IN DT NN CC VB PRP TO VB IN , MD VB IN DT NN IN DT NN TO VB PRP .
Maskhadov warned that Lebed risked the same fate as a former Russian army commander in the region who sought a compromise and was blown up last year by -- so the Chechens say -- Russian forces .	NNP VBD IN JJ VBD DT JJ NN IN DT JJ JJ NN NN IN DT NN WP VBD DT NN CC VBD VBN RP JJ NN IN : CC DT NNPS VBP : JJ NNS .
Maskhadov may also have made new demands on Lebed , forcing him to check back with the Kremlin on what he could offer .	NN MD RB VB VBN JJ NNS IN NNP , VBG PRP TO VB RB IN DT NNP IN WP PRP MD VB .

Her reward was the passage in 1993 of the " Brady Bill " which requires a mandatory five-day waiting period for purchase of handguns and also mandates background checks for would-be gun purchasers . CHILLICOTHE , Ohio 1996-08-25	NNP , NNP CD
- Chelsea Clinton , until now carefully shielded from the exposure of public life , made her political debut on Sunday on her father 's whistlestop train trip .	: NNP NNP , IN RB RB VBN IN DT NN IN JJ NN , VBD PRP JJ NN IN NNP IN PRP$ NN POS JJ NN NN .
Chelsea , 16 , was at President Bill Clinton 's side as he rode the rails through parts of West Virginia , Kentucky and Ohio , and was introduced at every stop .	NNS , CD , VBD IN NNP NNP NNP POS NN IN PRP VBD DT NNS IN NNS IN NNP NNP , NNP CC NNP , CC VBD VBN IN DT NN .
She even worked ropelines , shaking hands with excited fans .	PRP RB VBD NNS , VBG NNS IN VBN NNS .
Hillary Rodham Clinton saw her husband and daughter off on the trip in Huntington , West Virginia and then went on to Chicago to begin a rigorous Democratic Convention schedule .	NNP NNP NNP VBD PRP$ NN CC NN RB IN DT NN IN NNP , NNP NNP CC RB VBD RB TO NNP TO VB DT JJ NNP NNP NN .

She has to go back to school . "	PRP VBZ TO VB RB TO NN . "
The president 's daughter is going into her senior year of high school at Sidwell Friends School , a private school in Washington .	DT NN POS NN VBZ VBG IN PRP$ JJ NN IN JJ NN IN NNP NNPS NNP , DT JJ NN IN NNP .
McCurry said Chelsea has asked to go on the train trip and attend the convention where her father will be renominated , but said her exposure did not signal the start of a new political career . Dutch closing share market report .	JJ NN NN NN NN .
AMSTERDAM 1996-08-26	NN CD
Dutch shares drifted to a lower close on Monday , dragged down by weakness in the domestic bond market and turnover depressed by the UK bank holiday and lack of any significant U.S. economic data .	JJ NNS VBD TO DT JJR VB IN NNP , VBD RP IN NN IN DT JJ NN NN CC NN JJ IN DT NNP NN NN CC NN IN DT JJ NNP JJ NNS .
The AEX index of leading shares closed 4.54 points easier at 556.19 , the day 's low .	DT NNP NN IN VBG NNS VBD CD NNS JJR IN CD , DT NN POS NN .
The Dutch market had been on the defensive all day but a softer start to Wall Street did little to boost sentiment in late trade , dealers said .	DT JJ NN VBD VBN IN DT JJ RB NN CC DT JJR NN TO NNP NNP VBD JJ TO VB NN IN JJ NN , NNS VBD .
" It was always going to be a tough day with participation so low .	" PRP VBD RB VBG TO VB DT JJ NN IN NN RB JJ .
But the only thing really worrying the market was the bonds , and that dragged us lower , " one dealer said .	CC DT JJ NN RB VBG DT NN VBD DT NNS , CC WDT VBD PRP JJR , " CD NN VBD .
Stocks were down across the board , with Dutch PTT topping the volume list and closing down 1.90 guilders at 58.70 .	NNS VBD RB IN DT NN , IN NNP NNP VBG DT NN NN CC NN RB CD NNS IN CD .
The post and telecoms firm posted an 8.5 percent rise in first half earnings on Friday , just below analysts ' expectations .	DT NN CC JJ NN VBD DT CD NN NN IN JJ NN NNS IN NNP , RB IN NNS POS NNS .
IHC Caland reported first half results well under forecasts on Monday and the shares suffered as a result .	NNP NNP VBD RB NN NNS RB IN NNS IN NNP CC DT NNS VBD IN DT NN .
They were trading unchanged just before the release of figures but closed 2.40 guilders down at 80.70 after it reported net profits of 34.9 million guilders against 36.6 million last year and estimates ranging from 37.5 to 47.2 million . IHC also forecast post tax earnings rising 21 percent for the full year .	NNP RB VBN NN NN NNS VBG CD NN IN DT JJ NN .
Banking group ING traded ex-dividend today and finished 0.60 guilders weaker at 52.90 as a result .	NNP NN NN VBD NN NN CC VBD CD NNS JJR IN CD IN DT NN .
But Nutricia shrugged off its ex-div tag to soar a further 4.10 guilders to 214.40 continuing its explosive rally sparked by the 51 percent jump in first half net profits last week , which set the market alight on Friday , sending the shares up 18.40 at 210.00 by the close . Tapie to quit French assembly seat as film opens .	VBD TO VB JJ NN NN IN NN VBZ .
PARIS 1996-08-26	NNP CD
Former businessman and soccer boss Bernard Tapie said that he would give up his seat in the National Assembly by Wednesday , the day a film by Claude Lelouche in which he stars opens in France .	JJ NN CC NN NN NNP NNP VBD IN PRP MD VB RP PRP$ NN IN DT NNP NNP IN NNP , DT NN DT NN IN NNP NNP IN WDT PRP VBZ VBZ RB NNP .
" I will no longer be deputy by the time the film opens , " he said in a broadcast interview .	" PRP MD RB RB VB NN IN DT NN DT NN VBZ , " PRP VBD IN DT NN NN .
" Just about , " he told Europe 1 radio when asked whether he had sent his letter of resignation to Assembly speaker Philippe Seguin .	" RB IN , " PRP VBD NNP CD NN WRB VBD IN PRP VBD VBN PRP$ NN IN NN TO NNP NN NNP NNP .
A Seguin spokeswoman confirmed that no letter or call had yet been received .	DT NNP NN VBD IN DT NN CC VB VBD RB VBN VBN .
Tapie , 53 , was resigning just ahead of expected government action to eject him from the Assembly following a finding by the Supreme Court that he was bankrupt and thus ineligible for public office for a five-year period .	NNP , CD , VBD VBG RB RB IN JJ NN NN TO VB PRP IN DT NNP VBG DT NN IN DT NNP NNP IN PRP VBD VB CC RB JJ IN JJ NN IN DT JJ NN .
Tapie , the target of a blizzard of legal actions over his now-destroyed business empire and the Marseille soccer team he once ran , has a starring role in Lelouche 's " Homme , femmes : mode d'emploi " ( Men , women : instructions for use ) .	NNP , DT NN IN DT NN IN JJ NNS IN PRP$ JJ NN NN CC DT NNP NN NN PRP RB VBD , VBZ DT JJ NN IN NNP POS " NNP , VBZ : NN NN " ( NN , NNS : NNS IN NN ) .
He plays a power-hungry lawyer in the movie described as " a tender and cruel comedy " by Lelouche , who is making his 35th film .	PRP VBZ DT JJ NN IN DT NN VBN IN " DT NN CC JJ NN " IN NNP , WP VBZ VBG PRP$ JJ NN .
" I have paid too dearly for mixing two careers , " Tapie said . "	" PRP VBP VBN RB RB IN VBG CD NNS , " NNP VBD . "
In France , you cannot be a film artist and a national politician at the same time .	IN NNP , PRP MD VB DT NN NN CC DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN .
That is why I will no longer be deputy by the time the film opens . "	DT VBZ WRB PRP MD RB RB VB NN IN DT NN DT NN VBZ . "
Justice Minister Jacques Toubon began last month the formal process of ejecting Tapie from the French parliament as well as stripping him of his seat in the European parliament .	NNP NNP NNP NNP VBD JJ NN DT JJ NN IN VBG NNP IN DT JJ NN RB RB IN VBG PRP IN PRP$ NN IN DT JJ NN .
The French procedure was expected to be completed before October 2 , when the National Assembly is to reconvene after a summer break , but the European procedure was expected to take longer .	DT JJ NN VBD VBN TO VB VBN IN NNP CD , WRB DT NNP NNP VBZ TO VB IN DT NN NN , CC DT JJ NN VBD VBN TO VB JJR .
Tapie 's lawyer has said he intends to appeal to the European Court of Human Rights in an effort to prevent or delay the loss of his European seat .	NN POS NN VBZ VBN PRP VBZ TO VB TO DT NNP NNP IN NNP NNPS IN DT NN TO VB CC VB DT NN IN PRP$ NNP NN .
But such an appeal , even if the court were to accept the case , which it is not obliged to do , would not suspend enforcement of the French judgement against him .	CC PDT DT NN , RB IN DT NN VBD TO VB DT NN , WDT PRP VBZ RB VBN TO VB , MD RB VB NN IN DT JJ NN IN PRP .
Tapie faces a probable spell in prison after he loses his parliamentary immunity , since two appeal courts have confirmed jail sentences of eight and six months against him for tax fraud and rigging a soccer match .	NNP VBZ DT JJ NN IN NN IN PRP VBZ PRP$ JJ NN , IN CD NN NNS VBP VBN NN NNS IN CD CC CD NNS IN PRP IN NN NN CC NN DT NN NN .
He is appealing in both cases to the Supreme Court .	PRP VBZ VBG IN DT NNS TO DT NNP NNP .

The new pact expires on September 3 .	DT JJ NN VBZ IN NNP CD .

He said second-half profit growth would depend on customer demand for loans , which was already easing , and the performance of financial markets , which were strong in the first half and boosted securities , trading and underwriting income . Maybe it will be in single-digits , " Wijffels told Reuters .	RB PRP MD VB IN NNS , " NNP VBD NNP .
He said growth in customer demand in the first half was 50 percent above normal but it was hard to maintain this pace .	PRP VBD NN IN NN NN IN DT JJ DT VBD CD NN IN JJ CC PRP VBD JJ TO VB DT NN .

BRUSSELS	NNP
Michael Schumacher 's victory in the Belgian Formula One Grand Prix at Spa-Francorchamps sparked a speeding epidemic on Belgian roads after the race was over .	NNP NNP POS NN IN DT NNP NNP CD NNP NNP IN NNP VBD DT VBG NN IN JJ NNS IN DT NN VBD RB .

Thai PM proposes Sept 18 for no-confidence debate .	NNP NNP VBZ NNP CD IN NN NN .
BANGKOK 1996-08-26	NNP CD
Thai Prime Minister Banharn Silpa-archa on Monday proposed September 18 as the date for parliamentary debate on an opposition no-confidence motion accusing him of incompetence .	NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP IN NNP VBD NNP CD IN DT NN IN JJ NN IN DT NN NN NN VBG PRP IN NN .
The president of parliament had earlier said September 11 could be set for the debate .	DT NN IN NN VBD RBR VBD NNP CD MD VB VBN IN DT NN .
The opposition motion against Banharn accuses him of being incompetent , lacking ethical leadership and alleges his administration is corrupt .	DT NN NN IN NNP VBZ PRP IN VBG JJ , VBG JJ NN CC VBZ PRP$ NN VBZ JJ .
His critics allege he may be attempting to delay the debate .	PRP$ NNS VBP PRP MD VB VBG TO VB DT NN .
Banharn has denied the accusations and said he is ready to clear himself in parliament .	NNP VBZ VBN DT NNS CC VBD PRP VBZ JJ TO VB PRP IN NN .
" In my opinion September 18 would be a convenient date for the government to answer questions .	" IN PRP$ NN NNP CD MD VB DT JJ NN IN DT NN TO VB NNS .
This has nothing to do with the accusation that I am trying to escape the debate , " Banharn told reporters after meeting coalition partners .	DT VBZ NN TO VB IN DT NN IN PRP VBP VBG TO VB DT NN , " NNP VBD NNS IN VBG NN NNS .
Banharn 's 13-month-old , six-party coalition government controls 209 seats in the 391-seat lower house of parliament .	NNP POS JJ , JJ NN NN VBZ CD NNS IN DT JJ JJR NN IN NN .
Political infighting within Banharn 's Chart Thai party has raised doubts whether he can hold his supporters together and defeat the opposition motion , political analysts said .	JJ NN IN NNP POS NNP NNP NN VBZ VBN NNS IN PRP MD VB PRP$ NNS RB CC NN DT NN NN , JJ NNS VBD .
" We are still waiting to fix a date .	" PRP VBP RB VBG TO VB DT NN .
September 18 is regarded as tentative because we still have not received the order to fix it on the agenda , " said an official at parliament 's agenda section .	NNP CD VBZ VBN RB JJ IN PRP RB VBP RB VBN DT NN TO VB PRP IN DT NN , " VBD DT NN IN NN POS NN NN .
The last no-confidence debate against Banharn 's coalition in May was won by the government .	DT JJ NN NN IN NNP POS NN IN NNP VBD VBN IN DT NN .

Ecological warfare has broken out across the British construction industry , striking some of the biggest corporates as activists give up peaceful protests and seek to hit builders where it hurts -- their profit margins . Graham Gooch , the 43-year-old former England captain , is to continue playing county cricket for at least another season , his club Essex announced on Tuesday .	NNP NNP , DT JJ JJ NNP NN , VBZ TO VB VBG NN NN IN IN JJS DT NN , PRP$ NN NNP VBD IN NNP .

Miners led by Cozma rioted in Bucharest in 1990 and 1991 , bringing down the reformist government of premier Petre Roman .	NNP VBD IN NNP VBD IN NNP IN CD CC CD , VBG IN DT JJ NN IN NN NNP NNP .
Cozma is awaiting trial for assault and criminal damage in a bar in his home town of Petrosan , 300 kms west of Bucharest .	NNP VBZ VBG NN IN NN CC JJ NN IN DT NN IN PRP$ NN NN IN NNP , CD NNS RB IN NNP .
The attack on Lupu came during a tunnel skirmish between opposing players as they left the field .	DT NN IN NNP VBD IN DT NN NN IN VBG NNS IN PRP VBD DT NN .
" Cozma 's blow was not too painful because I 'm a tall man , " Lupu told Reuters on Tuesday .	" NNP POS NN VBD RB RB JJ IN PRP VBP DT JJ NN , " NNP VBD NNP IN NNP .
Lupu is one of the tallest players in Romania 's first division , towering over Cozma by some 17 cms ,	NNP VBZ CD IN DT JJS NNS IN NNP POS JJ NN , VBG IN NNP IN DT CD NN ,

Larry Fine	NNP NNP
NEW YORK 1996-08-27	NNP NNP CD
Stefan Edberg produced some of his vintage best on Tuesday to extend his grand run at the Grand Slams by toppling Wimbledon champion Richard Krajicek in straight sets at the U.S. Open . Edberg , competing in the 54th consecutive and final Grand Slam event of his illustrious career , turned back the clock at Stadium Court with a flowing 6-3 6-3 6-3 serve-and-volley victory over the fifth-seeded Dutchman . TENNIS - CHANG , WASHINGTON ADVANCE , TWO WOMEN 'S SEEDS FALL .	NNS : NN , NNP NNP , CD VBP VBZ NNP NN .
Larry Fine	NNP NNP
NEW YORK 1996-08-26	NNP NNP CD
Michael Chang is playing in his 10th U.S. Open and enjoying his highest seeding ever , but the 24-year-old American had to overcome a case of the jitters Monday before winning his first-round match on opening day .	NNP NNP VBZ VBG IN PRP$ JJ NNP NNP CC VBG PRP$ JJS VBG RB , CC DT JJ NNP VBD TO VB DT NN IN DT NNS NNP IN VBG PRP$ JJ NN IN NN NN .
Chang , seeded second behind defending champion Pete Sampras , took two hours 40 minutes to defeat 186th-ranked Jaime Oncins of Brazil 3-6 6-1 6-0 7-6 , 8-6 in the tiebreaker .	NNP , VBN JJ IN VBG NN NNP NNP , VBD CD NNS CD NNS TO VB JJ NNP NNP IN NNP CD CD CD RB , RB IN DT NN .
" I was pretty tight the whole match , " conceded Chang , one of the hottest players on tour this summer with a 16-2 record on hardcourts that included two titles and a runner-up finish . " Everyone has moments when they get tight .	" NN VBZ NNS WRB PRP VBP RB .

Tarango was leading 6-7 ( 5-7 ) 6-4 6-1 3-1 .	NNP VBD VBG JJ ( CD ) CD JJ CD .
Chang blamed breezy conditions for some of the erratic play in his match with Oncins , who had beaten him in the round of 32 at the 1992 Barcelona Olympics .	VBG VBN JJ NNS IN DT IN DT JJ NN IN PRP$ NN IN NNP , WP VBD VBN PRP IN DT NN IN CD IN DT CD NNP NNPS .
Chang committed an untidy 53 unforced errors , though he made seven fewer than the Brazilian , who also walloped a woeful 24 double faults .	VBG VBN DT JJ CD JJ NNS , IN PRP VBD CD JJR IN DT JJ , WP RB VBD DT JJ CD JJ NNS .
The most deflating double fault came when Oncins was serving to force a fifth set , leading 6-4 in the tiebreaker .	DT RBS JJ JJ NN VBD WRB NNP VBD VBG TO VB DT JJ NN , VBG CD IN DT NN .
The set point came after confusion at the net on the point previous , which was awarded to Oncins after the two exchanged shots at close quarters at the net .	DT VBN NN VBD IN NN IN DT JJ IN DT NN JJ , WDT VBD VBN TO NNP IN DT CD VBD NNS IN JJ NNS IN DT NN .

" Those little seconds were like an hour to me , " said Oncins , who promptly fired two serves barely contained by the baseline as he frittered away his best chance .	" DT JJ NNS VBD IN DT NN TO PRP , " VBD NNP , WP RB VBD CD VBZ RB VBN IN DT NN IN PRP VBN RB PRP$ JJS NN .

The 26-year-old Brazilian had risen into the top 30 in 1992 .	DT JJ JJ VBD VBN IN DT JJ CD IN CD .
The next year a close friend was struck by a stray bullet while riding home in a car from a soccer game in Sao Paulo .	DT JJ NN DT VBP NN VBD VBN IN DT JJ NN IN VBG NN IN DT NN IN DT NN NN IN NNP NNP .
He died slumped against Oncins , who subsequently lost interest in tennis .	PRP VBD VBN IN NNPS , WP RB VBN NN IN NN .
" Two months ago I started talking about quitting , " said Oncins , who decided to give it one last try and made it through the Open qualifying tournament last weekend .	" CD NNS RB PRP VBD VBG IN VBG , " VBD NNP , WP VBD TO VB PRP CD JJ NN CC VBD PRP IN DT NNP VBG NN JJ NN .
" I believe in my game again , " he said .	" PRP VBP IN PRP$ NN RB , " PRP VBD .

Former European champions Marseille held French champions Auxerre to a goalless draw in a lacklustre league match on Tuesday .	JJ JJ NNS NNP VBD JJ NNS FW TO DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN NN IN NNP .
The bill looked promising but both sides , struggling to find their form early in the season , were disappointing .	DT NN VBD JJ CC DT NNS , VBG TO VB PRP$ NN RB IN DT NN , VBD JJ .
Auxerre , who start their European Cup campaign next week against Ajax Amsterdam , dominated the match but were unable to score .	NNP , WP VBP PRP$ JJ NNP NN JJ NN IN NNP NNP , VBD DT NN CC VBD JJ TO VB .
Unbeaten in four matches , they still trail leaders Lens by one point .	NNS IN CD NNS , PRP RB VBP NNS NNP IN CD NN .
Lens , who have won all their three league matches so far , host Montpellier on Wednesday night .	NNP , WP VBP VBN DT PRP$ CD NN VBZ RB RB , NN NNP IN NNP NN .
Despite another dismal performance , especially in defence , Marseille restored some pride by keeping the reigning champions at bay after losing 2-1 at home to Metz last Saturday .	IN DT JJ NN , RB IN NN , NNP VBD DT NN IN VBG DT VBG NNS IN NN IN VBG CD IN NN TO NNP JJ NNP .
After two seasons in the second division and after taking on half a dozen new recruits this season , some of whom do not speak a word of French , Marseille are not playing with any fluidity . Marseille now lie seventh in the league on five points .	JJ RB VBP JJ IN DT NN IN CD NNS .

GENEVA 1996-08-27	NNP CD
Swiss league leaders Neuchatel Xamax said on Tuesday they would appeal against a nine-month ban imposed on French international defender Jean-Pierre Cyprien for his part in a post-match brawl .	JJ NN NNS NNP NNP VBD IN NNP PRP MD VB IN DT JJ NN VBN IN JJ JJ NN NNP NNP IN PRP$ NN IN DT JJ NN .
Cyprien , also fined 10,000 Swiss francs ( $ 8,400 ) , traded punches with St Gallen 's Brazilian player Claudio Moura after a match on Saturday .	NNP , RB VBD CD JJ NNS ( $ CD ) , VBD NNS IN NNP NNP POS JJ NN NNP NNP IN DT NN IN NNP .
When officials and coaching staff tried to intervene , Cyprien launched a flying kick at Moura , but only succeeded in kneeing St Gallen coach Roger Hegi in the stomach .	WRB NNS CC NN NN VBD TO VB , NNP VBD DT VBG NN IN NNP , CC RB VBD IN VBG NNP NNP NN NNP NNP IN DT NN .
Moura , who appeared to have elbowed Cyprien in the final minutes of the 3-0 win by Neuchatel , was suspended for seven matches and fined 1,000 francs ( $ 840 ) by the Swiss league disciplinary committee .	NNP , WP VBD TO VB VBN NNP IN DT JJ NNS IN DT CD VBP IN NNP , VBD VBN IN CD NNS CC VBD CD NNS ( $ CD ) IN DT JJ NN JJ NN .
Club president Gilbert Facchinetti said he was astonished the committee had arrived at its decision so quickly and vowed the club would appeal .	NN NN NNP NNP VBD PRP VBD VBN DT NN VBD VBN IN PRP$ NN RB RB CC VBD DT NN MD VB .
Neuchatel coach Gilbert Gress described the incident as " shocking " , but said Moura was also to blame .	JJ NN NNP NNP VBD DT NN IN " JJ " , CC VBD NNP VBD RB TO VB .
" Moura physically and verbally provoked Cyprien during the match .	" NNP RB CC RB VBN NNP IN DT NN .
The referee could not have seen it or he would have punished him , " Gress said .	DT NN MD RB VB VBN PRP CC PRP MD VB VBN PRP , " NNP VBD .
" During the scuffle , Moura threw the first punch .	" IN DT NN , NNP VBD DT JJ NN .
Tomorrow , if someone punches me , I would not know how to react . "	NN , IN NN VBZ PRP , PRP MD RB VB WRB TO VB . "
Cyprien , who won his one French cap against Italy in February 1994 , cannot play in Switzerland or elsewhere until May next year .	NNP , WP VBD PRP$ CD JJ NN IN NNP IN NNP CD , NN NN IN NNP CC RB IN NNP JJ NN .
CYCLING - BUGNO CLEARED OF DOPING .	VBG : FW VBN IN VBG .
MILAN 1996-08-27	NNP CD
Veteran Italian Gianni Bugno has been cleared of doping after testing positive for high levels of testosterone during the Tour of Switzerland in June , the Italian cycling federation said on Tuesday .	NNP NNP NNP NNP VBZ VBN VBN IN VBG IN VBG JJ IN JJ NNS IN NN IN DT NNP IN NNP IN NNP , DT JJ NN NN VBD IN NNP .
" He has been cleared .	" PRP VBZ VBN VBN .
The case is closed , " a spokesman said .	DT NN VBZ JJ , " DT NN VBD .
Bugno tested positive for the banned hormone after the fifth stage of the Tour , in which he finished third overall .	NN VBD JJ IN DT VBN NN IN DT JJ NN IN DT NNP , IN WDT PRP VBD JJ NN .
But the spokesman said subsequent tests in Cologne proved his body produced higher-than-average testosterone levels naturally .	CC DT NN VBD JJ NNS IN NNP VBD PRP$ NN VBD JJ NN NNS RB .
Bugno , who won the Giro d'Italia in 1990 and two successive world titles , was banned for three months in 1994 after testing positive for the stimulant caffeine .	NNP , WP VBD DT NNP NN IN CD CC CD JJ NN NNS , VBD VBN IN CD NNS IN CD IN VBG JJ IN DT NN NN .

BUDAPEST 1996-08-27	RB CD
Expectations that Cofinec S.A. , the Hungarian bourse 's first foreign listing , will report a disappointing first half have depressed the stock below its issue price , but analysts expect a rebound in the long term .	NNS IN NNP NNP , DT JJ NN POS JJ JJ NN , MD VB DT JJ JJ NN VBP VBN DT NN IN PRP$ NN NN , CC NNS VBP DT NN IN DT JJ NN .
" The first half of the year is unlikely to be as strong as expected so the company will probably be unable to reach its annual plan in 1996 , " said Gabor Sitanyi , a London-based analyst for ING Barings . between one-third of two-fifths of its annual plan , " said Tamas Erdei , a Budapest-based analyst for ABN-AMRO Hoare Govett .	IN NN IN NNS IN PRP$ JJ NN , " VBD NNP NNP , DT JJ NN IN NNP NNP NNP .
Analysts blame , at least partly , Hungary 's macroeconomic environment for the weaker figures for Cofinec which , operating in Hungary , Poland and the Czech Republic , now generates about 55 to 60 percent of its annual sales from Hungary . " The eastern European market offers good chances , " said Erdei . "	" DT JJ JJ NN VBZ JJ NNS , " VBD NNP . "
Just like many other companies on the bourse , Cofinec has big growth opportunities . "	RB IN JJ JJ NNS IN DT JJ , JJ VBZ JJ NN NNS . "

" Cofinec is a very good story in the long-term as the per capita packaging consumption is still so low in east Europe that a very strong increase can be expected ( long-term ) , " Sitanyi said , saying that several recent moves by Cofinec boosted its position . MFS shares surged on the news while WorldCom fell on fears of dilution .	NNP NNS VBD IN DT NN IN NNP VBD IN NNS IN NN .

The suit was filed because of Purepac 's manufacture of Kadian , a sustained release morphine product , Faulding said .	DT NN VBD VBN RB IN NNP POS NN IN NNP , DT JJ NN NN NN , NNP VBD .
Faulding said the claims in the lawsuit are without merit and will not impact upon the launch of Kadian in the United States .	NNP VBD DT NNS IN DT NN VBP IN NN CC MD RB VB IN DT NN IN NNP IN DT NNP NNP .
Kadian was approved for sale in the United States last month , Faulding said .	NNP VBD VBN IN NN IN DT NNP NNP JJ NN , NNP VBD .

Estonia 's parliament failed for a second time to elect a president on Tuesday , dealing a blow to incumbent Lennart Meri and pushing the country towards stalemate in its choice of a new head of state . Neither Meri , who oversaw Estonia 's first steps into statehood after the collapse of the Soviet Union , nor his arch-rival , former communist Arnold Ruutel , have secured the 68 votes necessary from the 101-member parliament .	DT NNP , WP VBD NNP POS JJ NNS IN NN IN DT NN IN DT NNP NNP , CC PRP$ JJ , JJ NN NNP NNP , VBP VBN DT CD NNS JJ IN DT JJ NN .
Meri garnered 49 votes and Meri 34 in Tuesday 's ballot for the five-year presidency of Estonia .	NNP VBD CD NNS CC NNP CD IN NNP POS NN IN DT JJ NN IN NNP .
A third and final vote was due to be held when parliament reconvened on Tuesday but legislators were not expecting a clear result .	DT JJ CC JJ NN VBD JJ TO VB VBN WRB NN VBN IN NNP CC NNS VBD RB VBG DT JJ NN .
If there is no result the decision will be ceded to an electoral college .	IN EX VBZ DT NN DT NN MD VB VBN TO DT JJ NN .

Under a constitution agreed in 1992 , a year after independence , the president has no executive powers .	IN DT NN VBN IN CD , DT NN IN NN , DT NN VBZ DT JJ NNS .
His only political role is to smoothe the functioning of government in periods of crisis .	PRP$ JJ JJ NN VBZ TO VB DT NN IN NN IN NNS IN NN .
But Meri , 67 , has been accused in parliament of taking too much power and not always consulting parliamentarians before making decisions .	CC NNP , CD , VBZ VBN VBN IN NN IN VBG RB JJ NN CC RB RB NN VBZ IN VBG NNS .
His relations with a leftist-led government have sometimes been tense .	PRP$ NNS IN DT JJ NN VBP RB VBN JJ .
His support in the first round of voting on Monday was much lower than expected , scoring only 45 votes , which political analysts put down as a vote of no confidence in his performance . This support only inched up to 49 in the second vote .	DT NN RB VBD IN TO CD IN DT JJ NN .
Support for Ruutel , 68 , remained constant at 34 votes .	NN IN NNP , CD , VBD JJ IN CD NNS .
If the third vote fails to give either Meri or Ruutel 68 votes , the parliamentary speaker will convene an electoral college of 101 MPs and 273 local goverment representatives to hold a new poll that could include new nominations . This would be the first time that the former Soviet republic has had to call together an electoral college .	DT MD VB DT JJ NN IN DT JJ JJ NN VBZ VBD TO VB RB DT JJ NN .

In the third vote Meri won 52 and Ruutel won 32 votes .	IN DT JJ NN NNP VBD CD CC NNP VBD CD NNS .
The final decision will now be made by a larger assembly .	DT JJ NN MD RB VB VBN IN DT JJR NN .

Ruutel won 34 votes in the first two secret ballots .	NNP VBD CD NNS IN DT JJ CD NN NNS .

The election will now go before an electoral college involving MPs and local government representatives that will be convened by the parliamentary Speaker in the next day or so .	DT NN MD RB VB IN DT JJ NN VBG NNS CC JJ NN NNS WDT MD VB VBN IN DT JJ NNP IN DT JJ NN CC RB .

Under the plan , the federal government would provide 100 percent of the financing needed to restructure debt of state banks being privatized , liquidated or turned into development banks .	IN DT NN , DT JJ NN MD VB CD NN IN DT NN VBN TO VB NN IN NN NNS VBG VBN , VBN CC VBD IN NN NNS .

Alejandro Lanusse , the former dictator who ruled Argentina for two years , died at age 78 on Monday .	NNP NNP , DT JJ NN WP VBD NNP IN CD NNS , VBD IN NN CD IN NNP .
Lanusse died after being brought to a hospital a week ago following a fall at home that resulted in a blood clot in the brain .	NNP VBD IN VBG VBN TO DT NN DT NN RB VBG DT NN IN NN WDT VBD IN DT NN NN IN DT NN .
He was operated on earlier in the week but failed to recover from surgery .	PRP VBD VBN IN JJR IN DT NN CC VBD TO VB IN NN .
The former dictator , who ruled from 1971 to 1973 , was best known for allowing Juan Domingo Peron , Argentina 's famed populist leader , to return to Argentina after 17 years of forced exile . Lanusse took over the leadership of the country after five years of dictatorship .	NNP VBD IN DT NN IN DT NN IN CD NNS IN NN .
But unlike his two predecessors , Juan Carlos Ongania and Marcelo Levingston , who ruled Argentina with an iron hand , Lanusse steered the country toward democracy .	CC IN PRP$ CD NNS , NNP NNP NNP CC NNP NNP , WP VBD NNP IN DT NN NN , NNP VBD DT NN IN NN .
That resulted in general elections in March 1973 when the Peronists led by Hector Campora and Vicente Solano Lima returned to power .	IN VBN IN JJ NNS IN NNP CD WRB DT NNP VBN IN NNP NNP CC NNP NNP NNP VBD TO NN .
Lanusse was a candidate in the election but failed to defeat his old adversories and never returned to public office .	NN VBD DT NN IN DT NN CC VBD TO VB PRP$ JJ NNS CC RB VBN TO JJ NN .
He was imprisoned for four years in 1951 for taking part in a coup attempt to overthrow Peron led by General Benjamin Menendez .	PRP VBD VBN IN CD NNS IN CD IN VBG NN IN DT NN NN TO VB NNP VBN IN NNP NNP NNP .
Lanusse 's rule saw the gradual rise of left-wing activism which culminated in another period of brutal Argentine dictatorship from 1976 to 1983 , during which the military launched its " dirty war " that resulted in 10,000 missing people .	NNP POS NN VBD DT JJ NN IN JJ NN WDT VBN IN DT NN IN JJ JJ NN IN CD TO CD , IN WDT DT JJ VBN PRP$ " JJ NN " IN VBN IN CD JJ NNS .
In his autobiography published in 1990 , Lanusse described himself as a military man with " democratic ideas . "	IN PRP$ NN VBN IN CD , NNP VBD PRP IN DT JJ NN IN " JJ NNS . "
He was born in Buenos Aires in 1918 and married Ileana Bell with whom he had nine children .	PRP VBD VBN IN NNP NNPS IN CD CC VBD NNP NNP IN WP PRP VBD CD NNS .
He entered the Military College in 1935 .	PRP VBD DT NNP NNP IN CD .

NNP POS NN NN NN VBZ VBN TO VB DT NN POS JJ NNP NNS IN NNS IN DT NN TO VB DT NN IN NNP POS JJ NNS , NNS VBD IN NNP .
The Maoists oppose multi-party democracy and want to establish a communist state .	DT NNPS VBP JJ NN CC VB TO VB DT JJ NN .
But the Nepali government said the insurgents must give up violence before it negotiates with them .	CC DT JJ NN VBD DT NNS MD VB RP NN IN PRP VBZ IN PRP .
" They ( the insurgents ) should first give up their violent activities , " Home ( Interior ) Minister Khum Bahadur Khadga said .	" PRP ( DT NNS ) MD RB VB RP PRP$ JJ NNS , " NNP ( NNP ) NNP NNP NNP NNP VBD .
About 54 people have died in Maoist insurgent activity and in police action against them since February , officials said .	IN CD NNS VBP VBN IN JJ NN NN CC IN NN NN IN PRP IN NNP , NNS VBD .
Nepali opposition parties have accused the police of having killed more people than the insurgents .	JJ NN NNS VBP VBN DT NN IN VBG VBN RBR NNS IN DT NNS .
Some human rights groups have criticised the government 's handling of the situation .	DT JJ NNS NNS VBP VBN DT NN POS NN IN DT NN .

" The government is ready to guarantee security of the Maoist representatives who want to take part in peaceful dialogue , " Khadga said .	" DT NN VBZ JJ TO VB NN IN DT NNP NNS WP VBP TO VB NN IN JJ NN , " NNP VBD .
A multi-party democracy was set up in Nepal six years ago , after a popular movement by the centrist Nepali Congress party jointly with the Communist United Marxist-Leninist ( UML ) party .	DT NN NN VBD VBN RP IN JJ CD NNS RB , IN DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NNP NNP NN RB IN DT NNP NNP NNP ( NNP ) NN .

Barrick said details involving the allocation between Barrick shares and cash will be available shortly .	NNP VBD NNS VBG DT NN IN NNP NNS CC NN MD VB JJ RB .

Experts have speculated the deposit has potential reserves of up to 12 million ounces .	NNS VBP VBN DT NN VBZ JJ NNS IN IN TO CD CD NNS .
More drilling results are expected soon .	JJR NN NNS VBP VBN RB .
The Barrick bid took observers by surprise , since Arequipa 's exploration was still in its early stages .	DT NNP NN VBD NNS IN NN , IN NNP POS NN VBD RB IN PRP$ JJ NNS .

SEC adopts rules to improve investor access to best stock prices .	NNP VBZ NNS TO VB NN NN TO JJS NN NNS .
WASHINGTON 1996-08-28	NNP CD
The Securities and Exchange Commission Wednesday approved rules designed to give stock market investors a better chance at getting the best price available for their orders .	DT NNP CC NNP NNP NNP VBD NNS VBN TO VB NN NN NNS DT JJR NN IN VBG DT JJS NN JJ IN PRP$ NNS .
The so-called order handling rules , which were proposed last September , were approved in a 4-0 vote .	DT JJ NN VBG NNS , WDT VBD VBN JJ NNP , VBD VBN IN DT JJ NN .
The new rules will require specialists at stock exchanges and market makers on Nasdaq to allow customers to view price quotes from other electronic trading systems that may not be readily available to them .	DT JJ NNS MD VB NNS IN NN NNS CC NN NNS IN NNP TO VB NNS TO VB NN NNS IN JJ JJ NN NNS WDT MD RB VB RB JJ TO PRP .
The rules will also require that customer limit orders be displayed with prices better than those available in quotes publicly available at the time .	DT NNS MD RB VB DT NN NN NNS VB VBN IN NNS JJR IN DT JJ IN NNS RB JJ IN DT NN .
Specialists and market makers are companies or individuals recognised as qualified to maintain an orderly market in a stock .	NNS CC NN NNS VBP NNS CC NNS VBD IN VBN TO VB DT JJ NN IN DT NN .
In a limit order , investors specify the price at which they are willing to buy or sell , as opposed to a market order executed at prevailing prices .	IN DT NN NN , NNS VBP DT NN IN WDT PRP VBP JJ TO VB CC VB , IN VBN TO DT NN NN VBN IN VBG NNS .
" These rules are intended to empower all investors , by allowing their orders to compete on a level playing field , and by providing the disclosure they need to make informed decisions , " said SEC Chairman Arthur Levitt .	" DT NNS VBP VBN TO VBP DT NNS , IN VBG PRP$ NNS TO VB IN DT NN VBG NN , CC IN VBG DT NN PRP VBP TO VB VBN NNS , " VBD NNP NNP NNP NNP .
The SEC 's goal , he added , was to create " one system where one price could be available to everybody . "	DT NNP POS NN , PRP VBD , VBD TO VB " CD NN WRB CD NN MD VB JJ TO NN . "
The director of the SEC 's division of market regulation , Richard Lindsey , said Wall Street firms will probably need to spend about $ 7 million to carry out the improvements called for by the new rules .	DT NN IN DT NNP POS NN IN NN NN , NNP NNP , VBD NNP NNP NNS MD RB VB TO VB IN $ CD CD TO VB RP DT NNS VBD IN IN DT JJ NNS .
In proposing the rules last year , the SEC noted that while technology has improved , commonplace practices still existed that worked against investors ' best interests .	IN VBG DT NNS JJ NN , DT NNP VBD IN IN NN VBZ VBN , JJ NNS RB VBD DT VBD IN NNS POS JJS NNS .
It noted that customers whose orders were not displayed lost the chance of getting the best possible price available in the market .	PRP VBD IN NNS WP$ NNS VBD RB VBN VBN DT NN IN VBG DT JJS JJ NN JJ IN DT NN .
It also cited the potential problem of a two-tiered market in which market makers quote one price to public investors while quoting better prices in private systems , thus robbing investors without access to " hidden " quotes the benefit of the best available prices .	PRP RB VBD DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN IN WDT NN NNS VBP CD NN TO JJ NNS IN VBG JJR NNS IN JJ NNS , RB VBG NNS IN NN TO " VBN " NNS DT NN IN DT JJS JJ NNS .
Earlier this month , the SEC settled charges of alleged malpractices on Nasdaq when the parent of the Nasdaq market , the National Association of Securities Dealers , agreed to spend $ 100 million over five years to upgrade its oversight of brokers ' trading practices . The SEC dropped a third proposal that would have allowed investors with market orders to trade at a better price if there were shifts in prices before their orders were executed .	DT NNP VBD DT JJ NN WDT MD VB VBN NNS IN NN NNS TO VB IN DT JJR NN IN EX VBD NNS IN NNS IN PRP$ NNS VBD VBN .
The agency said it would monitor effects of the two new rules before considering the " price improvement " proposal again .	DT NN VBD PRP MD VB NNS IN DT CD JJ NNS IN VBG DT " NN NN " NN RB .
The agency also proposed rule changes that would require continuous " bid " and " ask " quotations from exchange specialists and market makers who trade more than 1 percent of a stock during any quarter on Nasdaq . The SEC 's limit order display rule will mean a major change for Nasdaq , where such orders have never been displayed .	DT NNP POS NN NN NN NN MD VB DT JJ NN IN NNP , WRB JJ NNS VBP RB VBN VBN .
The president of the Nasdaq , Alfred Berkeley , was to hold a news conference Wednesday afternoon to elaborate on the new rules ' effects on the market , the second largest in the world . Martin Ayres	NNP NNP
MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-28	NNP , NNP CD
Britain 's Chris Boardman fulfilled his prediction that he would break the world 4,000 metres world record in the world track cycling championships on Wednesday .	NNP POS NNP NNP VBD PRP$ NN IN PRP MD VB DT NN CD NNS NN NN IN DT NN NN NN NNS IN NNP .

I do n't know if I can go any faster .	PRP VBP RB VB IN PRP MD VB DT JJR .

Weaver had been reported after being found guilty of irresponsible riding at the provincial track of Pontefract 10 days ago .	NNP VBD VBN VBN IN VBG VBN JJ IN JJ VBG IN DT JJ NN IN NNP CD NNS RB .
It was his fourth riding offence this season .	PRP VBD PRP$ JJ NN NN DT NN .
Although five days of the ban were suspended until January 1 , Weaver will miss next month 's big St Leger meeting , including the ride on top stayer Double Trigger in the Doncaster Cup . Richard Finn	NNP NNP
NEW YORK 1996-08-28	NNP NNP CD
Outspoken Andrei Medvedev exchanged his reputation as the clown prince of tennis on Wednesday for a new no-nonsense attitude that has made life on the courts fun again .	NNP NNP NNP VBD PRP$ NN IN DT NN NN IN NN IN NNP IN DT JJ JJ NN WDT VBZ VBN NN IN DT NNS JJ RB .

S.AFRICAN TRUTH BODY TO SUMMON APARTHEID POLICE .	NNP NNP NNP TO NNP NNP NNP .
CAPE TOWN 1996-08-28	NNP NNP CD
South Africa 's Truth and Reconciliation Commission said on Wednesday it would subpoena persons accused of human rights violations to appear before it .	NNP NNP POS NNP CC NNP NNP VBD IN NNP PRP MD VB NNS VBN IN JJ NNS NNS TO VB IN PRP .
" We can subpoena anyone we want to , even the president of the country , " spokesman John Allen told Reuters . "	" PRP MD VB NN PRP VBP TO , RB DT NN IN DT NN , " NN NNP NNP VBD NNP . "
Subpoenas are due to be served on a number of people this week . "	NNS VBP JJ TO VB VBN IN DT NN IN NNS DT NN . "
Media reports have speculated that the commission , which is trying to heal the wounds of apartheid by confronting the past , could subpoena apartheid-era President P.W. Botha and former police generals Basie Smit and Johan Van Der Merwe .	NNP VBZ VBP VBN IN DT NN , WDT VBZ VBG TO VB DT NNS IN NN IN VBG DT NN , MD VB NNP NNP NNP NNP CC JJ NN NNS NNP NNP CC NNP NNP NNP NNP .
In submissions last week to the commission National Party leader and former president F.W. De Klerk said he had received no co-operation from Botha in compiling his party 's report .	IN NN JJ NN TO DT NN NNP NNP NN CC JJ NN NNP NNP NNP VBD PRP VBD VBN DT NN IN NNP IN VBG PRP$ NN POS NN .
Since it began work in April the commission has been hearing harrowing tales from the victims of apartheid-era abuses , by both the white minority regime and its opponents .	IN PRP VBD NN IN NNP DT NN VBZ VBN VBG JJ NNS IN DT NNS IN JJ NNS , IN DT DT JJ NN NN CC PRP$ NNS .
It also wants to hear from those who committed the abuses , to whom it can offer amnesty in return for frankness .	PRP RB VBZ TO VB IN DT WP VBN DT NNS , TO WP PRP MD VB NN IN NN IN NN .
Hopes that reformed perpetrators would come forward voluntarily have faded but the commission has the legal power to force them to appear .	NNS IN VBN NNS MD VB RB RB VBP VBD IN DT NN VBZ DT JJ NN TO VB PRP TO VB .
Allen declined to give say who would be subpoenaed .	NNP VBD TO VB NN WP MD VB VBN .
" At the moment we have a preliminary list of less than 10 people , but this is just the beginning , " he said .	" IN DT NN PRP VBP DT JJ NN IN JJR IN CD NNS , CC DT VBZ RB DT NN , " PRP VBD .
The commission was set up last year to probe 30 years of human-rights violations during the apartheid era .	DT NN VBD VBN RP JJ NN TO VB CD NNS IN JJ NNS IN DT NN NN .
It is chaired by Nobel Peace winner , retired Archbishop Desmond Tutu .	PRP VBZ VBN IN NNP NNP NN , JJ NNP NNP NNP .
Allen said the commission could announce the names of subpoenaed persons on Monday next week .	NNP VBD DT NN MD VB DT NNS IN JJ NNS IN NNP JJ NN .

A Turkish airliner on flight from Istanbul to Vienna on Wednesday landed in emergency at Sofia airport after receiving a bomb threat , said an airport official .	DT JJ NN IN NN IN NNP TO NNP IN NNP VBD IN NN IN NNP NN IN VBG DT NN NN , VBD DT NN NN .
" The plane landed at Sofia airport at 1503 ( 1203 GMT ) after receiving a signal that there is an explosive on board , " the official , who declined to be named told Reuters .	" DT NN VBD IN NNP NN IN CD ( CD NNP ) IN VBG DT NN IN EX VBZ DT JJ IN NN , " DT NN , WP VBD TO VB VBN VBN NNP .

Reuters historical calendar - September 4 .	NNP JJ NN : NNP CD .
LONDON 1996-08-28	NNP CD
Following are some of the major events to have occurred on September 4 in history .	VBG VBP DT IN DT JJ NNS TO VB VBN IN NNP CD IN NN .
1241 - Alexander III , King of Scotland , born .	CD : NNP NNP , NNP IN NNP , VBN .
King from 1249-1286 , he consolidated royal power , leaving Scotland united and independent .	NNP IN CD , PRP JJ JJ NN , VBG NNP VBN CC JJ .
1260 - The Ghibellines retook the city of Florence from the Florentine Guelfs at the battle of Monte Aperto .	CD : DT NNPS VBD DT NN IN NNP IN DT JJ NNP IN DT NN IN NNP NNP .
1768 - Francois-Rene ( Vicomte de ) Chateaubriand born .	CD : JJ ( NNP NNP ) NNP VBN .
He was a politician , one of the first French romantic writers and ambassador to the British court .	PRP VBD DT NN , CD IN DT JJ JJ JJ NNS CC NN TO DT JJ NN .
He wrote " Rene " , a seminal work in the French romantic movement and a famous autobiography " Memoires d'Outre Tombe " .	PRP VBD " NNP " , DT JJ NN IN DT JJ JJ NN CC DT JJ NN " NNS NNP NNP " .
1781 - Los Angeles was founded by Spanish settlers and named " El Pueblo de Nuestra Senora La Reina de Los Angeles " ( The Town of Our Lady the Queen of the Angels ) .	CD : NNP NNP VBD VBN IN JJ NNS CC VBD " NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP FW NNP NNP " ( DT NNP IN PRP$ NNP DT NNP IN DT NNPS ) .
1824 - Anton Bruckner born .	CD : NNP NNP VBN .
Austrian composer and organist , he wrote nine symphonies on a huge scale and three grand masses in the romantic tradition .	JJ NN CC NN , PRP VBD CD NNS IN DT JJ NN CC CD JJ NNS IN DT JJ NN .
1870 - In France , the Second Empire was ended and Napoleon III was deposed after his surrender two days earlier in the Franco-Prussian war .	CD : IN NNP , DT NNP NNP VBD VBN CC NNP NNP VBD VBN IN PRP$ NN CD NNS RBR IN DT JJ NN .
1886 - At Skeleton Canyon in Arizona , Geronimo , Apache chief and leader of the last great Red Indian rebellion finally surrendered to General Nelson Miles .	CD : IN NNP NNP IN NNP , NNP , NNP NN CC NN IN DT JJ JJ NNP NNP NN RB VBD TO NNP NNP NNP .
1892 - Prolific French modernist composer Darius Milhaud born .	CD : NNP NNP JJ NN NNP NNP VBN .
He wrote a jazz ballet " La Creation du Monde " and scores for many films including an early version of " Madame Bovary " .	PRP VBD DT NN NN " NNP NN FW NNP " CC NNS IN JJ NNS VBG DT JJ NN IN " NNP NNP " .
1906 - German-born U.S. biologist Max Delbruck born .	CD : JJ NNP NN NNP NNP VBN .

LONDON 1996-08-28	NNP CD
The British government on Wednesday lowered the noise limits for London 's Heathrow , Gatwick and Stansted airports and announced it would make a bigger effort in detecting and fining violators . The limits , effective from January 1 , 1997 , are reduced as much as possible while still complying with international obligations , a spokesman for the Department of Transport said .	DT NNS , JJ IN NNP CD , CD , VBP VBN RB RB IN JJ IN RB VBG IN JJ NNS , DT NN IN DT NNP IN NNP VBD .
The maximum noise level during the day is trimmed by three decibels to 94 , while the night time level is reduced by two decibels to 87 .	DT JJ NN NN IN DT NN VBZ VBD IN CD NNS TO CD , IN DT NN NN NN VBZ VBN IN CD NNS TO CD .
" It is a smaller reduction in terms of loudness than was sought by local people .	" PRP VBZ DT JJR NN IN NNS IN NN IN VBD VBN IN JJ NNS .

The ministry said it believed the new limits could be met with existing aircraft . "	DT NN VBD PRP VBD DT JJ NNS MD VB VBN IN VBG NN . "
They can be flown in quieter ways , " a spokesman said .	PRP MD VB VBN IN JJR NNS , " DT NN VBD .
The reduction in noise levels is the same as proposed in a consultation paper which was published in October 1995 .	DT NN IN NN NNS VBZ DT JJ IN VBN IN DT NN NN WDT VBD VBN IN NNP CD .
The present noise levels have applied at Heathrow , one of the world 's busiest airports , since 1959 and at Gatwick since 1968 .	DT JJ NN NNS VBP VBN IN NNP , CD IN DT NN POS JJS NNS , IN CD CC IN NNP IN CD .

Above-normal summer rainfall in the U.S. High Plains has produced near-ideal conditions for planting the 1997 hard red winter wheat crop , analysts said Wednesday .	JJ NN NNS IN DT NNP NNP NNP VBZ VBN JJ NNS IN VBG DT CD JJ JJ NN NN NN , NNS VBD NNP .
From central Texas north to Kansas , rains throughout July and August have relieved most of the drought conditions that plagued the region earlier this year .	IN JJ NNP RB TO NNP , NNS IN NNP CC NNP VBP JJ JJS IN DT NN NNS WDT VBD DT NN RBR DT NN .
" Our moisture situation is excellent , especially for fall planting of winter wheat , " said Kim Anderson , extension wheat marketing economist at Oklahoma State University .	" PRP$ NN NN VBZ JJ , RB IN NN NN IN NN NN , " VBD NNP NNP , NN NN NN NN IN NNP NNP NNP .
The irony of the above-average summer rainfall was not lost on High Plains wheat producers , who only three months ago were caught in a drought so severe that old-timers likened conditions to the " Dust Bowl " days of the 1930s .	DT NN IN DT JJ NN NN VBD RB VBN IN NNP NNP NN NNS , WP RB CD NNS RB VBD VBN IN DT NN RB JJ IN JJ VBN NNS TO DT " NN NNP " NNS IN DT NNS .
" It 's definitely a turnabout from this past year , but you know last year we had pretty good moisture about this time of year , and then about October 1 it quit , " said Mark Hodges , executive director of the Oklahoma Wheat Commission . "	" PRP VBZ RB DT NN IN DT JJ NN , CC PRP VBP JJ NN PRP VBD RB JJ NN IN DT NN IN NN , CC RB IN NNP CD PRP VB , " VBD NNP NNP , JJ NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP . "
Hopefully that 's not going to happen this year . "	RB IN POS RB VBG TO VB DT NN . "
According to figures released by the Oklahoma Climatological Survey , an average of 20.19 inches fell across the state between March 1 and August 26 , 1996 .	VBG TO NNS VBN IN DT NNP NNP NNP , DT NN IN CD NNS VBD IN DT NN IN NNP CD CC NNP CD , CD .
That 's about 1/2 inch above the average for the same time period , according to Howard Johnson , associate state climatologist at the University of Oklahoma .	DT VBZ IN CD NN IN DT NN IN DT JJ NN NN , VBG TO NNP NNP , JJ NN NN IN DT NNP IN NNP .
He noted that the majority of that 20.19 inches had fallen since July .	PRP VBD IN DT NN IN DT CD NNS VBD VBN IN NNP .
As an example of just how dry it was , data showed that between October 1 , 1995 and March 1 , 1996 , the state received an average of only 4.6 inches of rainfall .	IN DT NN IN RB WRB JJ PRP VBD , NNS VBD IN IN NNP CD , CD CC NNP CD , CD , DT NN VBD DT NN IN RB CD NNS IN NNS .
In northern Texas , the current rainfall situation was similar to most of Oklahoma , said Rodney Mosier , executive assistant for the Texas Wheat Producers .	IN JJ NNP , DT JJ NN NN VBD JJ TO JJS IN NNP , VBD NNP NNP , NN NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP .
" Up here in the Texas Panhandle , we 've had some extremely beneficial rains that came through within the last several days and are really setting us up for ideal conditions for planting wheat , " Mosier said .	" IN RB IN DT NNP NNP , PRP VBP VBD DT RB JJ NNS WDT VBD IN IN DT JJ JJ NNS CC VBP RB VBG PRP IN IN JJ NNS IN NN NN , " NNP VBD .
But he warned that the situation was not as ideal in central and southern Texas , where mositure levels were still short despite the rains brought by Hurricane Dolly last week .	CC PRP VBD IN DT NN VBD RB RB JJ IN JJ CC JJ NNP , WRB NN NNS VBD RB RB IN DT NNS VBN IN NNP NNP JJ NN .

Burundi 's ambassador on Wednesday lashed out at economic sanctions imposed by African states and said any thought of an arms embargo would be a windfall for guerrillas fighting his army-run government . In a lengthy debate on Burundi before the U.N. Security Council , Ambassador Nsanze Terence said the new military government took over to stabilise the country and wanted negotiations under former Tanzanian President Julius Nyrere .	IN DT JJ NN IN NNP IN DT NNP NNP NNP , NNP NNP NNP VBD DT JJ JJ NN VBD IN TO VB DT NN CC VBD NNS IN JJ JJ NNP NNP NNP .
Nearly every African member who spoke , as well as most Security Council members , however , were unsympathetic towards the government of President Pierre Buyoya , an army major put in power in a July coup by the Tutsi-run military , which is locked in a guerrilla war with the majority Hutus .	RB DT JJ NN WP VBD , RB RB IN JJS NN NNP NNS , RB , VBD JJ IN DT NN IN NNP NNP NNP , DT NN JJ NN IN NN IN DT NNP NN IN DT NNP NN , WDT VBZ VBN IN DT JJ NN IN DT NN NNP .

Quite the contrary , Burundi has seen economic war declared against it by fellow African people ... a gratuitous immolation of the people of Burundi . "	PDT DT JJ , NNP VBZ VBN JJ NN VBD IN PRP IN NN JJ NNS : DT JJ NN IN DT NNS IN NNP . "
He said his government had just asked U.N. human rights monitors to increase their numbers in Burundi in an effort " to put an end to this vicious circle of violence . "	PRP VBD PRP$ NN VBD RB VBD NNP JJ NNS NNS TO VB PRP$ NNS IN NNP IN DT NN " TO VB DT NN TO DT JJ NN IN NN . "
More than 150,000 people have been killed in violence between the minority Tutsis and the majority Hutus since 1993 .	JJR IN CD NNS VBP VBN VBN IN NN IN DT NN NNP CC DT NN NNPS IN CD .
Botswana 's envoy , Mothusi Nkgowe , said coups should be relegated " to the dump heap of history " as there could be no justification for the overthrow of a legitimate government .	NNP POS NN , NNP NNP , VBD NNS MD VB VBN " TO DT NN NN IN NN " IN RB MD VB DT NN IN DT NN IN DT JJ NN .
Chile has proposed a resolution , still under discussion , that would impose an immediate arms embargo on Burundi and call for negotiations .	NNP VBZ VBN DT NN , RB IN NN , WDT MD VB DT JJ NNS NN IN NNP CC VB IN NNS .
The draft suggests further sanctions against those who impede a political solution .	DT NN VBZ JJ NNS IN DT WP VBP DT JJ NN .
Among the council 's five permanent members , Russia and the United States appeared to support most elements of the Chilean proposal , while Britain , France and China were cautious .	IN DT NN POS CD JJ NNS , NNP CC DT NNP NNP VBD TO VB RBS NNS IN DT JJ NN , IN NNP , NNP CC NNP VBD JJ .
Terence , a Tutsi , said any arms embargo would leave the army unable to defend itself against Hutu guerrillas and leave the population exposed to " armed terroritsts . "	NN , DT NNP , VBD DT NNS NN MD VB DT NN JJ TO VB PRP IN NNP NNS CC VB DT NN VBN TO " JJ NNS . "

A U.S. appeals court on Tuesday gave Lloyd 's a reprieve , throwing out an injunction that the insurance giant said could have led to its collapse .	DT NNP NNS NN IN NNP VBD NNP VBZ DT NN , VBG RP DT NN IN DT NN NN VBD MD VB VBN TO PRP$ NN .
A lower court issued the injunction on Friday and ordered Lloyd 's to give investors , known as Names , more information before requiring them to decide whether to accept a settlement offer as part of a reorganisation plan . Under the reorganisation plan , Lloyd 's plans to reinsure its massive liabilities into a new company called Equitas .	IN DT NN NN , NNP POS NNS TO VB PRP$ JJ NNS IN DT JJ NN VBD NNS .
The arrangement calls for investors to make additional payments to fund Equitas but also provides them with 3.2 billion stg in compensation to help reduce their prior outstanding liabilities .	DT NN VBZ IN NNS TO VB JJ NNS TO VB NNP CC RB VBZ PRP IN CD CD NN IN NN TO VB VB PRP$ RB JJ NNS .

But prosecutors face huge difficulties in gathering evidence and bringing witnesses to testify in a German court , and only one person has so far been convicted under the law .	CC NNS VBP JJ NNS IN NN NN CC VBG NNS TO VB IN DT JJ NN , CC RB CD NN VBZ RB RB VBN VBN IN DT NN .

BUNOL , Spain 1996-08-28	NNP , NNP CD
Revellers painted the town red on Wednesday as the 1996 edition of the world 's biggest tomato fight began in the eastern Spanish village of Bunol .	NNS VBD DT NN NN IN NNP IN DT CD NN IN DT NN POS JJS NN NN VBD IN DT JJ JJ NN IN NNP .
Thousands of people pelted each other with armfuls of ripe tomatoes as streets , walls and windows were coated in a blood-red wash .	NNS IN NNS VBN DT JJ IN NNS IN JJ NNS IN NNS , NNS CC NNS VBD VBN IN DT JJ NN .
A single firework after midday signalled the start of the fruit-throwing frenzy , during which participants hurl some 100 tonnes of tomatoes trucked in for the occasion .	DT JJ NN IN NN VBD DT NN IN DT JJ NN , IN WDT NNS VBP DT CD NNS IN NNS VBD RP IN DT NN .
Local historians say the tradition began in 1945 when disgruntled locals began spontaneously to bombard the priest and mayor at the annual fiesta in Bunol ( pronounced Boo-nee-OL ) .	JJ NNS VBP DT NN VBD IN CD WRB JJ NNS VBD RB TO VB DT NN CC NN IN DT JJ NNS IN NNP ( VBD NNP ) .
The festival 's fame has grown and now attracts between 15,000 and 20,000 people , many of them foreigners .	DT NN POS NN VBZ VBN CC RB VBZ IN CD CC CD NNS , JJ IN DT NNS .

Evelyn Leopold	NNP NNP
UNITED NATIONS 1996-08-28	NNP NNS CD
Iraq has balked at the number of U.N. staff needed to implement the oil-for-food deal , blaming the United States for insisting on stringent monitoring .	NNP VBZ VBN IN DT NN IN NNP NN VBD TO VB DT NN NN , VBG DT NNP NNP IN VBG IN JJ NN .
In comments to reporters and a statement on Tuesday , Iraqi diplomats said the cost of the monitors and other staff , which Baghdad has to finance , surpasses funds allocated for electricity , water , sewers , education and agriculture . At issue was a May 20 agreement allowing Iraq to sell $ 2 billion worth of oil to purchase badly needed food , medicine and other supplies to ease the impact of sanctions in force since its troops invaded Kuwait in August 1990 .	IN NN VBD DT NNP CD NN VBG NNP TO VB $ CD CD NN IN NN TO VB RB VBN NN , NN CC JJ NNS TO VB DT NN IN NNS IN NN IN PRP$ NNS VBD NNP IN NNP CD .

Iraq 's deputy ambassador , Saeed Hasan , noted that the May 20 accord said that the number of personnel would be determined by the United Nations and that the government of Iraq would be consulted . According to U.N. officials and diplomats , Iraq would have about $ 1.13 billion to spend for food , medicine and other goods after monies for a reparations fund for Gulf War victims and costs for U.N. weapons inspections were deducted . The cost of the U.N. staff overseeing the distribution of food and other supplies was estimated to cost $ 31 million .	DT NN IN DT NNP NN VBG DT NN IN NN CC JJ NNS VBD VBN TO VB $ CD CD .
In addition another $ 12 million was anticipated to cover other expenses , such as oil experts and administrative costs .	IN NN DT $ CD CD VBD VBN TO VB JJ NNS , JJ IN NN NNS CC JJ NNS .
For the distribution and supervision of humanitarian supplies the United Nations estimated it needed 1,190 people , including 267 international staff and 923 Iraqi support staff .	IN DT NN CC NN IN JJ NNS DT NNP NNPS VBD PRP VBD CD NNS , VBG CD JJ NN CC CD JJ NN NN .

Another 203 international staff and 325 Iraqis would run the programme in the central and southern parts of the country .	DT CD JJ NN CC CD NNPS MD VB DT NN IN DT JJ CC JJ NNS IN DT NN .
There are also 14 monitors to watch oil flows , 32 customs experts and four New York-based oil experts or overseers to approve contracts .	EX VBP RB CD NNS TO VB NN NNS , CD NNS NNS CC CD NNP JJ NN NNS CC NNS TO VB NNS .
