EU Commission cool on changing beef cull plan .	NNP NNP JJ IN VBG NN NN NN .
BRUSSELS 1996-08-29	NNP CD
The European Commission said on Thursday it would study scientific reports saying Britain 's mad cow epidemic would die out by 2001 but offered little prospect the findings would change an agreed slaughter campaign .	DT NNP NNP VBD IN NNP PRP MD VB JJ NNS VBG NNP POS JJ NN NN MD VB RP IN CD CC VBD JJ NN DT NNS MD VB DT JJ NN NN .
" Obviously we are interested in this research .	" RB PRP VBP JJ IN DT NN .
We will ask the ( EU ) scientific and veterinary committee to examine it , " Commission spokesman Gerard Kiely told Reuters .	PRP MD VB DT ( NNP ) JJ CC JJ NN TO VB PRP , " NNP NN NNP NNP VBD NNP .
But he added that new research into the dynamics of the bovine spongiform encephalopathy ( BSE ) , a fatal brain-wasting disease suffered by cattle , was unlikely to alter a slaughter plan agreed by Britain and its 14 EU partners .	CC PRP VBD IN JJ NN IN DT NNS IN DT JJ NN NN ( NNP ) , DT JJ JJ NN VBN IN NNS , VBD JJ TO VB DT NN NN VBN IN NNP CC PRP$ CD NNP NNS .
" We agreed that following detailed scientific analysis using a methodology which would take out the maximum number of BSE cases possible .	" PRP VBD IN VBG JJ JJ NN VBG DT NN WDT MD VB RP DT JJ NN IN NNP NNS JJ .
I think it would be very difficult to sell to the European Commission a programme which would involve the elimination of fewer BSE cases , " Kiely said .	PRP VBP PRP MD VB RB JJ TO VB TO DT NNP NNP DT NN WDT MD VB DT NN IN JJR NNP NNS , " NNP VBD .
" We will look at our approach ( to the plan ) but we wo n't get involved with the number of animals to be slaughtered , " he said .	" PRP MD VB IN PRP$ NN ( TO DT NN ) CC PRP MD RB VB JJ IN DT NN IN NNS TO VB VBN , " PRP VBD .
" We have always avoided the question of numbers of animals to be slaughtered , that 's not the issue .	" PRP VBP RB VBN DT NN IN NNS IN NNS TO VB VBN , WDT VBZ RB DT NN .
The issue is the protection of consumers ' health and the rapid eradication of BSE , " he added .	DT NN VBZ DT NN IN NNS POS NN CC DT JJ NN IN NNP , " PRP VBD .
The reaction is likely to disappoint British farmers , who seized on research by Oxford scientists in the scientific journal Nature saying it would be hard to get rid of the disease any faster than 2001 without killing vast numbers of cattle .	DT NN VBZ JJ TO VB JJ NNS , WP VBD IN NN IN NNP NNS IN DT JJ NN NNP VBG PRP MD VB JJ TO VB JJ IN DT NN DT JJR IN CD IN VBG JJ NNS IN NNS .
The researchers predicted there would be 340 new infections and 14,000 new cases of BSE before 2001 .	DT NNS VBN RB MD VB CD JJ NNS CC CD JJ NNS IN NNP IN CD .
British farmers ' leader called on Wednesday for an urgent meeting with ministers to discuss the report .	JJ NNS POS NN VBD IN NNP IN DT JJ NN IN NNS TO VB DT NN .
" I hope the government will now make it clear they believe there is a better way of dealing with this issue , " National Farmers Union president Sir David Naish told BBC radio .	" PRP VBP DT NN MD RB VB PRP JJ PRP VBP EX VBZ DT JJR NN IN VBG IN DT NN , " NNP NNP NNP NN NNP NNP NNP VBD NNP NN .
Naish said there was no need for Britain to carry out a planned cull of some 147,000 cattle to which it had reluctantly agreed to placate its European partners .	JJ VBD EX VBD DT NN IN NNP TO VB RP DT VBN JJ IN DT CD NNS TO WDT PRP VBD RB VBN TO VB PRP$ JJ NNS .
" The new evidence to me means some of that proposal should be re-examined because we could get away with considerably less animals being culled if in fact scientists throughout Europe accepted this evidence , " Naish said .	" DT JJ NN TO PRP VBZ DT IN DT NN MD VB JJ IN PRP MD VB RB IN RB CC NNS VBG VBN IN IN NN NNS IN NNP VBD DT NN , " NNP VBD .
The report could well reopen a damaging row between Britain and the EU , which slapped a worldwide ban on British beef after the government said there could be a link between BSE and the human form of the disease .	DT NN MD RB VB DT JJ NN IN NNP CC DT NNP , WDT VBD DT JJ NN IN JJ NN IN DT NN VBD RB MD VB DT NN IN NNPS CC DT JJ NN IN DT NN .
The issue flared in in March when government scientists admitted that people could become infected with Creutzfeldt-Jakob Disease ( CJD ) from eating BSE-infected beef .	DT NN VBD IN IN NNP WRB NN NNS VBD IN NNS MD VB VBN IN NNP NNP ( NNP ) IN VBG JJ NN .
French farmers set up blockades in mad cow protest .	JJ NNS VBD RP NNS IN JJ NN NN .
PARIS 1996-08-29	NNP CD
Thousands of farmers threw up roadblocks across France overnight , stopping and checking lorries suspected of importing meat from outside the European Union , French radios reported on Thursday .	NNS IN NNS VBD RB NNS IN NNP JJ , VBG CC NN NNS VBD IN VBG NN IN IN DT NNP NNP , JJ NNS VBN IN NNP .
Radio stations said around 15,000 farmers , angered by a fall in beef prices following the mad cow disease crisis , staged protests in many areas and blockaded several main roads and motorways .	NN NNS VBD IN CD NNS , VBD IN DT NN IN NN NNS VBG DT JJ NN NN NN , VBD NNS IN JJ NNS CC VBD JJ JJ NNS CC NNS .
By 3 a.m. ( 0100 GMT ) more than 2,000 lorries had been stopped and searched .	IN CD NN ( CD NNP ) JJR IN CD NNS VBD VBN VBN CC VBN .
European beef sales plunged after Britain announced the discovery of a likely link between bovine spongiform encephalopathy ( BSE ) , or mad cow disease , and its fatal human equivalent Creutzfeldt-Jakob Disease ( CJD ) . MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-29	NNP , NNP CD
Tight bowling from Glamorgan off-spinner Robert Croft helped England to restrict Pakistan to 225 for five in their 50 overs in the first one-day international at Old Trafford on Thursday .	NN NN IN JJ NN NNP NNP VBD NNP TO VB NNP TO CD IN CD IN PRP$ CD NNS IN DT JJ JJ JJ IN NNP NNP IN NNP .
Croft , who was one of the few Englishmen to make a good impression in his test debut at The Oval last week , showed great control as he first dried up the early flow of Pakistan runs and then collected the wickets of Aamir Sohail and Wasim Akram in a spell of 10-1-36-2 . After Wasim had won the toss and chosen to bat first , Pakistani made an excellent start as Sohail and Saeed Anwar continued their good form with an opening partnership of 82 .	IN NNP VBD VBN DT VB CC VBN TO VB RB , JJ VBN DT JJ NN IN NNP CC NNP NNP VBD PRP$ JJ NN IN DT NN NN IN CD .

Sohail and Ijaz Ahmed then added 59 for the second wicket before England struck back with three wickets for 19 in the space of five overs .	NN CC NNP NNP RB VBD CD IN DT JJ NN IN NNP VBD RP IN CD NNS IN CD IN DT NN IN CD NNS .

Wasim , who promoted himself to number four in the order , followed for six when Croft drifted another well-flighted delivery behind his legs .	NNP , WP VBD PRP TO NN CD IN DT NN , VBD IN CD WRB NNP VBD DT JJ NN IN PRP$ NNS .

Grobbelaar takes over until a permanent replacement is appointed for Zimbabwe 's previous coach , Switzerland 's Marc Duvillard .	JJ VBZ IN IN DT JJ NN VBZ VBN IN NNP POS JJ NN , NNP POS NNP NNP .
Grobbelaar now plays for English second division leaders Plymouth Argyle after years in the top flight with Liverpool and Southampton .	NN RB VBZ IN JJ JJ NN NNS NN NNP IN NNS IN DT JJ NN IN NNPS CC NNP .
Grobbelaar , fellow goalkeeper Hans Segers , retired striker John Fashanu and Malaysian businessman Heng Suan Lim pleaded not guilty in May to charges of giving or accepting bribes to fix English premier league matches . SEATTLE 1996-08-29	NNP CD

TENNIS - MARTINEZ GETS AGGRESSIVE AT U.S. OPEN .	NNS : NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP .
Larry Fine	NNP NNP
NEW YORK 1996-08-28	NNP NNP CD
Conchita Martinez decided that when in New York , do as the New Yorkers do -- and the Spaniard 's new-found aggressiveness seems to have put her in the right frame of mind for the U.S. Open .	NNP NNP VBD IN WRB IN NNP NNP , VBP IN DT NNP NNPS VBP : CC DT NNP POS JJ NN VBZ TO VB VBN PRP IN DT JJ NN IN NN IN DT NNP NNP .
The fourth-seeded Spaniard , who is tackling the world class traffic of New York City as a warm-up by driving to the tennis centre for her matches , ran over France 's Nathalie Tauziat 6-1 6-3 on Wednesday to take her place in the third round . Researchers report progress in muscular dystrophy .	NNS VB NN IN JJ NN .
PHILADELPHIA 1996-08-29	NNP CD
University of Pennsylvania researchers on Thursday said a new gene-therapy technique for treating muscular dystrophy disease had shown progress in laboratory animals .	NNP IN NNP NNS IN NNP VBD DT JJ JJ NN IN VBG JJ NN NN VBD VBN NN IN NN NNS .
Word of the findings , to be published in the Oct. 1 issue of the journal " Human Gene Therapy , " came in advance of the annual Jerry Lewis Labour Day weekend telethon to raise money for muscular dystrophy research .	NN IN DT NNS , TO VB VBN IN DT NNP CD NN IN DT NN " NNP NNP NNP , " VBD IN NN IN DT JJ NNP NNP NNP NNP NN NN TO VB NN IN JJ NN NN .
Several hurdles must be overcome before the method is used in human trials .	JJ NNS MD VB VBN IN DT NN VBZ VBN IN JJ NNS .
Nevertheless , " a treatment based on the new strategy .... may have the potential to benefit many patients , " the University of Pennsylvania Medical Centre said in a release .	RB , " DT NN VBN IN DT JJ NN NN MD VB DT JJ TO VB JJ NNS , " DT NNP IN NNP NNP NNP VBD IN DT NN .
Muscular dystrophy is a fatal illness in which the body 's muscle tissue degenerates and is replaced by fat .	JJ NN VBZ DT JJ NN IN WDT DT NN POS NN NN VBZ CC VBZ VBN IN NN .
Death strikes in early adulthood .	NN NNS IN JJ NN .
Individuals with the disease have a non-working version of a gene responsible for producing a crucial muscle protein called dystrophin .	NNS IN DT NN VB DT JJ NN IN DT NN JJ IN VBG DT JJ NN NN VBD NN .
In the study at the University 's Institute for Human Gene Therapy , researchers altered a common-cold virus to carry a version of the working dystrophin gene .	IN DT NN IN DT NNP POS NNP IN NNP NNP NNP , NNS VBD DT JJ NN TO VB DT NN IN DT VBG NN NN .
The virus , which also was altered to minimise its susceptibility to the immune system , was then injected into the muscle cells of mice bred to lack dystrophin genes .	DT NN , WDT RB VBD VBN TO VB PRP$ NN TO DT JJ NN , VBD RB VBN IN DT NN NNS IN NNS VBD TO VB NN NNS .
In the experiment , between 30 to 40 percent of the muscle fibers in one group of mice produced dystrophin for two weeks before diminishing .	IN DT NN , IN CD TO CD NN IN DT NN NNS IN CD NN IN NNS VBD NN IN CD NNS IN VBG .
Similar results had been obtained previously in test-tube cell cultures , but not in live animals , the university said .	JJ NNS VBD VBN VBN RB IN NN NN NNS , CC RB IN JJ NNS , DT NN VBD .
The university said methods are still needed to make enough of the altered virus to treat humans , to further decrease the immune-system response to the virus , and to deliver the virus to human muscle tissue .	DT NN VBD NNS VBP RB VBN TO VB RB IN DT JJ NN TO VB NNS , TO RBR VB DT NN NN TO DT NN , CC TO VB DT NN TO JJ NN NN .

The San Jose , Calif. , company was up 2-1/8 at 11-3/8 after its announcement Wednesday that it planned to pull out of the highly competitive modem-chip business and focus instead on the fast-growing market for computer networking equipment . WASHINGTON 1996-08-29	NNP CD

Swedish options and derivatives exchange OM Gruppen AB said on Thursday it would open an electronic bourse for forest industry products in London in the first half of 1997 .	JJ NNS CC NNS NN NNP NNP NNP VBD IN NNP PRP MD VB DT JJ NN IN NN NN NNS IN NNP IN DT JJ NN IN CD .
" Together with subsidiaries OMLX , the London Securities & Derivatives Exchange and OM Stockholm , OM Gruppen will open an international electronic bourse for forest products in the first half of 1997 , " OM Gruppen said in a statement .	" RB IN NNS NNP , DT NNP NNPS CC NNP NNP CC NNP NNP , NNP NNP MD VB DT JJ JJ NN IN NN NNS IN DT JJ NN IN CD , " NNP NNP VBD IN DT NN .
The first commodity to be traded on the PULPEX bourse will be pulp , but OM said trade would be extended to include products such as timber , recycled paper and other paper qualities .	DT JJ NN TO VB VBN IN DT NNP NN MD VB NN , CC NNP VBD NN MD VB VBN TO VB NNS JJ IN NN , JJ NN CC JJ NN NNS .
" Through the establishment of PULPEX , London will have a commodities bourse for forest products which complements existing bourses for oil , metals and ' softs ' ( coffee , sugar and cocoa ) , " OM said .	" IN DT NN IN NNP , NNP MD VB DT NNS NN IN NN NNS WDT VBZ VBG NNS IN NN , NNS CC '' NNS POS ( NN , NN CC NN ) , " NNP VBD .
PULPEX was the result of a three-year project run in cooperation between OM and representatives of the forest industry , the company said .	NN VBD DT NN IN DT JJ NN NN IN NN IN NNP CC NNS IN DT NN NN , DT NN VBD .
Huge swings in the price of pulp over the past few years have made pulp producers ' profitability unpredictable , and made investing in new production capacity a risky business .	JJ NNS IN DT NN IN NN IN DT JJ JJ NNS VBP VBN NN NNS POS NN JJ , CC VBD VBG IN JJ NN NN DT JJ NN .
" Without the ability to hedge prices , changes in the world market price for pulp has had an immediate impact on players ' profitability , " OM said .	" IN DT NN TO VB NNS , NNS IN DT NN NN NN IN NN VBZ VBD DT JJ NN IN NNS POS NN , " NNP VBD .
It said global production of pulp amounted to around 200 million tonnes per year , of which around 20 percent or 40 million tonnes was sold on the spot market .	PRP VBD JJ NN IN NN VBD TO IN CD CD NNS IN NN , IN WDT IN CD NN CC CD CD NNS VBD VBN IN DT NN NN .
At current prices , the value of this production was around $ 25 billion .	IN JJ NNS , DT NN IN DT NN VBD RB $ CD CD .

Hong Kong 's economy grew by only 3.1 percent in the first quarter , down from 5.9 percent a year earlier , and some private sector economists have revised downwards their predictions for the 1996 year . Tsang said three sets of meetings with Chinese authorities on Hong Kong 's 1997-98 budget , which will span the transition period , had gone smoothly . "	NNP VBD CD NNS IN NNS IN JJ NNS IN NNP NNP POS CD NN , WDT MD VB DT NN NN , VBD VBN RB . "
None of our basic precepts have been challenged . "	NN IN PRP$ JJ NNS VBP VBN VBN . "

Tsang said the market would continue to appreciate because property and land were scarce .	NNP VBD DT NN MD VB TO VB IN NN CC NN VBD JJ .

" There will be on the whole a slightly upward climb , consistent with our economic growth rate , " he said in reference to the property market .	" EX MD VB IN DT NN DT RB RB VB , JJ IN PRP$ JJ NN NN , " PRP VBD IN NN TO DT NN NN .
Tsang , the third senior figure in the government after the governor and chief secretary , said his stated aim was to serve as financial secretary for two years under British rule and three years under China . The government maintains the ban , announced earlier this month , is necessary to avoid a possible conflict of interest because civil servants are involved in determining government policy .	DT NN VBZ DT NN , VBD RB DT NN , VBZ JJ TO VB DT JJ NN IN NN IN JJ NNS VBP VBN IN VBG NN NN .

Hong Kong , a British colony for more than 150 years , will be handed back to China at midnight on June 30 next year .	NNP NNP , DT JJ NN IN RBR IN CD NNS , MD VB VBN RB TO NNP IN NN IN NNP CD JJ NN .
China intends to dismantle the territory 's first fully-elected legislature because it opposes Britain 's recent electoral reforms and install an interim appointed chamber , a decision that has generated considerable controversy . Police unions are not contesting the ban , which affects all 27,000 officers , and nor are the very top tier of Hong Kong 's mandarin class , the policy secretaries .	NNS NNS VBP RB VBG DT NN , WDT VBZ DT CD NNS , CC CC VBP DT JJ JJ NN IN NNP NNP POS NN NN , DT NN NNS .

The Islamist gathering , due to be held in London on September 8 , has triggered concern and anger in several other Arab countries like Egypt which is also fighting armed Moslem fundamentalists . Wall Street ponders Rubin 's role if Clinton wins .	NNP NNP VBZ NNP POS NN IN NNP VBZ .
Donna Sells	NNP NNP
NEW YORK	NNP NNP
The outcome of the November elections emerged as a hot topic on Wall Street this week as financial pundits debated whether Robert Rubin might forgo a second term as Treasury secretary if President Clinton is re-elected .	DT NN IN DT NNP NNS VBD IN DT JJ NN IN NNP NNP DT NN IN JJ NNS VBD IN NNP NNP MD VB DT JJ NN IN NNP NN IN NNP NNP VBZ VBN .

TENNIS - TARANGO , O'BRIEN SPRING TWIN UPSETS UNDER THE LIGHTS .	NNS : NNP , NNP NNP NNP NNP IN DT NNS .
Larry Fine	NNP NNP
NEW YORK 1996-08-30	NNP NNP CD
Andre Agassi escaped disaster on Thursday but Wimbledon finalist MaliVai Washington and Marcelo Rios were not so fortunate on a night of upsets at the U.S. Open .	NNP NNP VBD NN IN NNP CC NNP NN NNP NNP CC NNP NNP VBD RB RB JJ IN DT NN IN NNS IN DT NNP NNP .
The 11th-seeded Washington fell short of reprising his Wimbledon miracle comeback as he lost to red-hot wildcard Alex O'Brien 6-3 6-4 5-7 3-6 6-3 in a two hour 51 minute struggle on the Stadium court .	DT JJ NNP VBD RB IN VBG PRP$ NNP NN NN IN PRP VBD TO VB NN NNP NNP CD CD CD CD JJ IN DT CD NN CD NN NN IN DT NNP NN .

The temperamental left-hander defeated the Chilean 6-4 4-6 7-6 6-2 .	DT JJ JJ VBD DT JJ CD JJ CD NN .
The day programme went smoothly although sixth-seeded former champion Agassi had to wriggle out of a dangerous 3-6 0-4 hole , winning 18 of the last 19 games against India 's Leander Paes .	DT NN NN VBD RB IN JJ JJ NN NNP VBD TO VB RB IN DT JJ CD CD NN , VBG CD IN DT JJ CD NNS IN NNP POS NNP NNP .
But the night belonged to the upstarts .	CC DT NN VBD TO DT NNS .

" I just kept saying to myself , ' keep giving yourself the best chance to win , keep battling , maybe something will happen , ' " said the 26-year-old O'Brien , ranked 65th .	" PRP RB VBD VBG TO PRP , '' VBP VBG PRP DT JJS NN TO VB , VB VBG , RB NN MD VB , '' " VBD DT JJ NNP , VBD JJ .
" I kept my composure and I was proud of myself for that -- usually I would have folded up the tent and gone home . "	" PRP VBD PRP$ NN CC PRP VBD JJ IN PRP IN DT : RB PRP MD VB VBN RP DT NN CC VBN NN . "
The hard-serving O'Brien , a former U.S. collegiate national champion , fired up 17 aces to ultimately subdue the never-say-die Washington .	DT JJ NNP , DT JJ NNP JJ JJ NN , VBD RB CD NNS TO RB VB DT NN NNP .

The Texan blasted in two aces to hold serve at 5-2 and then converted his eighth match point for victory when Washington found the net with another backhand from 40-0 .	DT NN VBD IN CD NNS TO VB VB IN CD CC RB VBN PRP$ JJ NN NN IN NN WRB NNP VBD DT NN IN DT NN IN NN .

Tarango , whose Wimbledon tantrum two years ago brought him a $ 28,000 fine and suspension from this year 's tournament at the All-England Club , argued calls and taunted fans in his lively two hour , 24 minute tango with Rios on the grandstand . A boisterous cheering section backed the distracted Chilean and booed the lanky American , who ate up all the attention .	DT JJ NN NN VBD DT VBN JJ CC NN DT JJ NNP , WP VBD RP DT DT NN .
" I 'm an emotional player , " said the 104th-ranked Tarango . "	" PRP VBP DT JJ NN , " VBD DT JJ NNP . "
I think I played very well tonight , very focused . "	PRP VBP PRP VBD RB RB RB , RB VBN . "
The match turned on the third-set tiebreaker , which the American won 7-5 much to the dismay of the spectators .	DT NN VBD IN DT JJ NN , WDT DT NNP VBD CD JJ TO DT NN IN DT NNS .
" I love the crowd if they boo me every day .	" PRP VBP DT NN IN PRP VB PRP DT NN .
It fires me up , makes me play my best tennis , " Tarango said .	PRP VBZ PRP RP , VBZ PRP VBP PRP$ JJS NN , " NNP VBD .

ROMANIA COMELF H1 PROFIT RISE BELOW TARGET .	NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP NN NN .
BUCHAREST 1996-08-30	RB CD
Romanian listed state engineer Comelf said it almost doubled six-month output , with net profit rising by 33 percent to 1.069 billion lei .	JJ VBN NN NN NN VBD PRP RB VBD NN NN , IN JJ NN VBG IN CD NN TO CD CD NNS .
But the company complained inflation and the artificially high rate of the leu cut profit margins on exports , keeping profits well below its forecast of 1.4 billion lei .	CC DT NN VBD NN CC DT RB JJ NN IN DT FW VB NN NNS IN NNS , VBG NNS RB IN PRP$ NN IN CD CD NNS .
Comelf 's six-month output rose to 4,378 tonnes of equipment from 2,684 tonnes in the equivalent period in 1995 , the company report to the Bucharest stock exchange showed .	NN POS JJ NN VBD TO CD NNS IN NN IN CD NNS IN DT JJ NN IN CD , DT NN NN TO DT NNP NN NN VBD .
Comelf , based in the central Transylvanian town of Bistrita , manufactures water purification equipment , machinery for the thermal power sector and other equipment .	RB , VBN IN DT JJ NNP NN IN NNP , VBZ NN NN NN , NN IN DT JJ NN NN CC JJ NN .
" In the first six months of 1996 we concentrated on increasing the volume of our output and exports in particular and improving the quality of our products , " the report said .	" IN DT JJ CD NNS IN CD PRP JJ IN VBG DT NN IN PRP$ NN CC NNS IN JJ CC VBG DT NN IN PRP$ NNS , " DT NN VBD .
From January to June Comelf exported 59 percent of its output , up from 37.3 percent in the same period last year .	IN NNP TO NNP NNP VBD CD NN IN PRP$ NN , RB IN CD NN IN DT JJ NN JJ NN .
The company said higher than anticipated inflation and rising raw materials and wage costs also hit profits .	DT NN VBD JJR IN JJ NN CC VBG JJ NNS CC NN NNS RB VBD NNS .
Year-on-year inflation , initially estimated at 20 percent in December , was 33.8 percent in June , higher than a revised end-year forecast of 30 percent .	JJ NN , RB VBD IN CD NN IN NNP , VBD CD NN IN NNP , JJR IN DT VBN JJ NN IN CD NN .
The 12 month figure quickened to 40.3 percent in July .	DT CD NN NN VBN TO CD NN IN NNP .
The leu currency has slipped only gradually this year , and is currently quoted at an official rate of 3,162 to the dollar , well below the 3,550 retail price that exporters say is more realistic . Magna was up 1/8 to 48-1/4 on the New York Stock Exchange .	NNP VBD RB CD TO CD IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP .
Douglas & Lomason has 4.45 million common shares outstanding , some of which are option shares to be purchased at exercise prices less than the $ 31 offered price .	NNP CC NNP VBZ CD CD JJ NNS JJ , DT IN WDT VBP NN NNS TO VB VBN IN NN NNS JJR IN DT $ CD VBD NN .
The acquisition will beef up Markham , Ontario-based Magna 's North American car and truck seating business , allowing it to better compete with Johnson Controls Inc and Lear Corp .	DT NN MD VB RP NNP , JJ NNP POS JJ JJ NN CC NN VBG NN , VBG PRP TO RBR VB IN NNP NNP NNP CC NNP NNP .
Family-controlled Douglas & Lomason , which had 1995 revenue of $ 561 million , was finding it more difficult to compete for new seating contracts from vehicle makers , said James Hoey , chief financial officer . U.S. Agriculture Department officials said Friday that Mexican avocados -- which are restricted from entering the continental United States -- will not likely be entering U.S. markets any time soon , even if the controversial ban were lifted today . We probably would not see avacados come in until next season , next November . "	PRP RB MD RB VB JJ VBP IN IN JJ NN , JJ NNP . "
The Agriculture Department proposed more than a year ago to significantly ease an 82-year ban on Mexican avocados .	DT NNP NNP VBD JJR IN DT NN IN TO RB VB DT JJ NN IN JJ NNS .
Under the administration 's proposal , the borders to the Mexican produce would be opened into 19 Northern and Northeastern states from November through February .	IN DT NN POS NN , DT NNS TO DT NNS VBP MD VB VBN IN CD NNP CC NNP VBZ IN NNP IN NNP .
The plan has raised a storm of protest from U.S. avocado growers , who are largely concentrated in California .	DT NN VBZ VBN DT NN IN NN IN NNP JJ NNS , WP VBP RB VBN IN NNP .
California growers have charged that removing the restrictions , even on a limited basis , would endanger the $ 1 billion U.S. industry if potentially harmful Mexican insects were brought into the country along with the avocados . Mexican officials contend that there is no scientific basis for the ban , and that it is illegal under international trading rules of the World Trade Organisation .	JJ NNS VBP IN EX VBZ DT JJ NN IN DT NN , CC IN PRP VBZ JJ IN JJ NN NNS IN DT NNP NNP NNP .
Proponents of the plan discount the worries of the U.S. growers and say the plan has enough safeguards built into it to eliminate any significant threat to American producers .	NNS IN DT NN VB DT NNS IN DT NNP NNS CC VBP DT NN VBZ JJ NNS VBN IN PRP TO VB DT JJ NN TO JJ NNS .
Under the proposal , only imports of export-quality avocados growing in approved orchards in Michoacan , Mexico , the country 's main avocado area , would be allowed .	IN DT NN , RB NNS IN NN NNS VBG IN VBN NNS IN NNP , NNP , DT NN POS JJ NN NN , MD VB VBN .

The California Avocado Commission -- which has spearheaded the opposition to lifting the ban -- said new data the group submitted to the Agriculture Department last spring shows the department underestimated the pest problem in Mexico and have urged that the agency reopen its study of the issue . A 20-ton piece of the Titanic 's steel hull , which had been attached by cables to a recovery ship off the coast of Newfoundland , Canada , fell back to the bottom of the sea , said Erin Purcell of Boston-based Reagan Communications that represents two of the ships used in the expedition . Consumer spending , incomes edge up in July .	NN NN , NNS NN IN IN NNP .
Glenn Somerville	NNP NNP
WASHINGTON 1996-08-30	NNP CD
Consumer spending barely edged up in July , the Commerce Department said Friday , as income growth slowed abruptly to the weakest pace in six months .	NN NN RB VBN RP IN NNP , DT NNP NNP VBD NNP , IN NN NN VBD RB TO DT JJS NN IN CD NNS .
Spending rose 0.2 percent to a seasonally adjusted annual rate of $ 5.15 trillion after dropping a revised 0.4 percent in June .	NN VBD CD NN TO DT RB VBN JJ NN IN $ CD CD IN VBG DT VBN CD NN IN NNP .
Incomes from wages , salaries and all other sources gained 0.1 percent to a rate of $ 6.47 trillion after a 0.9 percent jump in June .	NNS IN NNS , NNS CC DT JJ NNS VBD CD NN TO DT NN IN $ CD CD IN DT CD NN NN IN NNP .
Department officials said July 's slight gain in incomes was the weakest for any month since January , when they were flat .	NNP NNS VBD NNP POS JJ NN IN NNS VBD DT JJS IN DT NN IN NNP , WRB PRP VBD JJ .
Wages and salaries came under pressure in July as a shorter average workweek and lower hourly earnings cut into paychecks .	NNS CC NNS VBD IN NN IN NNP IN DT JJR JJ NN CC JJR JJ NNS VBD IN NNS .
The department said wages and salaries decreased by $ 6.9 billion in July after climbing $ 45 billion in June .	DT NN VBD NNS CC NNS VBN IN $ CD CD IN NNP IN VBG $ CD CD IN NNP .
" In July , average weekly hours and average hourly earnings declined , more than offsetting the effect of an increase in employment , " Commerce said .	" IN NNP , JJ JJ NNS CC JJ JJ NNS VBD , JJR IN VBG DT NN IN DT NN IN NN , " NNP VBD .
But more money went into savings accounts , as savings held at 5.3 cents out of each dollar earned in both June and July .	CC JJR NN VBD IN NN NNS , IN NNS VBN IN CD NNS IN IN DT NN VBD IN DT NNP CC NNP .
That was the highest savings rate since October last year , when 5.5 cents out of each dollar earned was being saved .	DT VBD DT JJS NN NN IN NNP JJ NN , WRB CD NNS IN IN DT NN VBD VBD VBG VBN .
The generally lackluster report on spending and incomes in July had been expected .	DT RB JJ NN IN NN CC NNS IN NNP VBD VBN VBN .
At the same time , the department said in a separate report that new orders received by U.S. factories climbed strongly in July , with widespread gains across most major categories .	IN DT JJ NN , DT NN VBD IN DT JJ NN IN JJ NNS VBN IN NNP NNS VBD RB IN NNP , IN JJ NNS IN JJS JJ NNS .
Orders increased 1.8 percent to a seasonally adjusted $ 317.6 billion , significantly stronger than the 1 percent rise forecast by Wall Street economists .	NNS VBD CD NN TO DT RB VBN $ CD CD , RB JJR IN DT CD NN NN NN IN NNP NNP NNS .
That followed a revised 0.7 percent decline in June orders .	WDT VBD DT VBN CD NN NN IN NNP NNS .
Commerce said previously that spending at retail stores was up only 0.1 percent in July , partly because of softer sales of new cars and light trucks .	NNP VBD RB IN NN IN JJ NNS VBD RB RB CD NN IN NNP , RB IN IN JJR NNS IN JJ NNS CC NN NNS .
In addition , the Labour Department 's July employment report had foreshadowed the muted income growth .	IN NN , DT NNP NNP POS NNP NN NN VBD VBN DT JJ NN NN .
It showed average hourly earnings fell in July by 0.2 percent to $ 11.00 and the average workweek shortened to 34.3 hours from 34.7 in June .	PRP VBD JJ JJ NNS VBD IN NNP IN CD NN TO $ CD CC DT JJ NN VBN TO CD NNS IN CD IN NNP .
Gains in personal income , which includes wages and salaries as well as income from sources such as dividends , interest and businesses , are essential for funding consumer purchases , which fuel two-thirds of national economic activity .	NNS IN JJ NN , WDT VBZ NNS CC NNS RB RB IN NN IN NNS JJ IN NNS , NN CC NNS , VBP JJ IN NN NN NNS , WDT VBP NNS IN JJ JJ NN .
Spending on all types of durable goods , which includes cars , fell to an annual rate of $ 626.3 billion in July from $ 633.6 billion in June .	NN IN DT NNS IN JJ NNS , WDT VBZ NNS , VBD TO DT JJ NN IN $ CD CD IN NNP IN $ CD CD IN NNP .
But spending on nondurable products increased moderately to a rate of $ 1.55 trillion from $ 1.54 trillion in June , while spending for services was up to $ 2.97 trillion in July from $ 2.96 trillion . Payrolls of manufacturing companies rose in July by $ 2.3 billion to an annual rate of $ 678 billion .	NNS IN VBG NNS VBD IN NNP IN $ CD CD TO DT JJ NN IN $ CD CD .

Pirelli cables look to tap Chinese growth .	NNP NNS VB TO VB JJ NN .
David Jones	NNP NNP
MILAN 1996-08-30	NNP CD
Italian tyre and cables giant Pirelli on Friday announced its long-awaited move into China with a cables joint venture set to capitalise on the rapidly-growing Chinese telecommunications market .	JJ NN CC NNS NN NNP IN NNP VBD PRP$ JJ NN IN NNP IN DT NNS NN NN VBN TO VB IN DT JJ JJ NNS NN .
Pirelli is linking with Hong Kong-based group CITIC Pacific in a venture to be called the Wuxi Tong Ling Company Ltd , which will operate in partnership with a local industrial company at its existing factory in Wuxi , Jiangsu province , Shanghai .	NNP VBZ VBG IN NNP JJ NN NNP NNP IN DT NN TO VB VBN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP , WDT MD VB IN NN IN DT JJ JJ NN IN PRP$ JJ NN IN NNP , NNP NN , NNP .
The partners will invest around $ 30 million in the existing copper cable plant at Wuxi to update technology and include optic fibre production , with annual turnover expected to reach $ 60 million within the next few years .	DT NNS MD VB IN $ CD CD IN DT VBG NN NN NN IN NNP TO VB NN CC VB JJ JJ NN , IN JJ NN VBN TO VB $ CD CD IN DT JJ JJ NNS .
The move marks a further move by Pirelli 's cables division to expand in the fast-growing Far Eastern developing markets with the group already present in Indonesia , India and Malaysia .	DT NN VBZ DT JJR NN IN NNP POS NNS NN TO VB IN DT JJ NNP NNP VBG NNS IN DT NN RB JJ IN NNP , NNP CC NNP .
" This is really positive news for Pirelli , and I expect that it will produce one of the best half-year results in late September compared to other industrial Italian companies , " said analyst Paula Buratti at Indosuez .	" DT VBZ RB JJ NN IN NNP , CC PRP VBP IN PRP MD VB CD IN DT JJS JJ NNS IN JJ NNP VBN TO JJ JJ JJ NNS , " VBD NN NNP NNP IN NNP .
She emphasised that the move was positive because Pirelli will have management control of the Chinese venture , and it also showed another example of Pirelli exporting its technical know-how to developing markets .	PRP VBD IN DT NN VBD JJ IN NNP MD VB NN NN IN DT NNP NN , CC PRP RB VBD DT NN IN NNP VBG PRP$ JJ NN TO VBG NNS .
Pirelli shares reacted favourable even though talks had been underway for some time and news about a venture had been widely expected .	NNP NNS VBD JJ RB RB NNS VBD VBN RB IN DT NN CC NN IN DT NN VBD VBN RB VBN .
The shares rose 0.2 percent to 2,555 lire by 1350 GMT in an easier Milan stock market .	DT NNS VBD CD NN TO CD NNS IN CD VBP IN DT JJR NNP NN NN .
This will be Pirelli 's first industrial involvement in a Chinese market where demand for telecommunication networks is expected to grow to 80-100 million new lines between 1996 and 2000 , doubling demand for optical cables .	DT MD VB NNP POS JJ JJ NN IN DT JJ NN WRB NN IN NN NNS VBZ VBN TO VB TO CD CD JJ NNS IN CD CC CD , NN NN IN JJ NNS .
China 's second largest telecoms operator Unicom already has a mandate from the central government to establish 15 million new phone lines by the year 2000 , which will necessitate new trunk line systems and local distribution networks . ARLINGTON , Texas 1996-08-31	NNP , NNP NNP
Juan Gonzalez homered twice and Ivan Rodriguez added a two-run shot as the Texas Rangers defeated the Cleveland Indians 5-3 in a matchup of division leaders Friday .	NNP NNP VBD RB CC NNP NNP VBD DT JJ NN IN DT NNP NNPS VBD DT NNP NNPS JJ IN DT NN IN NN NNS NNP .
Rodriguez 's 18th homer , off Chad Ogea ( 7-5 ) in the first , gave Texas a 2-0 lead .	NNP POS JJ NN , RB NNP NNP ( CD ) IN DT NN , VBD NNP DT CD JJ .
One out later , Gonzalez smacked his 40th homer , extending his hitting streak to 20 games .	CD IN RB , NNP VBD PRP$ JJ NN , VBG PRP$ VBG NN TO CD NNS .
Gonzalez , who hit in 21 straight games earlier this season , joined Mickey Rivers as the only players in Texas history with two 20-game streaks in the same year .	NNP , WP VBD IN CD JJ NNS RBR DT NN , VBN NNP NNS IN DT JJ NNS IN NNP NN IN CD JJ NNS IN DT JJ NN .
Gonzalez hit his second homer in the third for his fifth multi-homer game of the season .	NNP VBD PRP$ JJ NN IN DT JJ IN PRP$ JJ NN NN IN DT NN .

Andy Colquhoun	NNP NNP
JOHANNESBURG 1996-08-31	NN CD
South Africa managed to avoid a fifth successive defeat in 1996 at the hands of the All Blacks with an emphatic 32-22 victory in front of an ecstatic Ellis Park crowd on Saturday .	NNP NNP VBD TO VB DT JJ JJ NN IN CD IN DT NNS IN DT DT NNPS IN DT JJ JJ NN IN NN IN DT JJ NNP NNP NN IN NNP .
They scored three tries in recording their highest total against New Zealand , salvaging some pride in a season in which the world champions have lost five out of eight tests .	PRP VBD CD VBZ IN NN PRP$ JJS JJ IN NNP NNP , VBG DT NN IN DT NN IN WDT DT NN NNS VBP VBN CD IN IN CD NNS .
It also ended a run of nine successive victories this year for New Zealand but arrived too late to prevent a 2-1 series defeat and an historic first All Black series triumph on South African soil . The All Blacks salvaged some pride by scoring two tries from centre Walter Little and scrum-half Justin Marshall in the final five minutes to close a gap which at one point stood at 24 points . A quick penalty from Van der Westhuizen five metres from the All Black line set up the third try for Venter five minutes later and when Joubert kicked his third penalty the Springboks held an unassailable 32-8 lead going into the last quarter . SQUASH - HILL BRANDS WORLD CHAMPION JANSHER A CHEAT .	NNP : MD NNPS NN NNP NNP NNP NNP .
HONG KONG 1996-08-31	IN VBG NNP
Controversial Australian Anthony Hill called Jansher Khan a cheat during his acrimonious defeat by the world number one in the Hong Kong Open semifinals on Saturday .	NNP NNP NNP NNP VBD NNP NNP DT VB IN PRP$ JJ NN IN DT NN NN CD IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNS IN NNP .
The match boiled over when Hill made to walk off court after what he claimed was a game-winning point in the third .	DT NN VBN IN WRB NNP VBD TO VB RP NN IN WP PRP VBD VBD DT JJ NN IN DT JJ .
When the referee called Jansher 's return good and the decision was accepted by the player , Hill shrieked at the Pakistani : " You cheat . "	WRB DT NN VBD NNP POS NN JJ CC DT NN VBD VBN IN DT NN , NNP VBD IN DT JJ : " PRP VB . "
" He was standing right there and knew the shot was down so I called him a cheat , " said Hill , whose squash career has been blighted by fines and suspensions for unacceptable behaviour .	" PRP VBD VBG RB RB CC VBD DT NN VBD RP IN PRP VBD PRP DT VB , " VBD NNP , WP$ NN NN VBZ VBN VBN IN NNS CC NNS IN JJ NN .
" He knew it was down and accepted what I called him because of that . "	" PRP VBD PRP VBD RB CC VBD WP PRP VBD PRP IN IN DT . "
Hill won the game on the next point and said later that Jansher was generally honest on court but played by the referee 's decision .	NNP VBD DT NN IN DT JJ NN CC VBD RBR IN NNP VBD RB JJ IN NN CC VBN IN DT NN POS NN .
The Australian had upset Jansher 's rhythm with his mixture of gamesmanship and fluent stroke-making but eventually succumbed 15-7 17-15 14-15 15-8 .	DT NNP VBD VBN NNP POS NN IN PRP$ NN IN NN CC JJ JJ CC RB VBD CD CD JJ CD .
" I changed my strategy against him today and had him rattled , " he added .	" PRP VBD PRP$ NN IN PRP NN CC VBD PRP VBD , " PRP VBD .
He is not as fit as he used to be be but was too good for me in the end .	PRP VBZ RB RB NN IN PRP VBD TO VB VB CC VBD RB JJ IN PRP IN DT NN .
I shook him a bit but he will come out next time and be a better player for it -- that 's Jansher . "	PRP VBD PRP DT NN CC PRP MD VB RP JJ NN CC VB DT JJR NN IN PRP : DT VBZ NNP . "
Jansher said that he was disturbed to be called a cheat . "	NNP VBD IN PRP VBD VBN TO VB VBN DT VB . "
What he did was bad for squash , bad for the crowd and bad for the sponsors .	WP PRP VBD VBD JJ IN NN , JJ IN DT NN CC JJ IN DT NNS .
" We are trying to build up squash like tennis and players should not say things like that .	" PRP VBP VBG TO VB RP NN IN NN CC NNS MD RB VB NNS IN DT .

Following are some of the major events to have occurred on September 7 in history .	VBG VBP DT IN DT JJ NNS TO VB VBN IN NNP CD IN NN .
1533 - Queen Elizabeth I born .	CD : NNP NNP PRP VBN .
Daughter of Henry VIII and his second wife Anne Boleyn , she was queen of England 1558-1603 .	NN IN NNP NNP CC PRP$ JJ NN NNP NNP , PRP VBD NN IN NNP NNS .
One of the great monarchs who presided over a period of English assertion in Europe in politics and the arts .	CD IN DT JJ NNS WP VBD IN DT NN IN JJ NN IN NNP IN NNS CC DT NNS .
1706 - French troops under Duke of Orleans besieging Turin were defeated by the Austrians under Prince Eugene , the French army was destroyed and they ceased trying to capture northern Italy .	CD : JJ NNS IN NNP IN NNP VBG NNP VBD VBN IN DT NNS IN NNP NNP , DT JJ NN VBD VBN CC PRP VBD VBG TO VB JJ NNP .
1714 - The Treaty of Baden was signed between the Holy Roman Emperor Charles VI and France , ending War of Spanish Succession .	CD : DT NNP IN NNP VBD VBN IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP CC NNP , VBG NNP IN NNP NNP .
Charles ceded Alsace and Strasbourg to France and got back Breisach , Kehl and Freiburg .	NNP VBD NNP CC NNP TO NNP CC VBD RB NNP , NNP CC NNP .
1812 - Russian army under General Kutuzov was defeated at heavy cost by Napoleon at the battle of Borodino 70 miles west of Moscow .	CD : JJ NN IN NNP NNP VBD VBN IN JJ NN IN NNP IN DT NN IN NNP CD NNS RB IN NNP .
Napoleon entered Moscow a week later .	NNP VBD NNP DT NN RB .
1822 - Brazil proclaimed independence from Portugal and Pedro I became first Emperor of Brazil in December 1822 .	CD : NNP VBD NN IN NNP CC NNP PRP VBD RB VB IN NNP IN NNP CD .
1836 - Scottish politician Sir Henry Campbell-Bannerman born .	CD : NNP NN NNP NNP NNP VBN .
As Liberal prime minister 1905-1908 he granted self-government to the Transvaal .	IN NNP JJ NN CD PRP VBD JJ TO DT NNP .
He also got the House of Lords to pass his Trades Disputes Act which gave labour unions more freedom to strike .	PRP RB VBD DT NNP IN NNPS TO VB PRP$ NNP NNP NNP WDT VBD NN NNS JJR NN TO VB .
1860 - Giuseppe Garibaldi leading his " Red Shirts " seized Naples in the Italian war of liberation against the Austrians .	CD : NNP NNP VBG PRP$ " NNP NNP " VBD NNP IN DT JJ NN IN NN IN DT NNPS .

This imposed an indemnity to be paid to the great powers for Boxer crimes .	DT VBD DT NN TO VB VBN TO DT JJ NNS IN NNP NNS .

Automakers , suppliers , insurers and the federal government 's auto safety agency Saturday launched a $ 10 million safety awareness campaign aimed at reducing the number of children killed accidentally by air bags in cars and trucks . Officials said they will work with law enforcement agencies , pediatricians and media to warn parents about the dangers that air bags pose to children and adults not wearing seatbelts .	NNS VBD PRP MD VB IN NN NN NNS , NNS CC NNS TO VB NNS IN DT NNS IN NN NNS VBP TO NNS CC NNS RB VBG NNS .
Since 1993 , 24 children have been killed by the explosive force of automotive air bags , which inflate at speeds up to 200 miles per hour .	IN CD , CD NNS VBP VBN VBN IN DT JJ NN IN JJ NN NNS , WDT VBP IN NNS IN TO CD NNS IN NN .
The first portion of the campaign involves pickup trucks equipped with billboards that were driving along some of the nation 's busiest interstate highways during the Labor Day weekend , including Interstate 95 on the East Coast , Interstates 80 and 90 in the Midwest and Interstate 5 in California . The boards read : " Air Bag Safety : Everyone Buckled , Kids in Back . "	DT NNS VBD : " NNP NNP NNP : NN NNP , NNPS IN RB . "
Janet Dewey , executive director of the industry-funded National Automobile Occupant Protection Campaign , said most of the injuries to children occurred because they were not wearing seatbelts .	NNP NNP , JJ NN IN DT JJ NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP , VBD JJS IN DT NNS TO NNS VBD IN PRP VBD RB VBG NNS .
A child 's chances of being killed in a car accident , whether the vehicle was equipped with an air bag or not , is reduced by 29 percent when they are in the rear seat , she said .	DT NN POS NNS IN VBG VBN IN DT NN NN , IN DT NN VBD VBN IN DT NN NN CC RB , VBZ VBN IN CD NN WRB PRP VBP IN DT NN NN , PRP VBD .
The auto industry was about three to six years away from introducing " smart " air bags with the ability to detect the size and position of an occupant and adjust inflation pressures accordingly .	DT NN NN VBD RB CD TO CD NNS RB IN VBG " JJ " NN NNS IN DT NN TO VB DT NN CC NN IN DT NN CC VB NN NNS RB .
Current air bags were designed to halt the forward momentum of an average-sized , unbelted adult male , not a small child .	JJ NN NNS VBD VBN TO VB DT JJ NN IN DT JJ , JJ NN NN , RB DT JJ NN .

PHILADELPHIA 1996-08-29	NNP CD
Randall Cunningham , the National Football League 's all-time leading rusher as a quarterback and one of the most athletic players ever to line up over centre , retired Thursday .	NNP NNP , DT NNP NNP NNP POS JJ VBG NN IN DT NN CC CD IN DT RBS JJ NNS RB TO NN IN IN NN , VBD NNP .
Cunningham played his entire 11-year career with the Philadelphia Eagles .	NNP VBD PRP$ JJ JJ NN IN DT NNP NNPS .
A three-time Pro Bowl selection , Cunningham rushed for 4,482 yards on 677 carries .	DT JJ FW NNP NN , NNP VBD IN CD NNS IN CD VBZ .
" I would like to thank the Eagles organisation and the wonderful fans of Philadelphia for supporting me throughout my career , " Cunningham said .	" PRP MD VB TO VB DT NNPS NN CC DT JJ NNS IN NNP IN VBG PRP IN PRP$ NN , " NNP VBD .
" Although it saddens me to leave , I am looking forward to spending more time with my family and pursuing other interests that have been on the back burner for sometime . "	" IN PRP VBZ PRP TO VB , PRP VBP VBG RB TO NN JJR NN IN PRP$ NN CC VBG JJ NNS WDT VBP VBN IN DT JJ NN IN RB . "
" Randall was one of the most exciting quarterbacks in NFL history , " said Eagles owner Jeffrey Lurie . "	" NNP VBD CD IN DT RBS JJ NNS IN NNP NN , " VBD NNPS NN NNP NNP . "
During his 11 years in Philadelphia , Randall was the cornerstone of the Eagles ' franchise and brought many great moments to fans in Philadelphia as well as across the NFL . "	IN PRP$ CD NNS IN NNP , NNP VBD DT NN IN DT NNPS POS NN CC VBD JJ JJ NNS TO NNS IN NNP RB RB IN IN DT NNP . "
A second-round choice in 1985 , Cunningham completed 1,874-of-3,362 passes ( 55.7 percent ) for 22,877 yards and 150 touchdowns .	DT NN NN IN CD , NNP VBD RB VBZ ( CD NN ) IN CD NNS CC CD NNS .
Cunningham has already been signed as a broadcaster .	NNP VBZ RB VBN VBN IN DT NN .

Adrian Warner	NNP NNP
BERLIN 1996-08-30	NNP CD
American Dennis Mitchell outclassed Olympic 100 metres champion Donovan Bailey for the third time at a major post-Games meeting in front of the most experienced sprinting crowd in the world on Friday .	NNP NNP NNP VBD NNP CD NNS VBP NNP NNP IN DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NNS NN IN NN IN DT RBS JJ NN NN IN DT NN IN NNP .

ROMANIA COMELF H1 PROFIT RISE BELOW TARGET .	NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP NN NN .
BUCHAREST 1996-08-30	RB CD
Romanian listed state engineer Comelf said it almost doubled six-month output , with net profit rising by 33 percent to 1.069 billion lei .	JJ VBN NN NN NN VBD PRP RB VBD NN NN , IN JJ NN VBG IN CD NN TO CD CD NNS .
But the company complained inflation and the artificially high rate of the leu cut profit margins on exports , keeping profits well below its forecast of 1.4 billion lei .	CC DT NN VBD NN CC DT RB JJ NN IN DT FW VB NN NNS IN NNS , VBG NNS RB IN PRP$ NN IN CD CD NNS .
Comelf 's six-month output rose to 4,378 tonnes of equipment from 2,684 tonnes in the equivalent period in 1995 , the company report to the Bucharest stock exchange showed .	NN POS JJ NN VBD TO CD NNS IN NN IN CD NNS IN DT JJ NN IN CD , DT NN NN TO DT NNP NN NN VBD .
Comelf , based in the central Transylvanian town of Bistrita , manufactures water purification equipment , machinery for the thermal power sector and other equipment .	RB , VBN IN DT JJ NNP NN IN NNP , VBZ NN NN NN , NN IN DT JJ NN NN CC JJ NN .
" In the first six months of 1996 we concentrated on increasing the volume of our output and exports in particular and improving the quality of our products , " the report said .	" IN DT JJ CD NNS IN CD PRP JJ IN VBG DT NN IN PRP$ NN CC NNS IN JJ CC VBG DT NN IN PRP$ NNS , " DT NN VBD .
From January to June Comelf exported 59 percent of its output , up from 37.3 percent in the same period last year .	IN NNP TO NNP NNP VBD CD NN IN PRP$ NN , RB IN CD NN IN DT JJ NN JJ NN .
The company said higher than anticipated inflation and rising raw materials and wage costs also hit profits .	DT NN VBD JJR IN JJ NN CC VBG JJ NNS CC NN NNS RB VBD NNS .
Year-on-year inflation , initially estimated at 20 percent in December , was 33.8 percent in June , higher than a revised end-year forecast of 30 percent .	JJ NN , RB VBD IN CD NN IN NNP , VBD CD NN IN NNP , JJR IN DT VBN JJ NN IN CD NN .
The 12 month figure quickened to 40.3 percent in July .	DT CD NN NN VBN TO CD NN IN NNP .
The leu currency has slipped only gradually this year , and is currently quoted at an official rate of 3,162 to the dollar , well below the 3,550 retail price that exporters say is more realistic . CHICAGO 1996-08-30	NNP CD
U.S. debt futures finished a shortened pre-holiday session sharply lower , as the markets were shaken by a stronger than expected rise in the August National Association of Purchasing Management ( NAPM ) index for the Chicago area , traders and analysts said .	NNP NN NNS VBD DT VBN NN NN RB RBR , IN DT NNS VBD VBN IN DT JJR IN VBN NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP IN NNP NNP ( NNP ) NN IN DT NNP NN , NNS CC NNS VBD .
The August Chicago NAPM rose 8.8 points to 60.0 , its highest level since 62.6 in February 1995 and the largest monthly rise since December 1993 .	DT NNP NNP NNP VBD CD NNS TO CD , PRP$ JJS NN IN CD IN NNP CD CC DT JJS JJ NN IN NNP CD .
Primary dealers immediately sold Eurodollar and bond futures , after the market on average was expecting the index to rise marginally to 51.9 from July 's 51.2 .	JJ NNS RB VBN NN CC NN NNS , IN DT NN IN JJ VBD VBG DT NN TO VB RB TO CD IN NNP POS CD .

Mexican avocados not expected in U.S .	JJ NNS RB VBN IN NNP .
Maggie McNeil	NNP NNP
WASHINGTON 1996-08-30	NNP CD
U.S. Agriculture Department officials said Friday that Mexican avocados -- which are restricted from entering the continental United States -- will not likely be entering U.S. markets any time soon , even if the controversial ban were lifted today .	NNP NNP NNP NNS VBD NNP IN JJ NNS : WDT VBP VBN IN VBG DT JJ NNP NNP : MD RB JJ VB VBG NNP NNS DT NN RB , RB IN DT JJ NN VBD VBN NN .
" The opportunity to import ( Mexican avocados ) probably wo n't become possible for another year , " said Paul Drazek , senior trade advisor to Agriculture Secretary Dan Glickman .	" DT NN TO VB ( JJ NNS ) RB MD RB VBN JJ IN DT NN , " VBD NNP NNP , JJ NN NN TO NNP NNP NNP NNP .
" We could lift the ban tomorrow , but that would not mean anything immediately , " said Drazek . "	" PRP MD VB DT NN NN , CC DT MD RB VB NN RB , " VBD NNP . "
We probably would not see avacados come in until next season , next November . "	PRP RB MD RB VB JJ VBP IN IN JJ NN , JJ NNP . "
The Agriculture Department proposed more than a year ago to significantly ease an 82-year ban on Mexican avocados .	DT NNP NNP VBD JJR IN DT NN IN TO RB VB DT JJ NN IN JJ NNS .
Under the administration 's proposal , the borders to the Mexican produce would be opened into 19 Northern and Northeastern states from November through February .	IN DT NN POS NN , DT NNS TO DT NNS VBP MD VB VBN IN CD NNP CC NNP VBZ IN NNP IN NNP .
The plan has raised a storm of protest from U.S. avocado growers , who are largely concentrated in California .	DT NN VBZ VBN DT NN IN NN IN NNP JJ NNS , WP VBP RB VBN IN NNP .
California growers have charged that removing the restrictions , even on a limited basis , would endanger the $ 1 billion U.S. industry if potentially harmful Mexican insects were brought into the country along with the avocados .	NNP NNS VBP VBN IN VBG DT NNS , RB IN DT JJ NN , MD VB DT $ CD CD NNP NN IN RB JJ JJ NNS VBD VBN IN DT NN IN IN DT NNS .
Mexican officials contend that there is no scientific basis for the ban , and that it is illegal under international trading rules of the World Trade Organisation .	JJ NNS VBP IN EX VBZ DT JJ NN IN DT NN , CC IN PRP VBZ JJ IN JJ NN NNS IN DT NNP NNP NNP .
Proponents of the plan discount the worries of the U.S. growers and say the plan has enough safeguards built into it to eliminate any significant threat to American producers .	NNS IN DT NN VB DT NNS IN DT NNP NNS CC VBP DT NN VBZ JJ NNS VBN IN PRP TO VB DT JJ NN TO JJ NNS .
Under the proposal , only imports of export-quality avocados growing in approved orchards in Michoacan , Mexico , the country 's main avocado area , would be allowed .	IN DT NN , RB NNS IN NN NNS VBG IN VBN NNS IN NNP , NNP , DT NN POS JJ NN NN , MD VB VBN .
Mexican growers and distributors would have to abide by strict rules established by the Mexican and U.S. agriculture agencies .	JJ NNS CC NNS MD VB TO VB IN JJ NNS VBN IN DT JJ CC NNP NN NNS .
The California Avocado Commission -- which has spearheaded the opposition to lifting the ban -- said new data the group submitted to the Agriculture Department last spring shows the department underestimated the pest problem in Mexico and have urged that the agency reopen its study of the issue .	DT NNP NNP NNP : WDT VBZ VBN DT NN TO VBG DT NN : VBD JJ NNS DT NN VBN TO DT NNP NNP JJ NN VBZ DT NN VBD DT NN NN IN NNP CC VBP VBN IN DT NN VB PRP$ NN IN DT NN .

Consumer spending , incomes edge up in July .	NN NN , NNS NN IN IN NNP .
Glenn Somerville	NNP NNP
WASHINGTON 1996-08-30	NNP CD
Consumer spending barely edged up in July , the Commerce Department said Friday , as income growth slowed abruptly to the weakest pace in six months .	NN NN RB VBN RP IN NNP , DT NNP NNP VBD NNP , IN NN NN VBD RB TO DT JJS NN IN CD NNS .
Spending rose 0.2 percent to a seasonally adjusted annual rate of $ 5.15 trillion after dropping a revised 0.4 percent in June .	NN VBD CD NN TO DT RB VBN JJ NN IN $ CD CD IN VBG DT VBN CD NN IN NNP .
Incomes from wages , salaries and all other sources gained 0.1 percent to a rate of $ 6.47 trillion after a 0.9 percent jump in June .	NNS IN NNS , NNS CC DT JJ NNS VBD CD NN TO DT NN IN $ CD CD IN DT CD NN NN IN NNP .
Department officials said July 's slight gain in incomes was the weakest for any month since January , when they were flat .	NNP NNS VBD NNP POS JJ NN IN NNS VBD DT JJS IN DT NN IN NNP , WRB PRP VBD JJ .
Wages and salaries came under pressure in July as a shorter average workweek and lower hourly earnings cut into paychecks .	NNS CC NNS VBD IN NN IN NNP IN DT JJR JJ NN CC JJR JJ NNS VBD IN NNS .
The department said wages and salaries decreased by $ 6.9 billion in July after climbing $ 45 billion in June .	DT NN VBD NNS CC NNS VBN IN $ CD CD IN NNP IN VBG $ CD CD IN NNP .
" In July , average weekly hours and average hourly earnings declined , more than offsetting the effect of an increase in employment , " Commerce said .	" IN NNP , JJ JJ NNS CC JJ JJ NNS VBD , JJR IN VBG DT NN IN DT NN IN NN , " NNP VBD .
But more money went into savings accounts , as savings held at 5.3 cents out of each dollar earned in both June and July .	CC JJR NN VBD IN NN NNS , IN NNS VBN IN CD NNS IN IN DT NN VBD IN DT NNP CC NNP .
That was the highest savings rate since October last year , when 5.5 cents out of each dollar earned was being saved .	DT VBD DT JJS NN NN IN NNP JJ NN , WRB CD NNS IN IN DT NN VBD VBD VBG VBN .
The generally lackluster report on spending and incomes in July had been expected .	DT RB JJ NN IN NN CC NNS IN NNP VBD VBN VBN .
At the same time , the department said in a separate report that new orders received by U.S. factories climbed strongly in July , with widespread gains across most major categories .	IN DT JJ NN , DT NN VBD IN DT JJ NN IN JJ NNS VBN IN NNP NNS VBD RB IN NNP , IN JJ NNS IN JJS JJ NNS .
Orders increased 1.8 percent to a seasonally adjusted $ 317.6 billion , significantly stronger than the 1 percent rise forecast by Wall Street economists .	NNS VBD CD NN TO DT RB VBN $ CD CD , RB JJR IN DT CD NN NN NN IN NNP NNP NNS .
That followed a revised 0.7 percent decline in June orders .	WDT VBD DT VBN CD NN NN IN NNP NNS .
Commerce said previously that spending at retail stores was up only 0.1 percent in July , partly because of softer sales of new cars and light trucks .	NNP VBD RB IN NN IN JJ NNS VBD RB RB CD NN IN NNP , RB IN IN JJR NNS IN JJ NNS CC NN NNS .
In addition , the Labour Department 's July employment report had foreshadowed the muted income growth .	IN NN , DT NNP NNP POS NNP NN NN VBD VBN DT JJ NN NN .
It showed average hourly earnings fell in July by 0.2 percent to $ 11.00 and the average workweek shortened to 34.3 hours from 34.7 in June .	PRP VBD JJ JJ NNS VBD IN NNP IN CD NN TO $ CD CC DT JJ NN VBN TO CD NNS IN CD IN NNP .
Gains in personal income , which includes wages and salaries as well as income from sources such as dividends , interest and businesses , are essential for funding consumer purchases , which fuel two-thirds of national economic activity .	NNS IN JJ NN , WDT VBZ NNS CC NNS RB RB IN NN IN NNS JJ IN NNS , NN CC NNS , VBP JJ IN NN NN NNS , WDT VBP NNS IN JJ JJ NN .
Spending on all types of durable goods , which includes cars , fell to an annual rate of $ 626.3 billion in July from $ 633.6 billion in June .	NN IN DT NNS IN JJ NNS , WDT VBZ NNS , VBD TO DT JJ NN IN $ CD CD IN NNP IN $ CD CD IN NNP .
But spending on nondurable products increased moderately to a rate of $ 1.55 trillion from $ 1.54 trillion in June , while spending for services was up to $ 2.97 trillion in July from $ 2.96 trillion . STOCKS SINK AS BOND RATES JUMP ON STRONG DATA	NNS NNP NNP NN NNS NNP NNP NNP NNP
Blue-chip stocks sank to their biggest loss since mid-July Thursday as fresh signs of a surprisingly strong economy boosted long-term bond interest rates above 7 percent .	JJ NNS VBD TO PRP$ JJS NN IN NN NNP IN JJ NNS IN DT RB JJ NN VBN JJ NN NN NNS IN CD NN .

Bootleg brew kills 35 in China , police nab suspects .	VBG NN VBZ CD IN NNP , NN NN NNS .
BEIJING 1996-08-30	VBG CD
Police in southwest China have arrested 30 people suspected of making and selling homemade alcohol that killed 35 people and poisoned 157 , the Xinhua news agency said on Friday .	NN IN JJS NNP VBP VBN CD NNS VBD IN NN CC VBG JJ NN WDT VBD CD NNS CC VBD CD , DT NNP NN NN VBD IN NNP .
A group of farmers in Huize county in the southwestern province of Yunnan were arrested for blending alcohol with methanol and selling the toxic liquor to local residents , the agency said .	DT NN IN NNS IN NN NN IN DT JJ NN IN NNP VBD VBN IN NN NN IN NN CC VBG DT JJ NN TO JJ NNS , DT NN VBD .
Between late June and July , a total of 192 people were poisoned by the toxic liquor , and 35 of them died and six were left severely handicapped , it said .	IN JJ NNP CC NNP , DT NN IN CD NNS VBD VBN IN DT JJ NN , CC CD IN PRP VBD CC CD VBD VBN RB NNS , PRP VBD .
Local authorities launched an investigation after they received reports of several similar deaths in the area , it said .	JJ NNS VBD DT NN IN PRP VBD NNS IN JJ JJ NNS IN DT NN , PRP VBD .
Post-mortem examinations showed they were all caused by methanol poisoning .	JJ NNS VBD PRP VBD DT VBN IN NN NN .
Police had confiscated the remainder of the poisonous liquor , Xinhua said .	NNS VBD VBN DT NN IN DT JJ NN , NNP VBD .
It gave no further details .	PRP VBD DT JJ NNS .

SINGAPORE 1996-08-30	JJR CD
Singapore hanged a Thai farmer at Changi Prison on Friday for drug trafficking , the Central Narcotics Bureau ( CNB ) said .	NNP VBD DT NNP NN IN NNP NNP IN NNP IN NN NN , DT NNP NNP NNP ( NNP ) VBD .
Jeerasak Densakul , 24 , was arrested in 1995 when he was found with 11 slabs of cannabis weighing 2.2 kg ( 4.8 pounds ) , the CNB said .	NNP NNP , CD , VBD VBN IN CD WRB PRP VBD VBN IN CD NNS IN NNS VBG CD JJ ( CD NNS ) , DT NNP VBD .
Singapore has a mandatory death sentence for anyone over 18 years of age found guilty of trafficking in more than 15 grams ( half an ounce ) of heroin , 30 grams ( an ounce ) of morphine or 500 grams ( 18 oz ) of cannabis or marijuana . In Jerusalem , Israeli security forces were bracing for thousands of Palestinians expected to answer Arafat 's call earlier this week to come to the city holy to Moslems , Arabs and Jews to pray in protest against Israel 's settlement policy in the West Bank and delay in peace negotiations . Israel , which captured and annexed East Jerusalem in 1967 , says it will never cede any part of the city .	NNP , WDT VBD CC VBD NNP NNP IN CD , VBZ PRP MD RB VB DT NN IN DT NN .

The Brazilian 's 79th-minute effort was enough to earn Real a point from a scrappy 1-1 draw at fellow title contenders Deportivo Coruna .	DT JJ POS JJ NN VBD JJ TO VB JJ DT NN IN DT JJ CD NN IN JJ NN NNS NNP NNP .
Deportivo started strongly , taking the lead midway through the first half when former Auxerre playmaker Corentine Martins headed home a corner after a flick-on by Brazilian-born Spanish international midfielder Donato . Shortly afterwards Roberto Carlos found space in the home defence and equalised for Real with a shot that was deflected past despairing Deportivo ' keeper Jacques Songo'o .	RB RB NNP NNP VBD NN IN DT NN NN CC VBD IN NNP IN DT NN WDT VBD VBN IN JJ NNP POS NN NNP NNP .
In a frantic final five minutes there were chances at both ends , and Donato , who had earlier been booked , was sent off for protesting about the incursion of Real players at a free kick . Before the match Deportivo chairman Augusto Lendoiro said he would ignore a FIFA decision banning Brazilian midfielder Mauro Silva from playing in the match for failing to join his national side 's tour of Europe . Andy Colquhoun	NNP NNP
JOHANNESBURG 1996-08-31	NN CD
South Africa managed to avoid a fifth successive defeat in 1996 at the hands of the All Blacks with an emphatic 32-22 victory in front of an ecstatic Ellis Park crowd on Saturday .	NNP NNP VBD TO VB DT JJ JJ NN IN CD IN DT NNS IN DT DT NNPS IN DT JJ JJ NN IN NN IN DT JJ NNP NNP NN IN NNP .
They scored three tries in recording their highest total against New Zealand , salvaging some pride in a season in which the world champions have lost five out of eight tests .	PRP VBD CD VBZ IN NN PRP$ JJS JJ IN NNP NNP , VBG DT NN IN DT NN IN WDT DT NN NNS VBP VBN CD IN IN CD NNS .

LONDON 1996-09-01	NNP NNP

Reuters historical calendar - September 7 .	NNP JJ NN : NNP CD .
LONDON 1996-08-31	NNP NNP
Following are some of the major events to have occurred on September 7 in history .	VBG VBP DT IN DT JJ NNS TO VB VBN IN NNP CD IN NN .
1533 - Queen Elizabeth I born .	CD : NNP NNP PRP VBN .
Daughter of Henry VIII and his second wife Anne Boleyn , she was queen of England 1558-1603 .	NN IN NNP NNP CC PRP$ JJ NN NNP NNP , PRP VBD NN IN NNP NNS .
One of the great monarchs who presided over a period of English assertion in Europe in politics and the arts .	CD IN DT JJ NNS WP VBD IN DT NN IN JJ NN IN NNP IN NNS CC DT NNS .
1706 - French troops under Duke of Orleans besieging Turin were defeated by the Austrians under Prince Eugene , the French army was destroyed and they ceased trying to capture northern Italy .	CD : JJ NNS IN NNP IN NNP VBG NNP VBD VBN IN DT NNS IN NNP NNP , DT JJ NN VBD VBN CC PRP VBD VBG TO VB JJ NNP .
1714 - The Treaty of Baden was signed between the Holy Roman Emperor Charles VI and France , ending War of Spanish Succession .	CD : DT NNP IN NNP VBD VBN IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP CC NNP , VBG NNP IN NNP NNP .
Charles ceded Alsace and Strasbourg to France and got back Breisach , Kehl and Freiburg .	NNP VBD NNP CC NNP TO NNP CC VBD RB NNP , NNP CC NNP .
1812 - Russian army under General Kutuzov was defeated at heavy cost by Napoleon at the battle of Borodino 70 miles west of Moscow .	CD : JJ NN IN NNP NNP VBD VBN IN JJ NN IN NNP IN DT NN IN NNP CD NNS RB IN NNP .
Napoleon entered Moscow a week later .	NNP VBD NNP DT NN RB .
1822 - Brazil proclaimed independence from Portugal and Pedro I became first Emperor of Brazil in December 1822 .	CD : NNP VBD NN IN NNP CC NNP PRP VBD RB VB IN NNP IN NNP CD .
1836 - Scottish politician Sir Henry Campbell-Bannerman born .	CD : NNP NN NNP NNP NNP VBN .
As Liberal prime minister 1905-1908 he granted self-government to the Transvaal .	IN NNP JJ NN CD PRP VBD JJ TO DT NNP .
He also got the House of Lords to pass his Trades Disputes Act which gave labour unions more freedom to strike .	PRP RB VBD DT NNP IN NNPS TO VB PRP$ NNP NNP NNP WDT VBD NN NNS JJR NN TO VB .
1860 - Giuseppe Garibaldi leading his " Red Shirts " seized Naples in the Italian war of liberation against the Austrians .	CD : NNP NNP VBG PRP$ " NNP NNP " VBD NNP IN DT JJ NN IN NN IN DT NNPS .

This imposed an indemnity to be paid to the great powers for Boxer crimes .	DT VBD DT NN TO VB VBN TO DT JJ NNS IN NNP NNS .
1909 - Elia Kazan born as Elia Kazanjoglus .	CD : NNP NNP VBN IN NNP NNP .
A U.S. stage and screen director , he is best known for " Viva Zapata " and " On the Waterfront " .	DT NNP NN CC NN NN , PRP VBZ JJS VBN IN " FW NNP " CC " IN DT VBG " .

South African right-wing Afrikaners on Saturday revived their campaign for a form of self-rule , identifying a sparsely-populated area in Northern Cape province as the best place for a home of their own . Chinese police hold veteran dissident .	JJ NN NN NN NN .
BEIJING 1996-08-31	VBG NNP
Chinese police have detained veteran dissident Wang Donghai , the New York-based pressure group Human Rights in China said on Saturday .	JJ NN VBP VBN JJ NN NNP NNP , DT NNP JJ NN NN NNP NNPS IN NNP VBD IN NNP .
Police in Hangzhou , capital of the eastern province of Zhejiang , told Wang 's family that Wang would be sent to a study class , a euphemism for coercive ideological reform , the group said .	NN IN NNP , NN IN DT JJ NN IN NNP , VBD NNP POS NN IN NNP MD VB VBN TO DT NN NN , DT NN IN JJ JJ NN , DT NN VBD .
Police gave no reason for detaining Wang on Friday and would not let his family meet him or say where he was being held , the group said .	NNS VBD DT NN IN VBG NNP IN NNP CC MD RB VB PRP$ NN VBP PRP CC VB WRB PRP VBD VBG VBN , DT NN VBD .
Police also would not say why Wang was being sent to a study class -- a holdover from the chaotic 1966-76 Cultural Revolution -- or say when he would be released , the group said .	NNS RB MD RB VB WRB NNP VBD VBG VBN TO DT NN NN : DT NN IN DT JJ CD NNP NNP : CC VB WRB PRP MD VB VBN , DT NN VBD .
Wang 's family and Hangzhou police could not be reached for immediate comment .	NNP POS NN CC NNP NN MD RB VB VBN IN JJ NN .
The group demanded Wang 's release and said his detention was a dangerous signal China was returning to its Cultural Revolution days .	DT NN VBD NNP POS NN CC VBD PRP$ NN VBD DT JJ NN NNP VBD VBG TO PRP$ NNP NNP NNS .
Last month , Wang , 45 , a veteran dissident of the 1979 Democracy Wall movement , was ordered to serve one year of " re-education through labour " , but released because of poor health .	JJ NN , NNP , CD , DT JJ NN IN DT CD NNP NNP NN , VBD VBN TO VB CD NN IN " NN IN NN " , CC VBD IN IN JJ NN .
Re-education through labour is an administrative punishment with a maximum of three years that can be imposed by police without recourse to prosecutors or the courts .	JJ IN NN VBZ DT JJ NN IN DT NN IN CD NNS WDT MD VB VBN IN NN IN NN TO NNS CC DT NNS .
Wang was jailed for two years for organising street protests after the military crushed pro-democracy demonstrations by students at Beijing 's Tiananmen Square on June 4 , 1989 , with heavy loss of life . Robert Kitson	NNP NNP
LONDON 1996-12-06	NNP CD
Centre Jason Little will miss Australia 's end-of-tour fixture against the Barbarians at Twickenham on Saturday .	NNP NNP NNP MD VB NNP POS JJ NN IN DT NNP IN NNP IN NNP .
Little has opted not to risk aggravating the knee injury which ruled him out of a large chunk of the tour and is replaced by fellow Queenslander Daniel Herbert .	NNP VBZ VBN RB TO VB JJ DT NN NN WDT VBD PRP IN IN DT JJ NN IN DT NN CC VBZ VBN IN JJ NNP NNP NNP .
Owen Finegan has recovered from the knocks he took in last weekend 's test against Wales and retains his place in the back-row ahead of Daniel Manu .	NNP NNP VBZ VBN IN DT VBZ PRP VBD IN JJ NN POS NN IN NNP CC VBZ PRP$ NN IN DT NN RB IN NNP NNP .

CRICKET - LARA ENDURES ANOTHER MISERABLE DAY .	NNP : NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP .
Robert Galvin	NNP NNP
MELBOURNE 1996-12-06	NNP CD
Australia gave Brian Lara another reason to be miserable when they beat West Indies by five wickets in the opening World Series limited overs match on Friday .	NNP VBD NNP NNP DT NN TO VB JJ WRB PRP VBD NNP NNP IN CD NNS IN DT NN NNP NNP JJ NNS VBP IN NNP .
Lara , disciplined for misconduct on Wednesday , was dismissed for five to extend a disappointing run of form on tour .	NNP , VBD IN NN IN NNP , VBD VBN IN CD TO VB DT JJ NN IN NN IN NN .
Australia , who hold a 2-0 lead in the five-match test series , overhauled West Indies ' total of 172 all out with eight balls to spare to end a run of six successive one-day defeats .	NNP , WP VBP DT CD JJ IN DT JJ NN NN , VBN NNP NNP POS NN IN CD DT IN IN CD NNS TO VB TO VB DT NN IN CD JJ JJ NNS .
All-rounder Greg Blewett steered his side to a comfortable victory with an unbeaten 57 in 90 balls to the delight of the 42,442 crowd .	JJ NNP NNP VBD PRP$ NN TO DT JJ NN IN DT JJ CD IN CD NNS TO DT NN IN DT CD NN .
Man-of-the match Blewett came to the wicket with the total on 70 for two and hit three fours during an untroubled innings lasting 129 minutes .	JJ NN NNP VBD TO DT NN IN DT JJ IN CD IN CD CC VBD CD NNS IN DT JJ NN VBG CD NNS .
His crucial fifth-wicket partnership with fellow all-rounder Stuart Law , who scored 21 , added 71 off 85 balls .	PRP$ JJ NN NN IN NN NN NNP NNP , WP VBD CD , VBD CD IN CD NNS .
Lara looked out of touch during his brief stay at the crease before chipping a simple catch to Shane Warne at mid-wicket .	NN VBD IN IN NN IN PRP$ JJ NN IN DT NN IN VBG DT JJ NN TO NNP NNP IN NNP .
West Indies tour manager Clive Lloyd has apologised for Lara 's behaviour on Tuesday .	NNP NNP NN NN NNP NNP VBZ VBN IN NNP POS NNS IN NNP .

The Melbourne crowd were clearly angered by the incident , loudly jeering the West Indies vice-captain as he walked to the middle .	DT NNP NN VBD RB VBN IN DT NN , RB VBG DT NNP NNP JJ IN PRP VBD TO DT NN .
It was left to fellow left-hander Shivnarine Chanderpaul to hold the innings together with a gritty 54 despite the handicap of an injured groin .	PRP VBD VBN TO NN JJ NNP NNP TO VB DT NN RB IN DT JJ CD IN DT NN IN DT JJ NN .

MELBOURNE 1996-12-06	NNP CD
West Indies batsman Brian Lara suffered another blow to his Australian tour , after already being disciplined for misconduct , when he was dismissed cheaply in the first limited overs match against Australia on Friday .	NNP NNP NN NNP NNP VBD DT NN TO PRP$ JJ NN , IN RB VBG JJ IN NN , WRB PRP VBD VBN RB IN DT JJ JJ NNS VB IN NNP IN NNP .
Lara , who earned a stern rebuke from his own tour management after an angry outburst against Australia wicketkeeper Ian Healy , scored five to prolong a run of poor form with the bat .	NNP , WP VBD DT JJ NN IN PRP$ JJ NN NN IN DT JJ NN IN NNP NN NNP NNP , VBD CD TO VB DT NN IN JJ NN IN DT NN .
The West Indies vice-captain struggled for timing during his 36-minute stay at the crease before chipping a ball from medium pacer Tom Moody straight to Shane Warne at mid-wicket .	DT NNP NNP JJ VBD IN NN IN PRP$ JJ NN IN DT NN IN VBG DT NN IN NN NN NNP NNP RB TO NNP NNP IN NNP .
West Indies were 53 for two in 15 overs when rain stopped play at the Melbourne Cricket Ground after captain Courtney Walsh won the toss and elected to bat .	NNP NNP VBD CD IN CD IN CD NNS WRB NN VBD VB IN DT NNP NNP NNP IN NN NNP NNP VBD DT VB CC VBN TO VB .
Lara 's outburst three days ago has clearly turned some of the Australian public against him .	NNP POS JJS CD NNS RB VBZ RB VBD DT IN DT JJ NN IN PRP .
As he walked to the wicket he was greeted by loud jeers from sections of the crowd .	IN PRP VBD TO DT NN PRP VBD VBN IN JJ NNS IN NNS IN DT NN .

Tour manager Clive Lloyd on Wednesday apologised for Lara 's behaviour in confronting Australia coach Geoff Marsh in the opposition dressing room to protest against his dismissal in the second test on Tuesday . Lloyd did not say what form the discipline would take .	NNP VBD RB VB WP VBP DT NN MD VB .
Lara , who holds the record for the highest score in test and first-class cricket , was unhappy about Healy 's role in the incident and questioned whether the ball had carried to the Australia keeper . Australia went on to win the match at the Sydney Cricket Ground by 124 runs to take a two-nil lead in the five-test series after Lara failed in both innings .	NNP VBD RP TO VB DT NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP IN CD VBZ TO VB DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN IN NNP VBD IN DT NN .

NCAA AMERICAN FOOTBALL-OHIO STATE 'S PACE FIRST REPEAT LOMBARDI AWARD WINNER .	NNP NNP NNP NNP POS NNP NNP NNP NNPS NNP NNP .
HOUSTON 1996-12-05	NNP CD
Ohio State left tackle Orlando Pace became the first repeat winner of the Lombardi Award Thursday night when the Rotary Club of Houston again honoured him as college football 's lineman of the year .	NNP NNP VBD VB NNP NNP VBD DT JJ NN NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP NN WRB DT NNP NNP IN NNP RB VBN PRP IN NN NN POS NN IN DT NN .
Pace , a junior , helped Ohio State to a 10-1 record and a berth in the Rose Bowl against Arizona State .	NNP , DT NN , VBD NNP NNP TO DT JJ NN CC DT NN IN DT NNP NNP IN NNP NNP .
He was the most dominant offensive lineman in the country and also played defensive line in goal-line situations .	PRP VBD DT RBS JJ JJ NN IN DT NN CC RB VBD JJ NN IN JJ NNS .
Last year , Pace became the first sophomore to win the award since its inception in 1970 .	JJ NN , NNP VBD DT JJ NN TO VB DT NN IN PRP$ NN IN CD .
Pace outdistanced three senior finalists -- Virginia Tech defensive end Cornell Brown , Arizona State offensive tackle Juan Roque and defensive end Jared Tomich of Nebraska .	NNP VBD CD JJ NNS : NNP NNP JJ NN NNP NNP , NNP NNP JJ NN NNP NNP CC JJ NN NNP NNP IN NNP .
The Lombardi Award is presented to the college lineman who , in addition to outstanding effort on the field , best exemplifies the characteristics and discipline of Vince Lombardi , legendary coach of the Green Bay Packers . with the United States and with the first woman ever to hold the position of Secretary of State .	IN DT NNP NNP CC IN DT JJ NN RB TO VB DT NN IN NNP IN NNP .

Havel , who helped lead the " velvet revolution " that ousted the Communist regime in Prague in 1989 , invited Albright , then working for a private foreign policy think tank , to advise his new democratic government in 1990 . Havel had a small malignant tumour removed from his lung on Monday and is recovering in hospital .	NNP VBD DT JJ JJ JJ VBN IN PRP$ NN IN NNP CC VBZ VBG IN NN .
Albright , born Marie Korbelova to a Czechoslovak diplomat in 1937 , fled with her family to the United States after the Communists came to power in a coup in 1948 .	NN , VBN NNP NNP TO DT JJ NN IN CD , VBD IN PRP$ NN TO DT NNP NNP IN DT NNPS VBD TO NN IN DT NN IN CD .
As an academic , Albright studied and lectured on Europe 's 20th century problems before becoming U.S. ambassador to the United Nations .	IN DT JJ , NNP VBD CC VBD IN NNP POS JJ NN NNS IN VBG NNP NN TO DT NNP NNPS .
Czech diplomats , seeking to have their country included in the expected expansion of NATO , praised the selection of Albright , known to be a strong supporter of alliance 's integration of former Soveit-bloc countries . " The nomination ...	" DT NN :
is a clear signal that one key of the lines of foreign policy will be the strengthening of the trans-Atlantic cooperation , a creation of strategic partnership between Europe and the US , " Foreign Minister Josef Zieleniec told Reuters . Marcin Grajewski	NNP NNP
WARSAW 1996-12-06	NNP CD
Poland said on Friday that Swiss bank accounts , which in many cases belonged to Polish Jews who died in the Holocaust , were used in debt settlements between the two countries after the World War Two .	NNP VBD IN NNP IN JJ NN NNS , WDT IN JJ NNS VBD TO NNP NNPS WP VBD IN DT NNP , VBD VBN IN NN NNS IN DT CD NNS IN DT NNP NNP CD .
Foreign Minister Dariusz Rosati , unveiling first findings of a special government commission , said that in 1970s the then communist Poland received 460,000 Swiss francs from the accounts .	NNP NNP NNP NNP , VBG JJ NNS IN DT JJ NN NN , VBD IN IN NNS DT RB JJ NNP VBD CD JJ NNS IN DT NNS .
" In 1970s , Poland received from unclaimed accounts in Switzerland a sum of 460,000 francs .	" IN NNS , NNP VBD IN JJ NNS IN NNP DT NN IN CD NNS .
What was its right ( to the money ) ...I do not know , " Rosati told a news conference .	WP VBD PRP$ JJ ( TO DT NN ) NNS VBP RB VB , " NNP VBD DT NN NN .
Switzerland stands accused by Senator Alfonse D'Amato , chairman of the powerful U.S. Senate Banking Committee , of agreeing to give money to Poland from unclaimed bank accounts of Polish citizens , as part of an accord on compensating Swiss nationals whose assets had been seized in communist Poland .	NNP VBZ VBN IN NNP NNP NNP , NN IN DT JJ NNP NNP NNP NNP , IN VBG TO VB NN TO NNP IN JJ NN NNS IN JJ NNS , IN NN IN DT NN IN VBG JJ NNS WP$ NNS VBD VBN VBN IN JJ NNP .
Many of these citizens were Jews murdered during the war , when Nazi German invaders killed most of Poland 's 3.5 million Jews .	JJ IN DT NNS VBD NNPS VBN IN DT NN , WRB NNP NNP NNS VBD JJS IN NNP POS CD CD NNPS .
Rosati did not say whether the payment in 1970s was part of the 1949 agreement between Warsaw and Switzerland on compensation to Swiss citizens whose assets were seized by the Soviet-imposed communists authorities after World War Two .	NNP VBD RB VB IN DT NN IN NNS VBD NN IN DT CD NN IN NNP CC NNP IN NN TO JJ NNS WP$ NNS VBD VBN IN DT JJ NNS NNS IN NNP NNP CD .
" I expect that the commission will finish gathering information within two to three weeks and then more details will be provided , " Rosati said .	" PRP VBP IN DT NN MD VB VBG NN IN CD TO CD NNS CC RB JJR NNS MD VB VBN , " NNP VBD .
Rosati confirmed that the 1949 agreement had provided for granting Switzerland about 53 million francs and most of this sum was repaid with coal exports .	NNP VBD IN DT CD NN VBD VBN IN VBG NNP IN CD CD NNS CC JJS IN DT NN VBD VBN IN NN NNS .
He said , however , that Switzerland did get about 16,000 francs from the so-called " dead accounts " as part of the compensation .	PRP VBD , RB , IN NNP VBD VB IN CD NNS IN DT JJ " JJ NNS " IN NN IN DT NN .
" About 16,000 francs were seized from accounts of four or five Polish citizens , whose data we do not precisely know .	" IN CD NNS VBD VBN IN NNS IN CD CC CD JJ NNS , WP$ NNS PRP VBP RB RB VBP .
The issue is of moral and legal nature , because its financial significance is small , " Rosati said .	DT NN VBZ IN JJ CC JJ NN , IN PRP$ JJ NN VBZ JJ , " NNP VBD .
Under pressure from international Jewish organisations , Swiss government has devised a plan to pay out millions of dollars in unclaimed bank accounts as a conciliatory gesture toward Holocaust victims . The conservative Radical Democrats ( FDP ) have said they would ask parliament next week to order Swiss banks to put some 40 million Swiss francs ( $ 31 million ) in dormant wealth into a fund earmarked for Jewish groups and charitable organisations . " I agree ... that without suitable undertakings the alliance would be likely to lead to a significant loss of actual and potential passengers , on those routes where BA and AA currently compete and for all passengers on the trans-Atlantic market route between the UK and U.S. , " he said . British Airways 's initial response was that " unconditional divestiture of slots is unprecedented and if done it must be on the basis of fair market value . "	NNP NNP POS JJ NN VBD IN " JJ NN IN NNS VBZ JJ CC IN VBN PRP MD VB IN DT NN IN JJ NN NN . "

A city official , who declined to be named , explained that Goldman , Sachs , which this summer was demoted to the second tier of the syndicate , proposed the floating rate issue and as a result was promoted to book runner for this offering . By selling the floating rate debt , the city hopes to establish a benchmark , the city official said , adding that it needed a large deal to accomplish this objective .	IN VBG DT VBG NN NN , DT NN VBZ TO VB DT NN , DT NN NN VBD , VBG IN PRP VBD DT JJ NN TO VB DT NN .
The city in late June sold its first issue of Euronotes , a strategy that it says saved it $ 500,000 in interest costs , and it has been trying to build on this strategy of expanding the pool of potential investors since then . In November , New York City said it became the first U.S. municipality to offer bonds for sale in European markets by competitive bidding as it listed taxable bonds on the London Stock Exchange . Brendan Intindola	NNP NNP
NEW YORK 1996-12-06	NNP NNP CD
Homestake Mining Co tops Wall Street 's list as the most likely white knight buyer for Santa Fe Pacific Gold Corp if Santa Fe rejects unsolicited suitor Newmont Mining Corp .	NNP NNP NNP VBZ NNP NNP POS NN IN DT RBS JJ JJ NN NN IN NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP IN NNP NNP VBZ JJ NN NNP NNP NNP .
Santa Fe is so far mum on the more than $ 2 billion stock swap takeover proposal from Newmont , announced Thursday .	NNP NNP VBZ RB RB JJ IN DT JJR IN $ CD CD NN NN NN NN IN NNP , VBD NNP .
Wall Street , since the bid , has speculated that any deal between Newmont and Santa Fe would be a " bear hug , " or a reluctantly negotiated agreement where the buyer is not necessarily a friendly suitor .
