Newmont said the companies have had previous contact , though declined to detail the encounters .	NNP VBD DT NNS VBP VBD JJ NN , IN VBN TO NN DT NNS .
Analysts predict Santa Fe will go to the highest bidder , and that if a rival buyer is found , Newmont may not be able to match its offer .	NNS VBP NNP NNP MD VB TO DT JJS NN , CC IN IN DT JJ NN VBZ VBN , NNP MD RB VB JJ TO VB PRP$ NN .
They said the Santa Fe deal , which includes desirable Nevada mining territory , would only payoff for Newmont longer term .	PRP VBD DT NNP NNP NN , WDT VBZ JJ NNP NN NN , MD RB VB IN NNP RB VB .
Newmont , in fact , will not benefit from the Santa Fe acquisition on an earnings basis for at least two years , which also limits its capacity to raise its offer .	NNP , IN NN , MD RB VB IN DT NNP NNP NN IN DT NNS NN IN IN JJS CD NNS , WDT RB VBZ PRP$ NN TO VB PRP$ NN .
Any deal , friendly or hostile , would almost assuredly be a stock swap , which is necessary to preserve the tax-free , pooling-of-interest accounting , they said .	DT NN , JJ CC JJ , MD RB RB VB DT NN NN , WDT VBZ JJ TO VB DT JJ , JJ NN , PRP VBD .
Analysts and arbitrageurs immediately ruled out Barrick Gold Corp and Bre-X Minerals Ltd as Santa Fe saviors because they are locked in negotiations over their splitting Indonesia 's Busang vast gold deposit . Placer Dome Inc too was considered unlikley because it is focusing on geographic expansion in areas that do match Santa Fe 's Nevada , South America and Central Asia presence , they said . A Homestake spokesman was not immediately available to comment on speculation that it tops the list .	DT NNP NN VBD RB RB JJ TO VB IN NN IN PRP VBZ DT NN .
Homestake , based in San Francisco , operates gold mines in the United States , Australia , Chile and Canada .	NNP , VBN IN NNP NNP , VBZ NN NNS IN DT NNP NNP , NNP , NNP CC NNP .
Earnings in 1995 were $ 0.22 per share , or $ 30.3 million , on revenues of $ 746.3 million .	NNS IN CD VBD $ CD IN NN , CC $ CD CD , IN NNS IN $ CD CD .
Santa Fe is headquartered Albuquerque , N.M. and reported 1995 earnings of $ 0.30 per share , or $ 40 million , on revenues of $ 350 million .	NNP NNP VBZ VBN NNP , NNP CC VBD CD NNS IN $ CD IN NN , CC $ CD CD , IN NNS IN $ CD CD .

PORT LOUIS 1996-12-06	JJ NNS CD
Mauritian authorities put the Indian Ocean island on cyclone alert on Friday .	JJ NNS VBD DT NNP NNP NN IN NN JJ IN NNP .
The weather services office said the centre of the intense tropical cyclone Daniella was 570 km ( 310 miles ) north by northwest of the island on Friday afternoon and was moving south by southwest at eight km an hour ( four knots ) .	DT NN NNS NN VBD DT NN IN DT JJ JJ NN NNP VBD CD NN ( CD NNS ) RB IN RB IN DT NN IN NNP NN CC VBD VBG RB IN JJ IN CD VBZ DT NN ( CD NNS ) .
Although not threatening Mauritius directly , it is coming closer to the island and could change direction , it added .	IN RB VBG NNP RB , PRP VBZ VBG RBR TO DT NN CC MD VB NN , PRP VBD .
Winds up to 75 km an hour ( 40 knots ) could blow over Mauritius during the night of Friday to Saturday , it said .	NNS IN TO CD PRP DT NN ( CD NNS ) MD VB RP NNP IN DT NN IN NNP TO NNP , PRP VBD .
The weather in the capital Port Louis was heavily cloudy on Friday afternoon with occasional showers .	DT NN IN DT NN NNP NNP VBD RB JJ IN NNP NN IN JJ NNS .
The northeastern coast of the nearby island of Madagascar has also gone on alert .	DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN IN NNP VBZ RB VBN IN NN .

Plastic surgery gets boost in Brazil .	NN NN VBZ NN IN NNP .
Simona de Logu	NNP NNP NNP
RIO DE JANEIRO 1996-12-06	NNP NNP NNP CD
Plastic surgery is booming , especially among men , as Brazilians spend much of their new-found wealth on the latest beauty treatments , said the organisers of a four-day international plastic surgery conference that opened on Friday .	NN NN VBZ JJ , RB IN NNS , IN NNS VBP JJ IN PRP$ JJ NN IN DT JJS NN NNS , VBD DT NNS IN DT JJ JJ JJ NN NN WDT VBD IN NNP .
The number of plastic surgeries in Brazil has jumped 30 percent to an estimated 150,000 this year since an anti-inflation plan was introduced in July 1994 , Farid Hakme , the president of the Brazilian Plastic Surgery Society ( SBCP ) , said .	DT NN IN NN NNS IN NNP VBZ VBN CD NN TO DT VBN CD DT NN IN DT JJ NN VBD VBN IN NNP CD , NNP NNP , DT NN IN DT JJ NNP NNP NNP ( NNP ) , VBD .
The number of operations on men increased even more -- by 80 percent , from 8,000 in 1994 to 15,000 in 1995 , he said .	DT NN IN NNS IN NNS VBD RB RBR : IN CD NN , IN CD IN CD TO CD IN CD , PRP VBD .
" Brazil ranks right at the top for plastic surgery with respect to the number of surgeons , the number of patients , number of operations , number of conferences .	" NNP VBZ RB IN DT NN IN NN NN IN NN TO DT NN IN NNS , DT NN IN NNS , NN IN NNS , NN IN NNS .
Our statistics are the highest for everything , " Hakme said .	PRP$ NNS VBP DT JJS IN NN , " NNP VBD .
" We believe the increase in plastic surgeries for men results from the difficulties in the job market .	" PRP VBP DT NN IN NN NNS IN NNS NNS IN DT NNS IN DT NN NN .
People need to have a more youthful look to compete in the job market , given the profound changes in Latin America 's economy . "	NNS VBP TO VB DT RBR JJ NN TO VB IN DT NN NN , VBN DT JJ NNS IN NNP NNP POS NN . "
A controlled exchange rate , trade liberalisation and tight monetary policies have also dramatically curbed inflation , making more money available for cosmetic surgery .	DT JJ NN NN , NN NN CC JJ JJ NNS VBP RB RB VBN NN , VBG JJR NN JJ IN JJ NN .
Brazil has been at the forefront in plastic surgery for decades and is home to one of the most famous surgeons , Ivo Pitangy .	NNP VBZ VBN IN DT NN IN JJ NN IN NNS CC VBZ NN TO CD IN DT RBS JJ NNS , NNP NNP .
There are 6,000 plastic surgeons there , of which 4,500 have qualified to be members of the SBCP .	EX VBP CD NN NNS RB , IN WDT CD VBP VBN TO VB NNS IN DT NNP .
Every year , 500 new plastic surgeons graduate in Brazil and medical students from all over the world come to study there .	DT NN , CD JJ NN NNS NN IN NNP CC JJ NNS IN DT IN DT NN VB TO VB RB .
Hakme attributes Brazil 's fascination with plastic surgery not to excessive vanity but to the country 's mix and match of different races , which can create physical disharmonies . "	VB NNS NNP POS NN IN JJ NN RB TO JJ NN CC TO DT NN POS NN CC NN IN JJ NNS , WDT MD VB JJ NNS . "
What happens is the nose sometimes does n't match the mouth or the buttocks do n't match with the legs , " he said .	WP VBZ VBZ DT NN RB VBZ RB VB DT NN CC DT NNS VBP RB VB IN DT NNS , " PRP VBD .
Brazil 's most sought-after beauty treatment is liposuction in which fat is sucked away from areas of the body , with about 30,000 operations a year at a cost of $ 3,000 to $ 4,000 each . Stomach tucks and breast operations are also popular since the tropical climate calls for flesh-baring fashions , but unlike women elsewhere Brazilians tend to have breast reductions and buttock implants . " The women who want to reduce their breasts here would probably want to increase them in the United States , " SBCP Vice-President Oswaldo Saldanha said . "	" DT NNS WP VBP TO VB PRP$ NNS RB MD RB VB TO VB PRP IN DT NNP NNP , " NNP NNP NNP NNP VBD . "
Beauty ideals and cultures are different in every country . "	NN NNS CC NNS VBP JJ IN DT NN . "
Plastic surgery scares like the case in which Brazilian model Claudia Liz fell into a coma after being anaesthetised for a liposuction in October are not much of a deterrent .	NNP NN NNS IN DT NN IN WDT JJ NN NNP NNP VBD IN DT NN IN VBG VBN IN DT NN IN NNP VBP RB RB IN DT NN .

Indian rubber demand seen outstripping production .	JJ NN NN VBN VBG NN .
SINGAPORE 1996-12-06	JJR CD
Indian rubber demand is seen outpacing local production in the 1996/97 April / March season and the trend will persist way into the next century , the chairman of the Rubber Board of India said on Friday .	JJ NN NN VBZ VBN VBG JJ NN IN DT CD NNP SYM NNP NN CC DT NN MD VB NN IN DT JJ NN , DT NN IN DT NNP NNP IN NNP VBD IN NNP .
K.J. Matthew said at the Asia Rubber Markets meeting here Indian production of natural rubber in 1996/97 will reach 547,000 tonnes against projected demand of 578,000 tonnes , a gap of 31,000 tonnes .	NNP NNP VBD IN DT NNP NNP NNP NN RB JJ NN IN JJ NN IN CD MD VB CD NNS IN VBN NN IN CD NNS , DT NN IN CD NNS .
For synthetic rubber , production reached 68,200 tonnes in 1995/96 while consumption in the same season hit 134,085 tonnes , Matthew added .	IN JJ NN , NN VBD CD NNS IN CD IN NN IN DT JJ NN VBD CD NNS , NNP VBD .
" Though schemes designed to realise further increases in the production of natural rubber are being operated successfully , the demand-supply gap is expected to widen , " he said .	" IN NNS VBN TO VB JJ NNS IN DT NN IN JJ NN VBP VBG VBN RB , DT JJ NN VBZ VBN TO VB , " PRP VBD .
Indian synthetic rubber output is not expected to rise significantly in the next season but demand will rise to 145,000 tonnes .	JJ JJ NN NN VBZ RB VBN TO VB RB IN DT JJ NN CC VB MD NN TO CD NNS .
Matthew estimates that by the 2000/01 season , the gap between natural rubber output and consumption will rise to 51,000 tonnes and 319,000 tonnes in 2010/11 .	NNP VBZ IN IN DT JJ NN , DT NN IN JJ NN NN CC NN MD VB TO CD NNS CC CD NNS IN CD .
Natural rubber production will go up to 695,000 tonnes in 2000/01 against consumption of 746,000 tonnes .	JJ NN NN MD VB IN TO CD NNS IN CD IN NN IN CD NNS .
In 2010/11 , domestic demand should rise further to 1.233 million tonnes while production will only reach about 914,000 tonnes .	IN CD , JJ NN MD VB JJ TO CD CD NNS IN NN MD RB VB RB CD NNS .
One way to bridge the widening gap is to put more land under cultivation which the Rubber Board official estimates will reach 220,000 hectares between now and the year 2003 although Matthew said this may not be possible at this time in India .	CD NN TO NN DT VBG NN VBZ TO VB JJR NN IN NN WDT DT NNP NNP NN NNS MD VB CD NNS IN RB CC DT NN CD IN NNP VBD DT MD RB VB JJ IN DT NN IN NNP .
" The development objective for the rubber plantation industry will be to increase production to the best extent possibly with a view to minimising imports of natural rubber , " he said .	" DT NN NN IN DT NN NN NN MD VB TO VB NN TO DT JJS NN RB IN DT NN TO VBG NNS IN JJ NN , " PRP VBD .

George Nishiyama	NNP NNP
TOKYO 1996-12-06	TO CD
Comments by Japan 's tight-lipped central bank chief and an influential top bureaucrat are further signs that the nation 's authorities want to keep the dollar at current levels , market sources said on Friday .	NNS IN NNP POS JJ JJ NN NN CC DT JJ NN NN VBP JJ NNS IN DT NN POS NNS VBP TO VB DT NN IN JJ NNS , NN NNS VBD IN NNP .
In a rare expression of a view on currencies by the Bank of Japan ( BOJ ) governor , Yasuo Matsushita was quoted in Japan 's leading economic daily on Friday as saying that he sees no further , immediate fall in the yen . This followed a widely watched television appearance late on Thursday by Eisuke Sakakibara , a high-ranking Finance Ministry official , who denied he had said he wants to guide the dollar lower to between 108 and 110 yen . " The recent level of the yen exchange rate has been stable , and it does not appear to be moving towards a further depreciation of the yen immediately , so import prices are likely to stabilise at current levels , " Matsushita said in an interview with the Nihon Keizai Shimbun . Lebanon sentences pro-Israeli warlord to death .	NNP NNS VB VB TO NN .
Haitham Haddadin	NNP NNP
BEIRUT 1996-12-06	IN CD
A Lebanese military court on Friday sentenced to death in absentia the commander of Israel 's surrogate militia in south Lebanon on treason charges .	DT JJ JJ NN IN NNP VBD TO NN IN NN DT NN IN NNP POS NN NN IN JJ NNP IN NN NNS .
The court convicted General Antoine Lahd , head of the South Lebanon Army ( SLA ) , of collaborating with Israel with which Lebanon is officially at war .	DT NN VBN NNP NNP NNP , NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP ( NNP ) , IN VBG IN NNP IN WDT NNP VBZ RB IN NN .
Lahd , a 69-year-old former Lebanese army major-general , heads the 3,000-strong SLA militia which helps Israel hold a border zone in south Lebanon to ward off cross-frontier guerrilla raids on northern Israel .	NNP , DT JJ JJ JJ NN JJ , NNS DT JJ NNP NN WDT VBZ NNP VBP DT NN NN IN JJ NNP TO VB RP VB JJ NNS IN JJ NNP .
Lahd said a few days after the trial began on February 16 that Lebanese authorities must drop the charges or risk blocking any peace deal with the Jewish state .	NNP VBD DT JJ NNS IN DT NN VBD IN NNP CD IN JJ NNS MD VB DT NNS CC VB VBG DT NN NN IN DT JJ NN .
He said Israel was capable of pressuring Lebanon 's Syrian-backed government to stop the legal pursuit .	PRP VBD NNP VBD JJ IN VBG NNP POS JJ NN TO VB DT JJ NN .
The charges against Lahd were : forming a hostile army , carrying weapons on Israel 's side , helping Israel strip off a part of Lebanese territory by violence , forming an armed gang , killing or trying to kill Lebanese civilians by artillery shelling and kidnapping Lebanese citizens for long periods .	DT NNS IN NNP VBD : VBG DT JJ NN , VBG NNS IN NNP POS NN , VBG NNP NN IN DT NN IN JJ NN IN NN , VBG DT JJ NN , JJ CC VBG TO VB JJ NNS IN NN VBG CC NN JJ NNS IN JJ NNS .
Shortly before Lahd 's trial began , a Beirut military prosecutor charged another 89 former Lebanese army soldiers with collaborating with Israel .	RB IN NNP POS NN VBD , DT NNP JJ NN VBD DT CD JJ JJ NN NNS IN VBG IN NNP .
No date has been set for the trial of the men , all members of the SLA living in the Israeli-held zone in south Lebanon .	DT NN VBZ VBN VBN IN DT NN IN DT NNS , DT NNS IN DT NNP VBG IN DT JJ NN IN JJ NNP .
Israel and Lahd have repeatedly demanded safety guarantees for the SLA -- a mixed Christian-Shi'ite Moslem force -- which the Jewish states regards as loyal allies .	NNP CC NNP VBP RB VBD NN NNS IN DT NNP : DT JJ JJ NNP NN : WDT DT JJ NNS VBZ RB JJ NNS .
Israel has said the Lebanese army must incorporate the SLA fighters into its ranks as an army brigade as a condition for peace .	NNP VBZ VBD DT JJ NN MD VB DT NNP NNS IN PRP$ NNS IN DT NN NN IN DT NN IN NN .
But Lebanese political analysts have said that would be out of the question and Lebanese authorities pre-empted the issue by taking legal action against Lahd .	CC JJ JJ NNS VBP VBD DT MD VB IN IN DT NN CC JJ NNS VBD DT NN IN VBG JJ NN IN NNP .
Former Israeli Prime Minister Shimon Peres , calling Lahd " a great Lebanese patriot " , said earlier this year Lebanon had insulted the SLA commander by ordering his arrest on the treason charges .	JJ JJ NNP NNP NNP NNP , VBG NNP " DT JJ JJ NN " , VBD RBR DT NN NNP VBD VBN DT NNP NN IN VBG PRP$ NN IN DT NN NNS .
Peres , who was ousted in May by rightwing Israeli leader Benjamin Netanyahu , said there could not be real negotiations with Lebanon " unless it will stop the maltreatment of the SLA and its commanders . "	NNP , WP VBD VBN IN NNP IN VBG JJ NN NNP NNP , VBD RB MD RB VB JJ NNS IN NNP " IN PRP MD VB DT NN IN DT NNP CC PRP$ NNS . "
The Beirut military court also sentenced to life in jail in absentia Etian Saqr , former head of the pro-Israeli Guardians of the Cedars , a small rightwing Christian civil war militia .	DT NNP JJ NN RB VBD TO NN IN NN IN NN NNP NNP , JJ NN IN DT JJ NNP IN DT NNPS , DT JJ JJ JJ JJ NN NN .

14 years later , Florida man dies for killing .	CD NNS RBR , NNP NN VBZ IN NN .
TALLAHASSEE , Fla. 1996-12-06	NNP , NNP CD
Fourteen years after he bludgeoned and shot a man whose trailer home he robbed in 1982 , John Mills Jr .	CD NNS IN PRP VBN CC VBD DT NN WP$ NN NN PRP VBD IN CD , NNP NNP NNP .
, 41 , was put to death in Florida 's electric chair Friday .	, CD , VBD VBN TO NN IN NNP POS JJ NN NNP .
As Glenn Lawhon , a rural Florida minister who is the victim 's father , looked on , Mills was pronounced dead at 7:13 a.m. EST ( 1213 GMT ) for the murder of Lester Lawhon .	IN NNP NNP , DT JJ NNP NN WP VBZ DT NN POS NN , VBD RP , NNP VBD VBD JJ IN CD NN NNP ( CD NNP ) IN DT NN IN NNP NNP .
Speaking in Arabic , Mills made a final statement before an anonymous citizen flipped the switch that sent 2000 volts of electricity through his body , said Department of Corrections spokesman Eugene Morris , who was present at the execution .	VBG IN NNP , NNP VBD DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN VBD DT NN WDT VBD CD NNS IN NN IN PRP$ NN , VBD NNP IN NNPS NN NNP NNP , WP VBD JJ IN DT NN .
" I bear witness that there is no God but Allah and I bear witness that the prophet Mohammed is the messenger of God , " he quoted Mills as saying .	" PRP VBP NN IN EX VBZ DT NNP CC NNP CC PRP VBP NN IN DT NN NNP VBZ DT NN IN NNP , " PRP VBD NNP IN VBG .
Prison officials said they had no record of Mills ' official conversion , but they said that , on May 14 , 1991 , he had asked that a new name , Yuhanna Abdullah Muhammed , be added to his prison file , which is usually an indication of a conversion to Islam .	NNP NNS VBD PRP VBD DT NN IN NNP POS JJ NN , CC PRP VBD IN , IN NNP CD , CD , PRP VBD VBN IN DT JJ NN , NNP NNP NNP , VB VBN TO PRP$ NN NN , WDT VBZ RB DT NN IN DT NN TO NNP .
Mills is the 38th person to die in Florida 's electric chair since the U.S. Supreme Court reversed itself in 1976 and legalised the death penalty .	NNP VBZ DT JJ NN TO VB IN NNP POS JJ NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP VBD PRP IN CD CC VBD DT NN NN .
Prison officials said Mills made no special request for a last meal and did not eat the steak , fried potatoes and orange juice offered him .	NNP NNS VBD NNP VBD DT JJ NN IN DT JJ NN CC VBD RB VB DT NN , JJ NNS CC NN NN VBN PRP .
He spent Thursday with family members and his spiritual adviser , Morris said .	PRP VBD NNP IN NN NNS CC PRP$ JJ NN , NNP VBD .
Mills was scheduled to die Wednesday but had his sentence temporarily postponed by the Florida Supreme Court .	NNP VBD VBN TO VB NNP CC VBD PRP$ NN RB VBN IN DT NNP NNP NNP .
On Thursday , the 11th Circuit U.S. Court of Appeals in Atlanta denied his appeal in federal court .	IN NNP , DT JJ NNP NNP NNP IN NNPS IN NNP VBD PRP$ NN IN JJ NN .
In March 1982 , Mills and accomplice Michael Frederick knocked on the door of Lester Lawhon 's trailer in an attempt to rob it , police said .	IN NNP CD , NNPS CC NN NNP NNP VBD IN DT NN IN NNP NNP POS NN IN DT NN TO VB PRP , NNS VBD .
Lester Lawhon was taken to a nearby airstrip where he was bludgeoned with a tire iron .	NNP NNP VBD VBN TO DT JJ NN WRB PRP VBD VBN IN DT NN NN .
Mills then fired two shots that killed Lawhon as the victim tried to run away .	NNS RB VBD CD NNS WDT VBD NNP IN DT NN VBD TO VB RB .
Frederick is serving a 347-year sentence .	NNP VBZ VBG DT JJ NN .

Half of dog bites provoked , says American vet .	NN IN NN NNS VBD , VBZ NNP NN .
CHICAGO 1996-12-06	NNP CD
As many as 1 million dog bites are recorded in the United States every year and half of them are provoked by humans , a veterinarian told fellow animal doctors on Friday .	RB JJ IN CD CD NN NNS VBP VBN IN DT NNP NNP DT NN CC NN IN PRP VBP VBN IN NNS , DT NN VBD JJ NN NNS IN NNP .
The Humane Society of the United States estimates that between 500,000 and one million bites are delivered by dogs each year , more than half of which are suffered by children .	DT NNP NNP IN DT NNP NNP VBZ IN IN CD CC CD CD NNS VBP VBN IN NNS DT NN , JJR IN NN IN WDT VBP VBN IN NNS .
" Most bites can be prevented by teaching children how to respect a dog , " Michael Cornwell of the Glencoe Animal Hospital in Columbus , Ohio , told the annual meeting of the American Veterinary Medical Association .	" JJS NNS MD VB VBN IN VBG NNS WRB TO VB DT NN , " NNP NNP IN DT NNP NNP NNP IN NNP , NNP , VBD DT JJ NN IN DT JJ JJ NNP NNP .
" Let 's not let our kids jump on them or crawl on them .	" VB PRP RB VB PRP$ NNS NN IN PRP CC NN IN PRP .
Dogs and children do n't have to have an interaction .	NNS CC NNS VBP RB VB TO VB DT NN .
Let 's respect their territories , " he said .	VB POS JJ PRP$ NNS , " PRP VBD .
Cornwell said 50 percent of reported bites were provoked by a person and 60 percent were suffered by children .	NN VBD CD NN IN JJ NNS VBD VBN IN DT NN CC CD NN VBD VBN IN NNS .
He also estimated that only 25 percent of bites were reported because medical attention was not needed .	PRP RB VBD IN RB CD NN IN NNS VBD VBN IN JJ NN VBD RB VBN .
Don Rieck , president of the National Animal Control Association , said aggressiveness in dogs was related more to gender than breed and a male dog that had not been neutered was three times more likely to bite than an unspayed female .	NNP NNP , NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP , VBD NN IN NNS VBD VBN JJR TO NN IN NN CC DT JJ NN WDT VBD RB VBN VBN VBD CD NNS RBR JJ TO VB IN DT JJ NN .
The five breeds credited with the most incidents were chow chows , Rottweilers , German shepherds , cocker spaniels and Dalmatians . "	DT CD NNS VBN IN DT JJS NNS VBD VBN JJ , NNP , JJ NNS , NN NNS CC NNPS . "
The trends in dog bites by particular breeds have more to do with fad pets owned by individuals who need to have something unique .	DT NNS IN NN NNS IN JJ NNS VBP JJR TO VB IN NN NNS VBN IN NNS WP VBP TO VB NN JJ .
Speaking strictly of dogs , 15 years ago the macho fad pet was a Doberman .	VBG RB IN NNS , CD NNS RB DT NN NN JJ VBD DT NNP .
Today , Rottweilers are on the way up , " Rieck said .	NN , NNP VBP IN DT NN RP , " NNP VBD .
If approached by a stray dog , children should be taught to stand still with fists folded underneath the neck , elbows in , and gaze forward until the dog goes away .	IN VBN IN DT JJ NN , NNS MD VB VBN TO VB RB IN NNS VBD IN DT NN , NNS IN , CC VB RB IN DT NN VBZ RB .

UNITED NATIONS 1996-12-06	NNP NNS CD
Four African states are ready to nominate candidates for the post of U.N. secretary-general on Friday now that Boutros Boutros-Ghali has temporarily put aside his bid for re-election .	CD JJ NNS VBP JJ TO VB NNS IN DT NN IN NNP NN IN NNP RB IN NNP NNP VBZ RB VB RB PRP$ NN IN NN .
The nominees , according to diplomats , are : Kofi Annan of Ghana , the U.N. undersecretary-general for peacekeeping ; Ahmedou Ould Abdallah of Mauritania , the former U.N. special envoy for Burundi ; Amara Essy of the Ivory Coast , its foreign minister and the U.N. General Assembly president in 1994-95 ; and Hamid Algabid of Niger , the secretary-general of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference .	DT NNS , VBG TO NNS , VBP : NNP NNP IN NNP , DT NNP NN IN NN : NNP NNP NNP IN NNP , DT JJ NNP JJ NN IN NNP : NNP NNP IN DT NNP NNP , PRP$ JJ NN CC DT NNP NNP NNP NN IN CD : CC NNP NNP IN NNP , DT NN IN DT NNP IN DT NNP NNP .
Representatives of the U.N. missions of Ghana , the Ivory Coast , Mauritania and Niger have scheduled a meeting with Security Council president Paolo Fulci of Italy to hand in the nominations in writing , the envoys said .	NNS IN DT NNP NNS IN NNP , DT NNP NNP , NNP CC NNP VBP VBN DT NN IN NNP NNP NN NNP NNP IN NNP TO VB IN DT NNS IN NN , DT NNS VBD .
It was not known if other candidates would step forward .	PRP VBD RB VBN IN JJ NNS MD VB RB .
Diplomats said General Joseph Garba of Nigeria , a U.N. General Assembly president in 1989-90 , was putting forth his own candidacy without being nominated by his country .	NNS VBD NNP NNP NNP IN NNP , DT NNP NNP NNP NN IN CD , VBD VBG RB PRP$ JJ NN IN VBG VBN IN PRP$ NN .
Boutros-Ghali on Wednesday opened the door for other Africans to contest his job by saying he was suspending temporarily his candidacy but was not withdrawing completely from the race .	JJ IN NNP VBD DT NN IN JJ NNPS TO VB PRP$ NN IN VBG PRP VBD VBG RB PRP$ NN CC VBD RB VBG RB IN DT NN .
His supporters said this meant he remained a candidate in case the race reached an impasse .	PRP$ NNS VBD DT VBD PRP VBD DT NN IN NN DT NN VBD DT NN .
The United States on Nov. 19 vetoed his bid for re-election while the other 14 Security Council members supported him .	DT NNP NNP IN NNP CD VBD PRP$ NN IN NN IN DT JJ CD NNP NNP NNS VBD PRP .
The move by the African states means that the council could begin voting on candidates next week , a procedure that could either result in a decision or turn into a bitter fight with vetoes against each nominee .	DT NN IN DT JJ NNS VBZ IN DT NN MD VB VBG IN NNS IN NN , DT NN WDT MD RB VB IN DT NN CC VB IN DT JJ NN IN NNS IN DT NN .
The Security Council has to vote on a new secretary-general and then seek the endorsement of the 185-members General Assembly before December 31 when Boutros-Ghali 's term expires .	DT NNP NNP VBZ TO VB IN DT JJ NN CC RB VB DT NN IN DT JJ NNP NNP IN NNP CD WRB NNP POS NN VBZ .

EU , Poland agree on oil import tariffs .	RB , NNP VBP IN NN NN NNS .
BRUSSELS 1996-12-06	NNP CD
The European Union and Poland have resolved disagreements over a new Polish oil import regime , the European Commission said on Friday .	DT NNP NNP CC NNP VBP VBN NNS IN DT JJ JJ NN NN NN , DT NNP NNP VBD IN NNP .
The EU had objected to increases in Polish tariffs on imports of gasoline and gasoil products introduced on January 1 , 1996 , saying they contravened levels envisaged in the so-called Europe Agreement between the EU and Poland .	DT NNP VBD VBN TO NNS IN JJ NNS IN NNS IN NN CC JJ NNS VBN IN NNP CD , CD , VBG PRP VBN NNS VBN IN DT JJ NNP NNP IN DT NNP CC NNP .
The increases were aimed at protecting the Polish market while helping to modernise the local oil industry .	DT NNS VBD VBN IN VBG DT JJ NN IN VBG TO VB DT JJ NN NN .
" The EU and Poland have now reached a final settlement regarding issues related to the Polish import regime in the oils sector , " the Commission said in a statement .	" DT NNP CC NNP VBP RB VBD DT JJ NN VBG NNS VBN TO DT JJ NN NN IN DT NNS NN , " DT NNP VBD IN DT NN .
Under the agreement , Poland will abolish all oil import tariffs by 2001 , remove all oil price controls and end quantitative restrictions on imports by January 1 , 1997 .	IN DT NN , NNP MD VB DT NN NN NNS IN CD , VB DT NN NN NNS CC VB JJ NNS IN NNS IN NNP CD , CD .
The agreement includes the early privatisation and modernisation of Polish oil refineries , which will be obliged to offer equal treatment to all buyers .	DT NN VBZ DT JJ NN CC NN IN JJ NN NNS , WDT MD VB VBN TO VB JJ NN TO DT NNS .
The EU and Poland will monitor the settlement at six-monthly meetings .	DT NNP CC NNP MD VB DT NN IN JJ NNS .

Canada 's were the worst performing bonds .	NNP POS VBD DT JJS VBG NNS .

France lost 0.37 percent , followed by Italy on minus 0.59 percent .	NNP VBD CD NN , VBN IN NNP IN CC CD NN .

Singapore 's winning campaign to host the World Trade Organisation ( WTO ) 's first ministerial meeting reflected its ambition to play a key role in shaping global free trade , the lifeblood of its economy , analysts said . " As one of the world 's most externally oriented economies , Singapore has a disproportionately large stake in the WTO , " said Desmond Supple , economist at research house I.D.E.A .	" IN CD IN DT NN VBZ RBS RB VBN NNS , NNP VBZ DT NN JJ NN IN DT NNP , " VBD NNP NNP , NN IN NN NN NNP .
" Singapore stands to benefit more than most from continued global trade liberalisation as trade is the engine of its growth , accounting for nearly three times its gross domestic product . "	" NNP VBZ TO VB JJR IN RBS IN JJ JJ NN NN IN NN VBZ DT NN IN PRP$ NN , VBG IN RB CD NNS PRP$ JJ JJ NN . "
The city-state met U.S. opposition two years ago in its bid to host the meeting , expected to gather 4,000 officials from 160 countries from December 9 to 13 .	DT JJ VBD NNP NN CD NNS RB IN PRP$ NN TO VB DT NN , VBN TO VB CD NNS IN CD NNS IN NNP CD TO CD .

One of the local firms will operate in west Japan and the other in east Japan , he added .	CD IN DT JJ NNS MD VB IN NN NNP CC DT JJ IN JJ NNP , PRP VBD .
The long-distance operator will offer international services , Horinouchi said .	DT JJ NN MD VB JJ NNS , NNP VBD .

CRICKET - WOOLMER MAKES SENTIMENTAL RETURN TO KANPUR .	NNP : NN NN NNP NNP TO NNP .
KANPUR , India 1996-12-07	NNP , NNP CD
South Africa 's trip to Kanpur for the third test against India has given former England test cricketer Bob Woolmer the chance of a sentimental return to his birthplace .	NNP NNP POS NN TO NNP IN DT JJ NN IN NNP VBZ VBN JJ NNP NN NN NNP NNP DT NN IN DT JJ NN TO PRP$ NN .
Woolmer was born in the northern city of Kanpur when his father worked there for an insurance compnay and was himself an active cricketer .	NN VBD VBN IN DT JJ NN IN NNP WRB PRP$ NN VBD RB IN DT NN JJ CC VBD PRP DT JJ NN .
" It 's been a sentimental journey ...	" PRP VBZ VBN DT JJ NN :
A visit to India is always an intriguing experience , " Woolmer , now the South African coach , said on Saturday .	DT NN TO NNP VBZ RB DT JJ NN , " NNP , RB DT JJ JJ NN , VBD IN NNP .
Woolmer , 48 , played 19 tests for England between 1975 and 1981 .	NNP , CD , VBD CD NNS IN NNP IN CD CC CD .
His first cricketing sojurn to India was as a member of Tony Greig 's England side in 1976-77 .	PRP$ JJ VBG NN TO NNP VBD IN DT NN IN NNP NNP POS NNP NN IN CD .
His father Clarence Woolmer represented United Province , now renamed Uttar Pradesh , in India 's Ranji Trophy national championship and captained the state during 1949 .	PRP$ NN NNP NNP VBD NNP NNP , RB VBN NNP NNP , IN NNP POS NNP NNP JJ NN CC VBD DT NN IN CD .
Now aged 86 , Woolmer senior lives with his son in Cape Town .	RB VBN CD , NN JJ NNS IN PRP$ NN IN NNP NNP .
Woolmer 's memories of Kanpur are few and blurred .	NNP POS NNS IN NNP VBP JJ CC VBD .
" I do n't remember much of the place , " he said . "	" PRP VBP RB VB RB IN DT NN , " PRP VBD . "
I came here on zero and left at three ( aged three ) when my father was transferred to Calcutta where I spent another four and half years .	PRP VBD RB IN CD CC VBD IN CD ( VBN CD ) WRB PRP$ NN VBD VBN TO NNP WRB PRP VBD DT CD CC NN NNS .
" But I do remember we had a cobra snake in the basement of our house .	" CC PRP VBP VB PRP VBD DT NN NN IN DT NN IN PRP$ NN .
Also that my father bought a bicycle and when we rode over a hose pipe it broke into two . "	RB IN PRP$ NN VBD DT NN CC WRB PRP VBD IN DT NN NN PRP VBD IN CD . "
Woolmer said the hospital where he was born is close to the stadium where the India-South Africa test will be played .	NNP VBD DT NN WRB PRP VBD VBN VBZ VB TO DT NN WRB DT NNP NNP NN MD VB VBN .

WHISTLER , British Columbia 1996-12-06	NNP , NNP NNP CD
World Cup ski officials hope to be able to get in at least one men 's downhill training run on Saturday in an effort to salvage the weekend racing programme .	NNP NNP NN NNS VBP TO VB JJ TO VB RP IN JJS CD NNS POS RB NN NN IN NNP IN DT NN TO VB DT NN VBG NNS .
For the third consecutive day , Friday 's scheduled training runs were cancelled due to heavy wet snow and fog on Whistler Mountain , leaving the scheduled World Cup events in jeopardy .	IN DT JJ JJ NN , NNP POS VBN NN NNS VBD VBN JJ TO JJ JJ NN CC VB IN NNP NNP , VBG DT VBN NNP NNP NNS IN NN .
Rules call for at least one training run to be completed before a World Cup downhill race can be staged .	NNS VBP IN IN JJS CD NN VB TO VB VBN IN DT NNP NNP RB NN MD VB VBN .
Organisers hope to get that run in on Saturday morning , conditions permitting , and stage the race later in the day or on Sunday .	NNS VBP TO VB DT NN IN IN NNP NN , NNS VBG , CC VB DT NN RBR IN DT NN CC IN NNP .

SOCCER - ENGLISHMAN CHARLTON IS MADE AN HONORARY IRISHMAN .	NN : NNP NNP VBZ VB DT JJ NN .
DUBLIN 1996-12-07	NNP CD
Jack Charlton 's relationship with the people of Ireland was cemented on Saturday when the Englishman was officially declared one of their own .	NNP NNP POS NN IN DT NNS IN NNP VBD VBN IN NNP WRB DT NNP VBD RB VBD CD IN PRP$ JJ .
Charlton , 61 , and his wife , Peggy , became citizens of Ireland when they formally received Irish passports from deputy Prime Minister Dick Spring who said the honour had been made in recognition of Charlton 's achievements as the national soccer manager .	JJ , CD , CC PRP$ NN , NNP , VBD NNS IN NNP WRB PRP RB VBD JJ NNS IN JJ NNP NNP NNP NNP WP VBD DT NN VBD VBN VBN IN NN IN NNP POS NNS IN DT JJ NN NN .
" The years I spent as manager of the Republic of Ireland were the best years of my life .	" DT NNS PRP VBD IN NN IN DT NNP IN NNP VBD DT JJS NNS IN PRP$ NN .
It all culminated in the fact that I now have lots of great , great friends in Ireland .	PRP DT VBN IN DT NN IN PRP RB VBP NNS IN JJ , JJ NNS IN NNP .
That is why this is so emotional a night for me , " Charlton said .	DT VBZ WRB DT VBZ RB JJ DT NN IN PRP , " NNP VBD .
" It was the joy that we all had over the period , that I shared with people that I grew to love , that I treasure most , " he added .	" PRP VBD DT NN IN PRP DT VBD IN DT NN , IN PRP VBD IN NNS IN PRP VBD TO VB , IN PRP NN JJS , " PRP VBD .
Charlton managed Ireland for 93 matches , during which time they lost only 17 times in almost 10 years until he resigned in December 1995 .	NNP VBD NNP IN CD NNS , IN WDT NN PRP VBD RB CD NNS IN RB CD NNS IN PRP VBD IN NNP CD .
He guided Ireland to two successive World Cup finals tournaments and to the 1988 European championship finals in Germany , after the Irish beat a well-fancied England team 1-0 in their group qualifier .	PRP VBD NNP TO CD JJ NNP NNP NNS NNS CC TO DT CD JJ NN NNS IN NNP , IN DT JJ NN DT JJ NNP NN CD IN PRP$ NN NN .
The lanky former Leeds United defender did not make his England debut until the age of 30 but eventually won 35 caps and was a key member of the 1966 World Cup winning team with his younger brother , Bobby .	DT JJ JJ NNP NNP NN VBD RB VB PRP$ NNP NN IN DT NN IN CD CC RB VBN CD NNS CC VBD DT JJ NN IN DT CD NNP NNP JJ NN IN PRP$ JJR NN , NNP .
